meaning list.meaning: ປະຖິ້ມ, ປະຖິ້ມ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The sailors had to abandon the sinking ship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກທະຫານເຮືອຕ້ອງປະຖິ້ມເຮືອທີ່ຈົມລົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງແທ້ຈິງ, ແນ່ນອນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has absolute trust in her team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມໄວ້ວາງໃຈຢ່າງແທ້ຈິງໃນທີມງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກວິຊາການ, ການສຶກສາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is a respected academic in the field of physics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນນັກວິຊາການທີ່ເຄົາລົບນັບຖືໃນດ້ານຟີຊິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມຮັບ, ເໝາະ ສົມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This level of performance is not acceptable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະດັບການປະຕິບັດນີ້ແມ່ນບໍ່ສາມາດຍອມຮັບໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປກັບ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She will accompany him to the concert.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈະໄປກັບນາງໃນຄອນເສີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອ​ອະ​ທິ​ບາຍ​, ການ​ບັນ​ຊີ​ສໍາ​ລັບ (verb​)
meaning list.sentence: He could not account for his absence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ສາມາດອະທິບາຍເຖິງການຂາດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖືກຕ້ອງ, ຊັດເຈນ
meaning list.sentence: The information provided was accurate.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ໃຫ້ມາແມ່ນຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍານິ
meaning list.sentence: She accused him of stealing her wallet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ກ່າວຫານາງວ່າລັກເອົາກະເປົາເງິນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມຮັບ, ອະນຸມັດ
meaning list.sentence: He acknowledged his mistake and apologized.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍອມຮັບຄວາມຜິດພາດຂອງລາວແລະຂໍໂທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄດ້​ຮັບ, ໄດ້​ຮັບ
meaning list.sentence: She acquired new skills during the training program.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບທັກສະໃຫມ່ໃນລະຫວ່າງໂຄງການຝຶກອົບຮົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິງ, ແທ້ຈິງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The actual cost of the project exceeded the estimate.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍຕົວຈິງຂອງໂຄງການເກີນການຄາດຄະເນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັບຕົວ, ປັບຕົວ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She quickly adapted to the new environment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປັບຕົວເຂົ້າກັບສະພາບແວດລ້ອມໃຫມ່ຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ນອກຈາກນັ້ນ, ເພີ່ມເຕີມ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Additional resources are needed for the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊັບພະຍາກອນເພີ່ມເຕີມແມ່ນຈໍາເປັນສໍາລັບໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິຫານ, ບໍລິຫານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The administration is working on a new policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການບໍລິຫານກໍາລັງເຮັດວຽກກ່ຽວກັບນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບຮອງເອົາ, ຮັບຮອງເອົາ
meaning list.sentence: They decided to adopt a child.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າຕັດສິນໃຈຮັບເອົາລູກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກ້າວໜ້າ, ການພັດທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: The scientist made a significant advance in cancer research.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ມີຄວາມຄືບຫນ້າຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນການຄົ້ນຄວ້າມະເຮັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັບປຸງ, ປັບປຸງ
meaning list.sentence: The army advanced towards the enemy territory.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງທັບໄດ້ກ້າວໄປສູ່ດິນແດນຂອງສັດຕູ.

meaning list.meaning: ລ່ວງໜ້າ, ຕົ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She made an advance booking for the concert.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮັດການຈອງລ່ວງຫນ້າສໍາລັບຄອນເສີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫດການ, ເລື່ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government is dealing with the current affairs of the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດ​ຖະ​ບານ​ແກ້​ໄຂ​ບັນ​ຫາ​ປະ​ຈຸ​ບັນ​ຂອງ​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼັງຈາກນັ້ນ, ຕໍ່ມາ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: We had dinner and went to the cinema afterwards.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາກິນເຂົ້າແລງແລ້ວໄປໂຮງໜັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອົງການ, ສະຖາບັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The travel agency organized our trip to Europe.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການການທ່ອງທ່ຽວໄດ້ຈັດການເດີນທາງຂອງພວກເຮົາໄປເອີຣົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາລະ, ວາລະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The issue of climate change is at the top of the agenda.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນຫາ​ການ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ຂອງ​ດິນ​ຟ້າ​ອາ​ກາດ​ແມ່ນ​ຢູ່​ເທິງ​ຂອງ​ວາລະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮຸກຮານ, ກະທໍາຜິດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He became aggressive when he was asked difficult questions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກາຍເປັນຄົນຮຸກຮານເມື່ອຖາມຄໍາຖາມຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The organization provides aid to people in need.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງໃຫ້ການຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອປະຊາຊົນທີ່ຕ້ອງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່ວຍ
meaning list.sentence: The volunteers aided the victims of the flood.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາສາສະໝັກຊ່ວຍຜູ້ປະສົບໄພນໍ້າຖ້ວມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົນ, ຍົນ
meaning list.sentence: The aircraft landed safely at the airport.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອບິນໄດ້ລົງຈອດຢູ່ສະໜາມບິນຢ່າງປອດໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕື່ນຕົກໃຈ, ປຸກ
meaning list.sentence: The loud noise alarmed the residents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ສຽງ​ດັງ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ສົ່ງ​ໃຫ້​ປະຊາຊົນ​ຕົກ​ໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນແປງ, ປ່ຽນແປງ
meaning list.sentence: The tailor altered the dress to fit her better.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊ່າງຕັດຫຍິບໄດ້ປ່ຽນເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງໃຫ້ເໝາະສົມກັບນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນລຸຜົນລວມ
meaning list.sentence: The expenses amounted to over $500.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍທັງຫມົດແມ່ນຫຼາຍກ່ວາ 500 ໂດລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໂກດແຄ້ນ, ຄວາມໂກດແຄ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: His anger was evident in his voice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມໂກດແຄ້ນໄດ້ເຫັນໄດ້ຊັດເຈນໃນສຽງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ມຸມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The roof is built at a steep angle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມຸງແມ່ນສ້າງຢູ່ໃນມຸມຊັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົບຮອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They celebrated their 10th wedding anniversary.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ສະ​ເຫຼີມ​ສະ​ຫຼອງ​ວັນ​ຄົບ​ຮອບ 10 ປີ​ການ​ແຕ່ງ​ງານ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຈໍາປີ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company holds an annual conference every January.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດຈັດກອງປະຊຸມປະຈໍາປີທຸກໆເດືອນມັງກອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກັງວົນ, ເປັນຫ່ວງ (ນາມສະກຸນ)
meaning list.sentence: She was anxious about her upcoming exams.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຫ່ວງກ່ຽວກັບການສອບເສັງທີ່ຈະມາເຖິງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫັນໄດ້ຊັດເຈນ, ເຫັນໄດ້ຊັດເຈນ
meaning list.sentence: It was apparent that she was upset.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເຫັນໄດ້ຊັດເຈນວ່າລາວຮູ້ສຶກເສຍໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ປາກົດຂື້ນ, ປາກົດຂື້ນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Apparently, the meeting has been postponed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເບິ່ງຄືວ່າກອງປະຊຸມໄດ້ຖືກເລື່ອນອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງດູດ, ອ້າງອິງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The idea of living in the countryside has great appeal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນວຄວາມຄິດຂອງການດໍາລົງຊີວິດຢູ່ໃນຊົນນະບົດມີການອຸທອນທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອດຶງດູດ, ດຶງດູດ
meaning list.sentence: He appealed to the court for a reduced sentence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຮ້ອງ​ຂໍ​ຕໍ່​ສານ​ເພື່ອ​ຫຼຸດ​ຜ່ອນ​ໂທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິທີການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We need a new approach to solve this issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງການວິທີການໃຫມ່ເພື່ອແກ້ໄຂບັນຫານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າຫາ
meaning list.sentence: The train is approaching the station.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດໄຟກຳລັງເຂົ້າໃກ້ສະຖານີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເໝາະສົມ, ເໝາະສົມ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The outfit is appropriate for a formal event.
meaning list.sentence translation: outfit ແມ່ນເຫມາະສົມສໍາລັບເຫດການຢ່າງເປັນທາງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະນຸມັດ, ຍອມຮັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The project received official approval last week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຮັບການອະນຸມັດຢ່າງເປັນທາງການໃນອາທິດທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະນຸມັດ, ຍອມຮັບ
meaning list.sentence: The manager approved the budget proposal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການໄດ້ອະນຸມັດການສະເຫນີງົບປະມານ.

meaning list.meaning: ລຸກຂຶ້ນ, ລຸກຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: Problems may arise if the instructions are not followed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນຫາອາດຈະເກີດຂື້ນຖ້າຄໍາແນະນໍາບໍ່ໄດ້ປະຕິບັດຕາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກອບອາວຸດ
meaning list.sentence: The bank was robbed by armed criminals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະນາຄານຖືກລັກລອບໂດຍພວກອາດຊະຍາກອນປະກອບອາວຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາວຸດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government is working to reduce the trade of arms.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານກໍາລັງເຮັດວຽກເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການຄ້າອາວຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຽມ, ທຽມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The product contains no artificial ingredients.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນບໍ່ມີສ່ວນປະກອບປອມໃດໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິລະປະ, ສ້າງສັນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has a very artistic approach to decorating.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີວິທີການສິລະປະຫຼາຍໃນການຕົບແຕ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາຍ, ອາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He felt ashamed of his rude behavior.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກອາຍກັບພຶດຕິກໍາທີ່ຫຍາບຄາຍຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທິດທາງ, ມຸມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The financial aspect of the project needs careful planning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດ້ານການເງິນຂອງໂຄງການຕ້ອງການການວາງແຜນຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະເມີນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher assessed the students' presentations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ປະເມີນຜົນການນໍາສະເຫນີຂອງນັກຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ປະ​ເມີນ​ຜົນ​, ການ​ວິ​ເຄາະ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The assessment will help identify areas for improvement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະເມີນຜົນຈະຊ່ວຍກໍານົດພື້ນທີ່ທີ່ຕ້ອງການການປັບປຸງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູກພັນ, ປະຕິເສດ
meaning list.sentence: Many people associate summer with holidays.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼາຍຄົນຮ່ວມລະດູຮ້ອນກັບການພັກຜ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່, ທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: The risks associated with the surgery were explained to the patient.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມສ່ຽງທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບການຜ່າຕັດໄດ້ຖືກອະທິບາຍໃຫ້ຄົນເຈັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະມາຄົມ, ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a member of a local environmental association.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນສະມາຊິກຂອງສະມາຄົມສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມທ້ອງຖິ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມມຸດ, ສົມມຸດ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: I assumed you knew about the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍສົມມຸດວ່າເຈົ້າຮູ້ກ່ຽວກັບກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະຍາຍາມ, ການທົດລອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His attempt to fix the car was unsuccessful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມພະຍາຍາມສ້ອມແປງລົດບໍ່ສຳເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະຍາຍາມ
meaning list.sentence: She attempted to climb the mountain alone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມປີນພູຢ່າງດຽວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The company decided to back the new project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈສະຫນັບສະຫນູນໂຄງການໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື້ອແບັກທີເຣັຍ
meaning list.sentence: Bacteria can multiply quickly in warm conditions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຊື້ອແບັກທີເຣັຍສາມາດແຜ່ຂະຫຍາຍຢ່າງໄວວາໃນສະພາບແວດລ້ອມທີ່ອົບອຸ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: rod, bar (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The metal bar was used to secure the door.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຖບໂລຫະໄດ້ຖືກນໍາໃຊ້ເພື່ອຮັບປະກັນປະຕູ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸປະສັກ, ອຸປະສັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The language barrier made communication difficult.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸປະສັກທາງພາສາເຮັດໃຫ້ການສື່ສານມີຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍ​ພື້ນ​ຖານ​ແລ້ວ​, ໂດຍ​ພື້ນ​ຖານ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: Basically, the project aims to improve efficiency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂດຍພື້ນຖານແລ້ວ, ໂຄງການມີຈຸດປະສົງເພື່ອເພີ່ມປະສິດທິພາບ.

meaning list.sentence: They battled against the odds to win the championship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຕໍ່ສູ້ກັບການບໍ່ລົງຮອຍກັນເພື່ອຊະນະແຊ້ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ອົດທົນ, ອົດທົນ
meaning list.sentence: She couldn't bear the pain any longer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ສາມາດທົນກັບຄວາມເຈັບປວດອີກຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕີ, ຈັງຫວະ
meaning list.sentence: The beat of the drum echoed through the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕີກອງດັງດັງຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: to beg, to beg (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He begged for another chance to prove himself.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂໍໂອກາດອີກຄັ້ງໜຶ່ງເພື່ອພິສູດຕົນເອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ມີຢູ່ແລ້ວ, ທີ່ມີຢູ່ແລ້ວ
meaning list.sentence: Every living being has a role in the ecosystem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸກສິ່ງທີ່ມີຊີວິດມີບົດບາດໃນລະບົບນິເວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ງໍ, ບິດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The metal bar was bent under pressure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຊືອກໂລຫະງໍພາຍໃຕ້ຄວາມກົດດັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເດີມພັນ
meaning list.sentence: He bet all his money on the winning horse.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເດີມພັນເງິນທັງຫມົດຂອງລາວໃນມ້າທີ່ຊະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: Bet (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bet on the game was quite high.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະເຕກໃນເກມແມ່ນຂ້ອນຂ້າງສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກີນ, ເກີນ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The park extends beyond the river.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສວນສາທາລະນະຂະຫຍາຍອອກໄປນອກແມ່ນ້ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກີນ, ລ່ວງໜ້າ
meaning list.sentence: Her skills are beyond what we expected.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັກສະຂອງພວກເຂົາແມ່ນເກີນກວ່າທີ່ພວກເຮົາຄາດໄວ້.

meaning list.meaning: to invoice, to debit (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: The company billed us for the repair services.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຮຽກເກັບຄ່າບໍລິການສ້ອມແປງໃຫ້ພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂົມ, ແຂງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The medicine had a bitter taste.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢາມີລົດຊາດຂົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍານິ
meaning list.sentence: He blamed the weather for the delay.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຖິ້ມໂທດໃສ່ສະພາບອາກາດສໍາລັບການຊັກຊ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍານິ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The blame for the accident was placed on the driver.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕໍານິສໍາລັບອຸປະຕິເຫດໄດ້ຖືກວາງໃສ່ຜູ້ຂັບຂີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາບອດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has been blind since birth.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕາບອດຕັ້ງແຕ່ເກີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັນທະບັດ, ຄວາມສຳພັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They have a strong bond of friendship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າມີຄວາມຜູກພັນມິດຕະພາບທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕ້ມຂອບເຂດ, ລ້ອມຮອບ
meaning list.sentence: The garden is bordered by tall trees.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສວນແມ່ນອ້ອມຮອບໄປດ້ວຍຕົ້ນໄມ້ສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນ້າເອິກ
meaning list.sentence: She felt a pain in her left breast and went to see a doctor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກເຈັບປວດຢູ່ໃນຫນ້າເອິກຊ້າຍຂອງລາວແລະໄປຫາທ່ານຫມໍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັ້ນ, ເຖິງຈຸດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He gave a brief summary of the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ໃຫ້​ຂໍ້​ສັງ​ເກດ​ໂດຍ​ຫຍໍ້​ຂອງ​ກອງ​ປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ກວ້າງ, ກວ້າງ (Adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The proposal received broad support from the community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ສະເໜີດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຮັບການສະໜັບສະໜູນຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງຈາກຊຸມຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຈາຍສຽງ
meaning list.sentence: The match was broadcast live on television.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຂ່ງຂັນໄດ້ຖ່າຍທອດສົດທາງໂທລະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ່ງພິມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The evening news broadcast was very informative.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການອອກອາກາດຂ່າວຕອນແລງແມ່ນໃຫ້ຂໍ້ມູນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ງົບປະມານ
meaning list.sentence: The company allocated a large budget for marketing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຈັດສັນງົບປະມານຂະຫນາດໃຫຍ່ສໍາລັບການຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.meaning: bullet (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police recovered a bullet from the crime scene.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ເກັບ​ກູ້​ລູກ​ປືນ​ໄດ້​ຈາກ​ບ່ອນ​ເກີດ​ເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຸ່ມ, ກຸ່ມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She picked a bunch of flowers from the garden.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເກັບ​ດອກ​ໄມ້​ຈາກ​ສວນ.

meaning list.meaning: Yanik (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The patient had a severe burn on his arm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນເຈັບມີບາດແຜຮຸນແຮງຢູ່ແຂນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄມ້ພຸ່ມ
meaning list.sentence: The garden was filled with roses and other bushes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສວນແມ່ນເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍດອກກຸຫຼາບ ແລະພືດພຸ່ມອື່ນໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາຍນອກ, ຍົກເວັ້ນ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: Everyone but John attended the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸກ​ຄົນ​ໄດ້​ເຂົ້າ​ຮ່ວມ​ການ​ປະຊຸມ​ຍົກ​ເວັ້ນ​ແຕ່​ໂຍຮັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາຍເຄເບີ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The power cable needs to be replaced.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕ້ອງປ່ຽນສາຍໄຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄິດ​ໄລ່
meaning list.sentence: She calculated the total cost of the trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຄິດໄລ່ຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍທັງຫມົດຂອງການເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົກ​ເລີກ
meaning list.sentence: The event was canceled due to bad weather.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖືກຍົກເລີກເນື່ອງຈາກສະພາບອາກາດທີ່ບໍ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ມະເຮັງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is undergoing treatment for cancer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກຳລັງຮັບການປິ່ນປົວມະເຮັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພອນສະຫວັນ, ຄວາມສາມາດ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is capable of handling difficult situations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມສາມາດຈັດການກັບສະຖານະການທີ່ຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມອາດສາມາດ, ປະລິມານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The stadium has a seating capacity of 50,000 people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບ່ອນນັ່ງຂອງສະຫນາມກິລາແມ່ນ 50,000 ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຶດ, ຍຶດ
meaning list.sentence: The army managed to capture the enemy's base.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງທັບສາມາດຍຶດເອົາຖານທັບຂອງສັດຕູ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັບ, ຍຶດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The capture of the thief was reported in the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຈັບ​ໂຈນ​ໄດ້​ກາຍ​ເປັນ​ຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: Cast (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: The cast of the movie included many famous actors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສະແດງຮູບເງົາປະກອບມີນັກສະແດງທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງຫຼາຍຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖິ້ມ, ຖິ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: He cast the net into the sea to catch fish.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໂຍນ​ຕາ​ໜ່າງ​ລົງ​ໃນ​ທະເລ​ເພື່ອ​ຈັບ​ປາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັບ, ຖື (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The catch of the day included fresh tuna and salmon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈັບໄດ້ໃນມື້ນັ້ນລວມມີປາທູນາສົດ ແລະ ປາແຊນມອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊລ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist studied the structure of human cells.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ສຶກສາໂຄງສ້າງຂອງຈຸລັງຂອງມະນຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູກມັດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They chained their bicycles to the fence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ຕ່ອງ​ໂສ້​ລົດ​ຖີບ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ກັບ​ຮົ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນປະທານ
meaning list.sentence: She was chosen to chair the committee meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຖືກເລືອກໃຫ້ເປັນປະທານກອງປະຊຸມຄະນະກໍາມະການ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະທານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The chairman of the board announced the new policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະທານ​ຄະນະ​ກຳມະການ​ປະກາດ​ນະ​ໂຍບາຍ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ທ້າທາຍ, ຄັດຄ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: She challenged the decision in court.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຄັດຄ້ານ​ການ​ຕັດສິນ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໃນ​ສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸນສົມບັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: One characteristic of her writing is its simplicity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຸນລັກສະນະຂອງການຂຽນຂອງລາວແມ່ນຄວາມລຽບງ່າຍຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດເດັ່ນ, ໂດດເດັ່ນ
meaning list.sentence: The building has a characteristic design.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານມີການອອກແບບທີ່ເປັນເອກະລັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາຕະລາງ, ແຜນທີ່ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They charted the progress of the project over time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າວາງແຜນຄວາມຄືບຫນ້າຂອງໂຄງການໃນໄລຍະເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼັກ, ຫຼັກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The chief concern is the safety of the workers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມກັງວົນຕົ້ນຕໍແມ່ນຄວາມປອດໄພຂອງຜູ້ອອກແຮງງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫົວຫນ້າ, ຜູ້ນໍາ
meaning list.sentence: The tribal chief led the negotiations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ນໍາຊົນເຜົ່າໄດ້ນໍາພາການເຈລະຈາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານະການ, ເງື່ອນໄຂ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Under no circumstances should you enter the restricted area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາຍໃຕ້ສະພາບການໃດໆທີ່ທ່ານຄວນເຂົ້າໄປໃນເຂດຈໍາກັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ້າງເຖິງ, ອ້າງອີງ
meaning list.sentence: The professor cited several studies to support his argument.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາດສະດາຈານໄດ້ອ້າງເຖິງການສຶກສາຈໍານວນຫນຶ່ງເພື່ອສະຫນັບສະຫນູນການໂຕ້ຖຽງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພົນລະເມືອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Every citizen has the right to vote.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພົນລະເມືອງທຸກຄົນມີສິດລົງຄະແນນສຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພົນລະເຮືອນ, ພົນລະເຮືອນ
meaning list.sentence: The organization focuses on civil rights and freedoms.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງສຸມໃສ່ສິດທິພົນລະເຮືອນແລະເສລີພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄລາສສິກ
meaning list.sentence: This is a classic example of teamwork in action.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນຕົວຢ່າງຄລາສສິກຂອງການເຮັດວຽກເປັນທີມໃນການປະຕິບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ວຽກຄລາສິກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The library houses many literary classics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍສະໝຸດເປັນທີ່ຕັ້ງຂອງວັນນະຄະດີຄລາສິກຫຼາຍປະເພດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໃກ້ຊິດ, ປິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The close of the event was marked with a speech.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ປິດ​ຂອງ​ກິດ​ຈະ​ກໍາ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ຫມາຍ​ໂດຍ​ຄໍາ​ປາ​ໄສ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງໃກ້ຊິດ, ລະມັດລະວັງ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher closely monitored the students' progress.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ຕິດຕາມຄວາມຄືບໜ້າຂອງນັກຮຽນຢ່າງໃກ້ຊິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸບ, ຫຍໍ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The building collapsed after the earthquake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານໄດ້ພັງລົງຫຼັງຈາກແຜ່ນດິນໄຫວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັງທະລາຍ, ທຳລາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The collapse of the company shocked the industry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລົ້ມລົງຂອງບໍລິສັດເຮັດໃຫ້ອຸດສາຫະກໍາຕົກໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະ​ສົມ​ປະ​ສານ
meaning list.sentence: The combination of colors in the painting is stunning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະສົມປະສານຂອງສີໃນຮູບແຕ້ມແມ່ນຫນ້າສົນໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ປອບໃຈ, ປອບໃຈ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The chair provides great comfort during long hours of work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເກົ້າອີ້ໃຫ້ຄວາມສະດວກສະບາຍຫຼາຍໃນເວລາເຮັດວຽກຍາວ.

meaning list.meaning: to console (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She tried to comfort her friend after the bad news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມປອບໃຈເພື່ອນຂອງລາວຫຼັງຈາກຂ່າວຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: Emir (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The soldier followed the command without hesitation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານໄດ້ປະຕິບັດຄໍາສັ່ງໂດຍບໍ່ມີການລັງເລ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳສັ່ງ, ຈັດການ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The general commanded the troops during the battle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາຍ​ພົນ​ໄດ້​ບັນຊາ​ກຳລັງ​ທະຫານ​ໃນ​ລະຫວ່າງ​ສົງຄາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄະນະກໍາມະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The commission will review the new proposal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະກໍາມະການຈະກວດສອບການສະເຫນີໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕ່ງຕັ້ງ, ອະນຸຍາດ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The artist was commissioned to create a new sculpture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສິລະປິນໄດ້ຖືກມອບຫມາຍໃຫ້ສ້າງປະຕິມາກໍາໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາຫມັ້ນສັນຍາ, ຄໍາຫມັ້ນສັນຍາ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His commitment to the project is truly inspiring.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການອຸທິດຕົນຂອງລາວຕໍ່ກັບໂຄງການແມ່ນເປັນແຮງບັນດານໃຈແທ້ໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄະນະກໍາມະ, ຄະນະ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The committee decided to postpone the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະ​ນະ​ກໍາ​ມະ​ການ​ໄດ້​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ເລື່ອນ​ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍ​ທົ່ວ​ໄປ​, ໂດຍ​ທົ່ວ​ໄປ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: This species is commonly found in tropical regions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊະນິດນີ້ແມ່ນພົບເຫັນໂດຍທົ່ວໄປໃນເຂດຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ່ງອໍານວຍຄວາມສະດວກ, ສັບຊ້ອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The sports complex includes a swimming pool and a gym.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານທີ່ກິລາປະກອບມີສະລອຍນ້ໍາແລະຫ້ອງອອກກໍາລັງກາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບຊ້ອນ, ຍາກ
meaning list.sentence: The instructions were so complicated that nobody could understand them.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາແນະນໍາແມ່ນສັບສົນຫຼາຍຈົນບໍ່ມີໃຜສາມາດເຂົ້າໃຈພວກມັນໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນປະກອບ, ສ່ວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The main component of the system is the processor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງປະກອບຕົ້ນຕໍຂອງລະບົບແມ່ນໂປເຊດເຊີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຂັ້ມຂຸ້ນ, ຄວາມເຂັ້ມຂຸ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: High concentration is required for this task.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມເຂັ້ມຂຸ້ນສູງແມ່ນຕ້ອງການສໍາລັບວຽກງານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ແນວຄວາມຄິດ, ແນວຄວາມຄິດ
meaning list.sentence: The concept of time is central to physics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນວຄວາມຄິດຂອງເວລາແມ່ນມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນກັບຟີຊິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກັງວົນ, ຄວາມກັງວົນ
meaning list.sentence: The rise in prices is a major concern for consumers.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນຫ່ວງ, ເປັນຫ່ວງ
meaning list.sentence: The changes concern everyone in the department.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປ່ຽນແປງກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບທຸກຄົນໃນພະແນກ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະວົນກະວາຍ, ເປັນຫ່ວງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was concerned about her son’s health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຫ່ວງກ່ຽວກັບສຸຂະພາບຂອງລູກຊາຍຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດ, ຈັດການ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist conducted an experiment to test the hypothesis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ດໍາເນີນການທົດລອງເພື່ອທົດສອບສົມມຸດຕິຖານ.

meaning list.meaning: ພຶດຕິກຳ
meaning list.sentence: His conduct during the meeting was exemplary.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຶດຕິກໍາຂອງລາວຢູ່ໃນກອງປະຊຸມແມ່ນເປັນຕົວຢ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໝັ້ນໃຈ, ໝັ້ນໃຈຕົນເອງ (ນາມ)

meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຫມັ້ນໃຈຕົນເອງຂອງລາວເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນກັບແຕ່ລະໂຄງການທີ່ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຂັດແຍ້ງ, ຄວາມບໍ່ເຫັນດີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The conflict between the two countries lasted for years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ປະ​ທະ​ກັນ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ສອງ​ປະ​ເທດ​ສືບ​ຕໍ່​ເປັນ​ເວ​ລາ​ຫຼາຍ​ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັດກັນ, ຂັດກັນ
meaning list.sentence: His schedule conflicts with mine, so we need to reschedule the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຳນົດເວລາຂອງລາວຂັດກັບຂ້ອຍ, ດັ່ງນັ້ນພວກເຮົາຈຶ່ງຕ້ອງກຳນົດເວລາການປະຊຸມຄືນໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບສົນ, ສັບຊ້ອນ
meaning list.sentence: The instructions were so confusing that no one could follow them.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາແນະນໍາແມ່ນສັບສົນຫຼາຍທີ່ບໍ່ມີໃຜສາມາດປະຕິບັດຕາມພວກມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຕິ, ຮູ້ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: He was fully conscious of the risks involved.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ຢ່າງເຕັມທີ່ກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມສ່ຽງທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະນຸລັກ, ອະນຸລັກນິຍົມ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: He has a conservative approach to economic policies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີວິທີການອະນຸລັກນະໂຍບາຍເສດຖະກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະນຸລັກນິຍົມ
meaning list.sentence: The conservatives opposed the new reforms.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກອະນຸລັກນິຍົມຄັດຄ້ານການປະຕິຮູບໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຄິດ, ການປະເມີນຜົນ
meaning list.sentence: The proposal is under consideration by the board.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສະເຫນີແມ່ນໄດ້ຮັບການປະເມີນໂດຍຄະນະກໍາມະການ.

meaning list.meaning: ສອດຄ່ອງ, ຄົງທີ່ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her results have been consistent over the years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບຂອງມັນມີຄວາມສອດຄ່ອງຫຼາຍປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖາວອນ, ບໍ່ປ່ຽນແປງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The noise from the construction site was a constant distraction.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງຈາກສະຖານທີ່ກໍ່ສ້າງເປັນສິ່ງລົບກວນຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງ, ຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງ
meaning list.sentence: She is constantly checking her phone for messages.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກວດເບິ່ງໂທລະສັບຂອງລາວຢູ່ສະ ເໝີ ສໍາລັບຂໍ້ຄວາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ກໍ່ສ້າງ, ສ້າງຕັ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: They plan to construct a new bridge over the river.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ມີ​ແຜນ​ຈະ​ສ້າງ​ຂົວ​ຂ້າມ​ແມ່​ນ້ຳ​ແຫ່ງ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການກໍ່ສ້າງ, ໂຄງສ້າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The construction of the new building will take two years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການກໍ່ສ້າງອາຄານໃຫມ່ຈະໃຊ້ເວລາສອງປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັນ​ສະ​ໄຫມ​, ປະ​ຈຸ​ບັນ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: This museum showcases contemporary art from around the world.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນນີ້ສະແດງສິລະປະຮ່ວມສະໄຫມຈາກທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຂ່ງຂັນ, ການແຂ່ງຂັນ
meaning list.sentence: She won first place in the singing contest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຄັ້ງທໍາອິດໃນການແຂ່ງຂັນເພງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຂ່ງຂັນ, ຄັດຄ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: They contested the election results.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າຄັດຄ້ານຜົນການເລືອກຕັ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຍາ, ສັນຍາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company signed a contract with the supplier.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເຊັນສັນຍາກັບຜູ້ສະຫນອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຍໍ້, ຫຍໍ້ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Metal contracts when it cools.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລຫະຫົດຕົວເມື່ອມັນເຢັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກອບສ່ວນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He contributed to the project with his technical expertise.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປະກອບສ່ວນເຂົ້າໃນໂຄງການທີ່ມີຄວາມຊໍານານດ້ານວິຊາການຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປະກອບສ່ວນ, ການບໍລິຈາກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her contributions to the team were highly valued.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະກອບສ່ວນຂອງລາວໃຫ້ກັບທີມງານແມ່ນບໍ່ມີຄ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປ, ແປ
meaning list.sentence: The factory was converted into a museum.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງງານໄດ້ຖືກປ່ຽນເປັນພິພິທະພັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອໝັ້ນ, ໝັ້ນໃຈ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was convinced that she had made the right decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແນ່ໃຈວ່າລາວຕັດສິນໃຈທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼັກ, ຫຼັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The core of the issue is lack of communication.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈຸດສໍາຄັນຂອງບັນຫາແມ່ນການຂາດການສື່ສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົ້ນຕໍ, ຕົ້ນຕໍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Core values of the company include integrity and innovation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຸນຄ່າຫຼັກຂອງບໍລິສັດແມ່ນຄວາມຊື່ສັດແລະນະວັດຕະກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິສັດ, ທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບບໍລິສັດ
meaning list.sentence: She works in the corporate sector.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ໃນຂະແຫນງການບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະພາ, ສະພາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The council will meet tomorrow to discuss the new policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະພາ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ຈະ​ພົບ​ປະ​ໃນ​ມື້​ອື່ນ​ເພື່ອ​ປຶກສາ​ຫາລື​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ນະ​ໂຍບາຍ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເມືອງ, ລັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The event was held at the county fairgrounds.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ຈັດ​ຂຶ້ນ​ຢູ່​ທີ່​ສະໜາມ​ຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກ້າຫານ, ຄວາມກ້າຫານ
meaning list.sentence: It takes courage to speak up for what you believe in.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນຕ້ອງມີຄວາມກ້າຫານທີ່ຈະເວົ້າກັບສິ່ງທີ່ເຈົ້າເຊື່ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸບັດເຫດ, ການປະທະກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The car crash caused major traffic delays.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸບັດເຫດລົດຄັນດັ່ງກ່າວເຮັດໃຫ້ການສັນຈອນຊັກຊ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: crash, crash (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The plane crashed into the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍົນ​ຕົກ​ໃສ່​ພູ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສ້າງ, ການສ້າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The creation of the new art piece took several weeks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານສິນລະປະໃໝ່ໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍອາທິດເພື່ອສ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັດ, ຊີວິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The forest is home to many fascinating creatures.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປ່າໄມ້ເປັນບ່ອນຢູ່ຂອງສັດທີ່ໜ້າສົນໃຈຫຼາຍຊະນິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ເຄຣດິດ, ຄຸນສົມບັດ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: She was credited with saving the company's reputation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມໄວ້ວາງໃຈໃນການປະຫຍັດຊື່ສຽງຂອງບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີມງານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The crew worked tirelessly to complete the repairs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລູກເຮືອໄດ້ເຮັດວຽກຢ່າງບໍ່ອິດເມື່ອຍເພື່ອສໍາເລັດການສ້ອມແປງ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິກິດການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The economic crisis affected millions of people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວິ​ກິດ​ການ​ເສດ​ຖະ​ກິດ​ໄດ້​ສົ່ງ​ຜົນ​ກະ​ທົບ​ຫຼາຍ​ລ້ານ​ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາດຖານ, ວັດແທກ
meaning list.sentence: One important criterion for success is hard work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເງື່ອນໄຂທີ່ສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບຄວາມສໍາເລັດແມ່ນການເຮັດວຽກຫນັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິຈານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie received positive reviews from critics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາໄດ້ຮັບການທົບທວນຄືນໃນທາງບວກຈາກນັກວິຈານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳຄັນ, ສຳຄັນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Time is critical in emergency situations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເວລາແມ່ນສໍາຄັນໃນສະຖານະການສຸກເສີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການວິພາກວິຈານ
meaning list.sentence: The plan received both praise and criticism.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຮັບທັງການຍ້ອງຍໍແລະການວິພາກວິຈານ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິຈານ
meaning list.sentence: He criticized the government's decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ວິພາກວິຈານການຕັດສິນໃຈຂອງລັດຖະບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ພືດ, ຜະລິດຕະພັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The farmers had a good crop of wheat this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວກະສິກອນໄດ້ຮັບຜົນຜະລິດເຂົ້າສາລີທີ່ດີໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳຄັນຫຼາຍ, ສຳຄັນ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Good communication is crucial for team success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສື່ສານທີ່ດີແມ່ນສໍາຄັນຕໍ່ກັບຄວາມສໍາເລັດຂອງທີມງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ອງໄຫ້ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She let out a loud cry when she heard the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຮ້ອງ​ດັງ​ຂຶ້ນ​ເມື່ອ​ໄດ້​ຍິນ​ຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັບປຸງ
meaning list.sentence: Doctors are working hard to cure the disease.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແພດກໍາລັງເຮັດວຽກຫນັກເພື່ອປິ່ນປົວພະຍາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປິ່ນປົວ, ການປິ່ນປົວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Scientists are searching for a cure for cancer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດກໍາລັງຊອກຫາວິທີປິ່ນປົວມະເຮັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັດຈຸບັນ, ປັດຈຸບັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The river's current is very strong this time of year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະແສນ້ຳຂອງແມ່ນ້ຳຂອງແມ່ນແຮງຫຼາຍໃນຊ່ວງນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄ້ງ, ໂຄ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The road has a sharp curve ahead.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີໂຄ້ງແຫຼມຢູ່ໃນເສັ້ນທາງຂ້າງຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ງໍ, ງໍ
meaning list.sentence: The path curves around the lake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສັ້ນທາງໂຄ້ງຮອບທະເລສາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄ້ງ, ໂຄ້ງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bridge has a beautifully curved design.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂົວມີການອອກແບບໂຄ້ງທີ່ສວຍງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປກັບໃຜຜູ້ໜຶ່ງ, flirt (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She has been dating him for three months.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຄົບຫາກັບນາງເປັນເວລາສາມເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົນທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: The debate over climate change continues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໂຕ້ວາທີກ່ຽວກັບການປ່ຽນແປງດິນຟ້າອາກາດຍັງສືບຕໍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຕ້ແຍ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: They debated the pros and cons of the proposal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ປຶກສາຫາລືກ່ຽວກັບຂໍ້ດີແລະຂໍ້ເສຍຂອງການສະເຫນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜີ້ສິນ
meaning list.sentence: He has a lot of debt from student loans.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີໜີ້ສິນຫຼາຍຈາກເງິນກູ້ນັກຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະອຽດ, ສົມເຫດສົມຜົນ
meaning list.sentence: He earns a decent salary.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບເງິນເດືອນທີ່ເຫມາະສົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກາດ, ປະກາດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The country declared independence in 1945.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດໄດ້ປະກາດເອກະລາດໃນປີ 1945.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິເສດ
meaning list.sentence: He declined the invitation to the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປະຕິເສດການເຊື້ອເຊີນຂອງພັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດລົງ
meaning list.sentence: The company's profits have declined significantly this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນກໍາໄລຂອງບໍລິສັດຫຼຸດລົງຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There has been a steady decline in birth rates.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີອັດຕາການເກີດຫຼຸດລົງຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງປະດັບ
meaning list.sentence: The decoration of the hall took hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍຊົ່ວໂມງເພື່ອຕົກແຕ່ງຫ້ອງໂຖງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງປະດັບ
meaning list.sentence: The Christmas tree was covered in decorations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົ້ນຄຣິສມາດຖືກປົກຄຸມດ້ວຍເຄື່ອງຕົບແຕ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດລົງ
meaning list.sentence: The temperature decreased rapidly after sunset.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກຕາເວັນຕົກ, ອຸນຫະພູມຫຼຸດລົງຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດລົງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a noticeable decrease in crime rates last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອັດຕາການອາດຊະຍາກຳຫຼຸດລົງຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເລິກ
meaning list.sentence: She was deeply moved by the heartfelt speech.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສົນທະນາກົງໄປກົງມາໄດ້ສໍາຜັດກັບລາວຢ່າງເລິກເຊິ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ສຸດ
meaning list.sentence: He is deeply committed to his work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມມຸ່ງຫມັ້ນທີ່ສຸດກັບວຽກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕີ
meaning list.sentence: The team defeated their rivals in the final match.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານໄດ້ເອົາຊະນະ opponents ຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າໃນການແຂ່ງຂັນສຸດທ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊະນະ
meaning list.sentence: The politician admitted his defeat in the election.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກການເມືອງຍອມຮັບຄວາມພ່າຍແພ້ຂອງລາວໃນການເລືອກຕັ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້ອງ​ກັນ​ປະ​ເທດ
meaning list.sentence: The lawyer presented a strong defence in court.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະ​ນາຍ​ຄວາມ​ໄດ້​ນໍາ​ສະ​ເຫນີ​ການ​ປ້ອງ​ກັນ​ຢ່າງ​ເຂັ້ມ​ແຂງ​ໃນ​ສານ​.

meaning list.meaning: ການປົກປ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The fortress served as a defence against enemy attacks.
meaning list.sentence translation: Castle ໄດ້ຮັບໃຊ້ເປັນການປ້ອງກັນການໂຈມຕີ enemy ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້ອງກັນ
meaning list.sentence: He defended his decision with solid arguments.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປົກປ້ອງການຕັດສິນໃຈຂອງລາວດ້ວຍການໂຕ້ຖຽງທີ່ແຂງແກ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ການປົກປ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: The soldiers defended the village from the invaders.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານໄດ້ປົກປ້ອງບ້ານຈາກການບຸກລຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັກຊ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The manager decided to delay the meeting by an hour.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ອໍານວຍການໃຫຍ່ໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈເລື່ອນເວລາກອງປະຊຸມຫນຶ່ງຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັກຊ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a delay in the train's arrival due to bad weather.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການຊັກຊ້າໃນການມາຮອດຂອງລົດໄຟເນື່ອງຈາກສະພາບອາກາດທີ່ບໍ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈດຕະນາ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His actions were deliberate and planned.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ກະທຳ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ມີ​ເຈດ​ຕະນາ​ແລະ​ມີ​ການ​ວາງ​ແຜນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍເຈດຕະນາ, ໂດຍເຈດຕະນາ
meaning list.sentence: She deliberately avoided talking about the topic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໂດຍເຈດຕະນາຫຼີກເວັ້ນການສົນທະນາກ່ຽວກັບຫົວຂໍ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອກະລຸນາ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The surprise visit delighted her.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມທີ່ຫນ້າປະຫລາດໃຈເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວມີຄວາມສຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສຸກ
meaning list.sentence: The children screamed with delight when they saw the presents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ຮ້ອງອອກມາດ້ວຍຄວາມຍິນດີເມື່ອພວກເຂົາໄດ້ເຫັນຂອງຂວັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພໍໃຈ, ມີຄວາມສຸກຫຼາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was delighted to hear the good news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວດີໃຈຫຼາຍທີ່ໄດ້ຍິນຂ່າວດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈັດສົ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The delivery will arrive tomorrow morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈັດສົ່ງຈະມາຮອດໃນຕອນເຊົ້າມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກີດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The mother had a smooth delivery at the hospital.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແມ່ເກີດລູກທີ່ບໍ່ຄາດຄິດຢູ່ໂຮງໝໍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ອງຂໍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There is a high demand for electric cars.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມຕ້ອງການສູງສໍາລັບລົດໄຟຟ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ອງ​ຂໍ
meaning list.sentence: He demanded an explanation for the delay.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ມີຄໍາອະທິບາຍສໍາລັບການຊັກຊ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນ, ພິສູດ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher demonstrated the experiment in class.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ສາທິດການທົດລອງໃນຫ້ອງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະທ້ວງ
meaning list.sentence: Thousands of people demonstrated against the new policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫລາຍພັນຄົນປະທ້ວງນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິເສດ
meaning list.sentence: She denied stealing the money.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະຕິເສດການລັກເງິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິເສດ
meaning list.sentence: He denied knowing the suspect.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ປະຕິ​ເສດ​ບໍ່​ຮູ້ຈັກ​ຜູ້​ຕ້ອງ​ສົງ​ໄສ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສົ້າໃຈ, ໂສກເສົ້າ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has been feeling depressed since losing her job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກຊຶມເສົ້າຕັ້ງແຕ່ລາວສູນເສຍວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊຶມເສົ້າ, ຊຶມເສົ້າ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The news about the economy was depressing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ່າວກ່ຽວກັບເສດຖະກິດຕົກຕໍ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເລິກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The depth of the ocean is difficult to measure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນການຍາກທີ່ຈະວັດແທກຄວາມເລິກຂອງມະຫາສະຫມຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໜາແໜ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: Her knowledge of the subject added depth to the discussion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຮູ້ຂອງລາວກ່ຽວກັບວິຊາດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ເພີ່ມຄວາມເຂັ້ມຂົ້ນໃຫ້ກັບການສົນທະນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຖິ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: The soldier deserted his post during the battle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານໄດ້ປະຖິ້ມຕໍາແໜ່ງຂອງລາວໃນລະຫວ່າງສົງຄາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມຄວນ
meaning list.sentence: You deserve all the success you’ve achieved.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສົມຄວນໄດ້ຮັບຜົນສໍາເລັດທັງຫມົດທີ່ທ່ານໄດ້ບັນລຸໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມປາຖະຫນາ, ຄວາມປາຖະຫນາ
meaning list.sentence: She expressed a strong desire to visit Japan.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ແດງ​ຄວາມ​ປາຖະໜາ​ອັນ​ແຮງ​ກ້າ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ໄປ​ຢ້ຽມຢາມ​ຍີ່ປຸ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມປາຖະໜາ
meaning list.sentence: He desires nothing more than to be happy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປາຖະໜາຫຍັງນອກຈາກຄວາມສຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ້ນຫວັງ, ສິ້ນຫວັງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The refugees were desperate for food and water.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວ​ອົບ​ພະ​ຍົບ​ໄດ້​ສິ້ນ​ຫວັງ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ອາ​ຫານ​ແລະ​ນ​້​ໍ​າ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້າຍແຮງຫຼາຍ, desperately (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She made a desperate attempt to save her job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ພະຍາຍາມຢ່າງຈິງຈັງເພື່ອຊ່ວຍປະຢັດວຽກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າໄປໃນລາຍລະອຽດ
meaning list.sentence: The report details the events leading to the crisis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດ​ລາຍ​ງານ​ລາຍ​ລະ​ອຽດ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ເຫດ​ການ​ທີ່​ພາ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ວິ​ກິດ​ການ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະອຽດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The guide provides a detailed explanation of the process.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູ່ມືສະເຫນີຄໍາອະທິບາຍລາຍລະອຽດຂອງຂະບວນການ.

meaning list.meaning: ກວດ​ພົບ
meaning list.sentence: The sensor can detect even the smallest movements.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຊັນເຊີສາມາດກວດພົບເຖິງແມ່ນການເຄື່ອນໄຫວທີ່ນ້ອຍທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: dig
meaning list.sentence: They dug a hole for the new tree in the garden.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາຂຸດຂຸມສໍາລັບຕົ້ນໄມ້ໃຫມ່ໃນສວນ.

meaning list.meaning: disk (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The data was stored on a compact disc.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້​ມູນ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ເກັບ​ຮັກ​ສາ​ໄວ້​ໃນ​ແຜ່ນ​ກະ​ທັດ​ລັດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ແຜ່ນກະດູກສັນຫຼັງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He had a problem with a disc in his lower back.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີບັນຫາກັບແຜ່ນດິດຢູ່ໃນກັບຄືນໄປບ່ອນຕ່ໍາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະບຽບ, ລະບຽບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The military is known for its strict discipline.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບລະບຽບວິໄນທີ່ເຄັ່ງຄັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາຂາວິທະຍາສາດ
meaning list.sentence: Psychology is an interesting discipline to study.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈິດຕະວິທະຍາເປັນວິທະຍາສາດທີ່ຫນ້າສົນໃຈທີ່ຈະສຶກສາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ່ອນຜັນ
meaning list.sentence: The store discounted all items for the holiday season.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທາງຮ້ານໄດ້ຫຼຸດລາຄາສິນຄ້າທັງໝົດສຳລັບຊ່ວງວັນພັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ignore, ignore (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: He discounted her warnings as irrelevant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະຕິເສດຄໍາເຕືອນຂອງນາງວ່າບໍ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ຊື່ສັດ, ບໍ່ຊື່ສັດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Being dishonest can ruin your reputation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການບໍ່ສັດຊື່ສາມາດທໍາລາຍຊື່ສຽງຂອງເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົກເລີກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The company dismissed several employees last month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປົດພະນັກງານຫຼາຍຄົນໃນເດືອນແລ້ວນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ສົນໃຈ, ບໍ່ສົນໃຈ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She dismissed the idea as impractical.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ປະ​ຕິ​ເສດ​ແນວ​ຄວາມ​ຄິດ​ທີ່​ບໍ່​ສາ​ມາດ​ເຮັດ​ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສະແດງ, ສະແດງ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The store displayed the new collection in the window.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານຄ້າໄດ້ສະແດງຄໍເລັກຊັນໃຫມ່ຢູ່ໃນປ່ອງຢ້ຽມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສະແດງ, ງານວາງສະແດງ
meaning list.sentence: The museum's display attracted many visitors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານ​ວາງ​ສະ​ແດງ​ຂອງ​ຫໍ​ພິ​ພິ​ທະ​ພັນ​ໄດ້​ດຶງ​ດູດ​ນັກ​ທ່ອງ​ທ່ຽວ​ເປັນ​ຈຳ​ນວນ​ຫຼວງ​ຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຈກຢາຍ, ແບ່ງປັນ
meaning list.sentence: The charity distributed food to the needy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການການກຸສົນໄດ້ແຈກຢາຍອາຫານໃຫ້ແກ່ຜູ້ທີ່ຂັດສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຈກຢາຍ, ການແບ່ງສ່ວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The distribution of resources should be fair.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຈກຢາຍຊັບພະຍາກອນຄວນຈະມີຄວາມຍຸຕິທໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂດ, ເມືອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The financial district is located downtown.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມືອງການເງິນຕັ້ງຢູ່ໃນໃຈກາງເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແບ່ງແຍກ, ຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: There is a clear divide between the two groups.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງທີ່ຊັດເຈນລະຫວ່າງສອງກຸ່ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແບ່ງແຍກ, ການແບ່ງແຍກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The division of tasks improved the team's efficiency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແບ່ງ​ວຽກ​ງານ​ເພີ່ມ​ປະ​ສິດ​ທິ​ພາບ​ຂອງ​ທີມ​ງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະແນກ, ສາຂາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She works in the marketing division of the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ໃນພະແນກການຕະຫຼາດຂອງບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອກະສານ
meaning list.sentence: The scientist documented the entire experiment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ບັນທຶກການທົດລອງທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາຍໃນປະເທດ
meaning list.sentence: She hired help for her domestic chores.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບການຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອໃນວຽກງານຄົວເຮືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທ້ອງຖິ່ນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The airline focuses mainly on domestic flights.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາຍ​ການ​ບິນ​ແມ່ນ​ສຸມ​ໃສ່​ການ​ບິນ​ພາຍ​ໃນ​ປະ​ເທດ​ເປັນ​ຕົ້ນ​ຕໍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄອບຄອງ, ຄອບຄອງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The skyscraper dominates the city skyline.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຶກ skyscraper dominates skyline ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄອບຄອງ
meaning list.sentence: Her strong personality dominates every conversation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບຸກຄະລິກກະພາບທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງຂອງລາວຄອບງໍາທຸກໆການສົນທະນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົງລຸ່ມ
meaning list.sentence: The ball rolled downwards along the hill.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບານໄດ້ມ້ວນລົງເທິງພູ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We bought a dozen eggs from the market.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ຊື້​ອາຍ​ແກ​ັ​ສ​ໄຂ່​ຈາກ​ຕະ​ຫຼາດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ປະມານສິບສອງ (ໂທເຄັນ)
meaning list.sentence: A dozen people attended the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະມານສິບສອງຄົນເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ່າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He shared the draft of his new book with his editor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ແບ່ງປັນຮ່າງຂອງປື້ມໃຫມ່ຂອງລາວກັບບັນນາທິການຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກແບບ, ຮ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: She drafted a letter to the manager.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮ່າງຈົດຫມາຍໄປຫາຜູ້ຈັດການ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາກ, ດຶງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The child dragged the toy across the floor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ລາກເຄື່ອງຫຼິ້ນລົງພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະທັບໃຈ, ປະທັບໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: There was a dramatic change in her appearance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການປ່ຽນແປງທີ່ໂດດເດັ່ນໃນຮູບລັກສະນະຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະຄອນ, ລະຄອນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her dramatic performance impressed the audience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສະແດງລະຄອນຂອງລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ຜູ້ຊົມປະທັບໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັດລຽງ, ການຈັດລະບຽບ
meaning list.sentence: He edited the video before uploading it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແກ້ໄຂວິດີໂອກ່ອນອັບໂຫຼດມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະບັບ, ສະບັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The latest edition of the book includes new chapters.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີບົດໃຫມ່ໃນສະບັບຫລ້າສຸດຂອງຫນັງສື.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສິດທິພາບ, ປະສິດທິພາບ
meaning list.sentence: The new machine is more efficient than the old one.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງໃຫມ່ມີປະສິດທິພາບຫຼາຍກ່ວາເຄື່ອງເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: old (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The elderly man needed assistance crossing the street.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊາຍອາຍຸຕ້ອງການຄວາມຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອຂ້າມຖະຫນົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເລືອກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The citizens elected a new mayor last month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາຊົນ​ໄດ້​ເລືອກ​ຕັ້ງ​ເຈົ້າ​ເມືອງ​ຄົນ​ໃໝ່​ໃນ​ເດືອນ​ແລ້ວ​ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຢູ່ບ່ອນອື່ນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: If the shop is closed, we can go elsewhere.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້າຮ້ານປິດເຮົາສາມາດໄປບ່ອນອື່ນໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກມາ
meaning list.sentence: A solution to the problem finally emerged.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາໄດ້ປະກົດອອກມາໃນທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາລົມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She gave an emotional speech at the ceremony.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກ່າວ​ຄຳ​ເຫັນ​ທີ່​ພິທີ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເນັ້ນໜັກ, ຄວາມສໍາຄັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher placed emphasis on the importance of teamwork.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູສອນເນັ້ນຄວາມສໍາຄັນຂອງການເຮັດວຽກເປັນທີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເນັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: She emphasized the need for immediate action.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ເນັ້ນ​ໜັກ​ເຖິງ​ຄວາມ​ຈຳ​ເປັນ​ໃນ​ການ​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ການ​ຢ່າງ​ຮີບ​ດ່ວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອ​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເປັນ​ໄປ​ໄດ້, to enable (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The new software enables users to work more efficiently.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊອບແວໃຫມ່ເຮັດໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ສາມາດເຮັດວຽກໄດ້ມີປະສິດທິພາບຫຼາຍຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພົບກັບ
meaning list.sentence: We encountered several problems during the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາພົບບັນຫາເລັກນ້ອຍໃນລະຫວ່າງໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັງເອີນ, ບັງເອີນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The encounter with his old friend was unexpected.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການພົບເພື່ອນເກົ່າຂອງລາວແມ່ນບໍ່ຄາດຄິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງດູດ
meaning list.sentence: The speaker managed to engage the audience throughout the presentation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ເວົ້າສາມາດດຶງດູດຄວາມສົນໃຈຂອງຜູ້ຊົມຕະຫຼອດການນໍາສະເຫນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມ, ມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມ
meaning list.sentence: He is actively engaged in community work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມຢ່າງຫ້າວຫັນໃນວຽກງານຊຸມຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປັບປຸງ, ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The new system enhances the efficiency of the process.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະບົບໃຫມ່ເພີ່ມປະສິດທິພາບຂອງຂະບວນການ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສືບສວນ, ການສືບສວນ
meaning list.sentence: The police are conducting an enquiry into the incident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດກຳລັງດຳເນີນການສືບສວນກ່ຽວກັບເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: We received several enquiries about the new product.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ຮັບການຮ້ອງຂໍຈໍານວນຫນຶ່ງສໍາລັບຂໍ້ມູນກ່ຽວກັບຜະລິດຕະພັນໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບປະກັນ, ຮັບປະກັນ
meaning list.sentence: Please ensure that all doors are locked before leaving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາກວດໃຫ້ແນ່ໃຈວ່າປະຕູທັງໝົດຖືກລັອກກ່ອນທີ່ຈະອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕືລືລົ້ນ, ກະຕືລືລົ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her enthusiasm for the project inspired the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນຂອງລາວສໍາລັບໂຄງການໄດ້ກະຕຸ້ນທີມງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕືລືລົ້ນ, ກະຕືລືລົ້ນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The children were enthusiastic about the upcoming trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍມີຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນຫຼາຍກ່ຽວກັບການເດີນທາງທີ່ຈະມາເຖິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັງໝົດ, ທັງໝົດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She spent the entire day working on the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຊ້ເວລາຫມົດມື້ເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ໃນໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ
meaning list.sentence: The situation is entirely under control.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານະການແມ່ນຢູ່ພາຍໃຕ້ການຄວບຄຸມຢ່າງສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເທົ່າ​ທຽມ​ກັນ
meaning list.sentence: All participants should be treated as equals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມທັງຫມົດຕ້ອງໄດ້ຮັບການປະຕິບັດເທົ່າທຽມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສ້າງ, ເພື່ອສ້າງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: They established a new organization to help the poor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຕັ້ງ​ອົງການ​ໃໝ່​ເພື່ອ​ຊ່ວຍ​ເຫຼືອ​ຄົນ​ທຸກ​ຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ກໍານົດ, ກໍານົດ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The investigation established the cause of the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສືບສວນໄດ້ກໍານົດສາເຫດຂອງອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັບສິນ, ທີ່ດິນ
meaning list.sentence: He inherited a large estate from his uncle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບມໍລະດົກອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງຈາກລຸງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະສັງຫາລິມະຊັບ, ພື້ນທີ່ທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new housing estate is near the city center.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນທີ່ທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສໃຫມ່ແມ່ນຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບໃຈກາງເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮີດ
meaning list.sentence: The total cost was estimated at $5000.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າ​ໃຊ້​ຈ່າຍ​ທັງ​ຫມົດ​ແມ່ນ​ປະ​ມານ $5000.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ຄາດ​ຄະ​ເນ​, ການ​ຄິດ​ໄລ່ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: We need a reliable estimate for the construction expenses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງການການຄາດຄະເນທີ່ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້ສໍາລັບຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍໃນການກໍ່ສ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັນຍາບັນ, ສິນທຳ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company is known for its ethical business practices.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບການດໍາເນີນທຸລະກິດດ້ານຈັນຍາບັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະເມີນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher evaluated the students' projects carefully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ປະເມີນໂຄງການຂອງນັກຮຽນຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊື່, ກ້ຽງ
meaning list.sentence: The surface of the table was perfectly even.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດ້ານຂອງໂຕະແມ່ນຮາບພຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເໝີພາບ
meaning list.sentence: Both teams have an even chance of winning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັງສອງທີມມີໂອກາດເທົ່າທຽມກັນໃນການຊະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຊົ່ວ, ຄວາມຊົ່ວ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The villain in the story was truly evil.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົວລະຄອນໃນເລື່ອງແມ່ນຊົ່ວແທ້ໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົ່ວຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: They fought against the forces of evil.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາຕໍ່ສູ້ຕ້ານກັບກໍາລັງຂອງຄວາມຊົ່ວຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສອບເສັງ
meaning list.sentence: The final examination will be held next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສອບເສັງຄັ້ງສຸດທ້າຍຈະຈັດຂຶ້ນໃນອາທິດຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສອບເສັງ, ການສອບເສັງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The doctor performed a thorough examination.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍໄດ້ດໍາເນີນການກວດສອບທີ່ສົມບູນແບບ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ້ຕົວ, ແກ້ຕົວ
meaning list.sentence: He made an excuse for being late.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ແກ້​ຕົວ​ທີ່​ມາ​ຊ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: to pardon, to pardon (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: Please excuse my interruption.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາໃຫ້ອະໄພການຂັດຂວາງຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຈັດການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a senior executive at the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ຈັດການອາວຸໂສໃນບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິຫານ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The executive decision was made quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕັດສິນໃຈຂອງການຄຸ້ມຄອງໄດ້ຖືກດໍາເນີນຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ມີຢູ່ແລ້ວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist questioned the existence of extraterrestrial life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ຕັ້ງຄໍາຖາມເຖິງການມີຢູ່ຂອງຊີວິດນອກໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຄາດຫວັງ
meaning list.sentence: Her expectations for the project were very high.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຄາດຫວັງຂອງພວກເຂົາສໍາລັບໂຄງການແມ່ນສູງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່າ​ໃຊ້​ຈ່າຍ
meaning list.sentence: The company is trying to reduce unnecessary expenses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດກໍາລັງພະຍາຍາມຫຼຸດຜ່ອນຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍທີ່ບໍ່ຈໍາເປັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄົ້ນພົບ, ການຄົ້ນຄວ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The exploration of space has advanced significantly in recent years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສຳຫຼວດອາວະກາດໄດ້ກ້າວໄປໜ້າຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນຊຸມປີມໍ່ໆມານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດເຜີຍ, ເປີດເຜີຍ
meaning list.sentence: The investigation exposed corruption within the organization.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສືບສວນເປີດເຜີຍການສໍ້ລາດບັງຫຼວງໃນອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດເຜີຍ
meaning list.sentence: He was exposed to extreme cold during the expedition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຖືກສໍາຜັດກັບຄວາມເຢັນທີ່ສຸດໃນລະຫວ່າງການເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຂະຫຍາຍ, ຂະຫຍາຍ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They decided to extend their stay by a week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈຂະຫຍາຍເວລາພັກອອກໄປອີກໜຶ່ງອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ນຳສະເໜີ, ບົ່ງບອກ
meaning list.sentence: We would like to extend our gratitude to all participants.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຂໍສະແດງຄວາມຂອບໃຈມາຍັງຜູ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມທັງໝົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອບເຂດ, ຂະໜາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The extent of the damage was greater than expected.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂອບເຂດຂອງຄວາມເສຍຫາຍແມ່ນຫຼາຍກວ່າທີ່ຄາດໄວ້.

meaning list.meaning: ພາຍນອກ, ພາຍນອກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The company hired an external consultant for the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຈ້າງທີ່ປຶກສາພາຍນອກສໍາລັບໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິເສດ
meaning list.sentence: She has an extraordinary talent for painting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີພອນສະຫວັນພິເສດສໍາລັບການແຕ້ມຮູບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້າຍກາດ
meaning list.sentence: The athlete pushed himself to the extreme during the competition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກກິລາໄດ້ຍູ້ຕົນເອງໄປຢ່າງສຸດຂີດໃນລະຫວ່າງການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: Facility, Facility (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The sports facility includes a swimming pool and a gym.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານທີ່ກິລາປະກອບມີສະລອຍນ້ໍາແລະຫ້ອງອອກກໍາລັງກາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມລົ້ມເຫຼວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The failure of the project was a major setback for the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມລົ້ມເຫຼວຂອງໂຄງການແມ່ນເປັນອຸປະສັກທີ່ສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບທີມງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັດທາ, ຄວາມໄວ້ວາງໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: She has strong faith in her abilities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມເຊື່ອທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງໃນຄວາມສາມາດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດ​ພາດ​, ຜິດ​ພາດ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: It was his fault that the project failed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນຄວາມຜິດຂອງລາວທີ່ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວລົ້ມເຫລວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ, to prefer (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The committee favoured the proposal for the new policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະ​ກຳມະການ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ສະໜັບສະໜູນ​ຂໍ້​ສະ​ເໜີ​ນະ​ໂຍບາຍ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຂົນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bird's feathers were bright and colorful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂົນຂອງນົກແມ່ນສົດໃສແລະມີສີສັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່າທຳນຽມ
meaning list.sentence: The admission fee to the museum is $10.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າເຂົ້າຫໍພິພິທະພັນແມ່ນ $10.

meaning list.meaning: ອາຫານ, ອາຫານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The farmer stored the feed for the animals in the barn.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວກະສິກອນເກັບຮັກສາອາຫານສັດໃນ barn ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳ ຕິຊົມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The manager asked for feedback on the new policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ເບິ່ງແຍງລະບົບໄດ້ຂໍຄໍາຄິດເຫັນກ່ຽວກັບນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກ, ແຕະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The fabric has a smooth feel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜ້າທີ່ມີການສໍາພັດອ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນມິດ, ຂຶ້ນກັບກຸ່ມດຽວກັນ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He greeted his fellow colleagues warmly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຕ້ອນຮັບຢ່າງອົບອຸ່ນກັບເພື່ອນຮ່ວມງານທີ່ເປັນມິດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄິດ, ເຂົ້າໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: I figured out the solution to the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍເຂົ້າໃຈວິທີການແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍື່ນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She filed all the documents neatly in the cabinet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຍື່ນ​ເອກະສານ​ທັງ​ໝົດ​ໄວ້​ໃນ​ຕູ້​ຢ່າງ​ເປັນ​ລະບຽບ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເງິນ, ການເງິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company's finance department handles all the budgets.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະແນກການເງິນຂອງບໍລິສັດຄຸ້ມຄອງງົບປະມານທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເງິນ
meaning list.sentence: The project was financed by a government grant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຮັບທຶນຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອລ້າຂອງລັດຖະບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄົ້ນພົບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The report includes the findings of the recent survey.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານລວມມີການຄົ້ນພົບຂອງການສໍາຫຼວດຫລ້າສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິສັດ, firm (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She works for a well-known law firm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ໃນບໍລິສັດກົດຫມາຍທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແກ້ໄຂ, ການຈັດລຽງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We need a quick fix for this problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງຊອກຫາວິທີແກ້ໄຂໄວສໍາລັບບັນຫານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ແປວໄຟ
meaning list.sentence: The flame of the candle flickered in the wind.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແປວ​ໄຟ​ທຽນ​ໄຂ​ໃນ​ລົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະພິບຂອງແສງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A sudden flash of lightning lit up the sky.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຟ້າຜ່າກະທັນຫັນເຮັດໃຫ້ທ້ອງຟ້າສະຫວ່າງຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ອງແສງ, ສ່ອງແສງ
meaning list.sentence: The lights flashed on and off during the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແສງກະພິບໃນລະຫວ່າງພະຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນແປງໄດ້ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The schedule is flexible to accommodate everyone's needs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂປຣແກຣມມີຄວາມຍືດຫຍຸ່ນໃນການປັບຕົວເຂົ້າກັບຄວາມຕ້ອງການຂອງທຸກຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລອຍ, ລອຍ
meaning list.sentence: The leaves floated on the surface of the water.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃບ​ລອຍ​ຢູ່​ໜ້າ​ນ້ຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a fold in the middle of the paper.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີພັບຢູ່ກາງເຈ້ຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັບໄດ້ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They bought a folding chair for the camping trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາຊື້ເກົ້າອີ້ພັບສໍາລັບການເດີນທາງ camping.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍ່ມາ, ຕໍ່ມາ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: He moved to New York following his graduation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກຈົບການສຶກສາ, ລາວໄດ້ຍ້າຍໄປນິວຢອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ອະໄພ
meaning list.sentence: She forgave him for being late.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ໃຫ້ອະໄພລາວສໍາລັບການມາຊ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: old, ກ່ອນ​ຫນ້າ​ນີ້ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She met her former teacher at the conference.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແລ່ນໄປຫາຄູສອນເກົ່າຂອງລາວຢູ່ໃນກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮັ່ງມີ, ໂຊກລາບ
meaning list.sentence: He inherited a fortune from his grandfather.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບມໍລະດົກຈາກພໍ່ເຖົ້າຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປໜ້າ, ດ້ານໜ້າ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They took a forward step towards the goal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ກ້າວໄປຂ້າງຫນ້າໄປສູ່ເປົ້າຫມາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ້າງຕັ້ງ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The organization was founded in 1980.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ສ້າງ​ຕັ້ງ​ຂຶ້ນ​ໃນ​ປີ 1980.

meaning list.meaning: ປົດປ່ອຍ
meaning list.sentence: They worked to free the trapped animals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ເພື່ອ​ຊ່ວຍ​ເຫຼືອ​ສັດ trapped​.

meaning list.meaning: ເສລີພາບ
meaning list.sentence: Freedom of speech is a fundamental right.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສລີພາບໃນການສະແດງອອກແມ່ນສິດທິພື້ນຖານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຖີ່, ຄວາມຖີ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The frequency of his visits has increased recently.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຖີ່ຂອງການໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມຂອງລາວໄດ້ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນບໍ່ດົນມານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຟືນ, ຕື່ມນໍ້າມັນ
meaning list.sentence: The controversy fueled public debate.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ໂຕ້​ຖຽງ​ກັນ​ໄດ້​ພາ​ໃຫ້​ມີ​ການ​ໂຕ້​ວາ​ທີ​ຂອງ​ສາ​ທາ​ລະ​ນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ
meaning list.sentence: The project is not fully completed yet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວຍັງບໍ່ສໍາເລັດສົມບູນເທື່ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດວຽກ, ເຮັດວຽກ
meaning list.sentence: The device functions as both a phone and a camera.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸປະກອນເຮັດໜ້າທີ່ເປັນທັງໂທລະສັບ ແລະກ້ອງຖ່າຍຮູບ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຶນ, ແຫຼ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The organization created a fund for disaster relief.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ສ້າງກອງທຶນບັນເທົາທຸກໄພພິບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເງິນ
meaning list.sentence: The project was funded by the government.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຮັບທຶນຈາກລັດຖະບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນຖານ, ສໍາຄັນ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Freedom of speech is a fundamental human right.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສລີພາບໃນການສະແດງອອກແມ່ນສິດທິພື້ນຖານຂອງມະນຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຫຼ່ງການເງິນ, ການເງິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The project is seeking additional funding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການກໍາລັງຊອກຫາທຶນເພີ່ມເຕີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ນອກຈາກນີ້, ນອກຈາກນັ້ນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The plan is practical and, furthermore, cost-effective.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນ​ການ​ແມ່ນ​ການ​ປະ​ຕິ​ບັດ​ແລະ​ຍັງ​ປະ​ສິດ​ທິ​ຜົນ​ຄ່າ​ໃຊ້​ຈ່າຍ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຊະນະ, ເພື່ອໄດ້ຮັບ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She gained valuable experience during the internship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບປະສົບການທີ່ມີຄຸນຄ່າໃນລະຫວ່າງການຝຶກງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company reported significant gains in revenue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ລາຍງານລາຍໄດ້ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກວ, ກຸ່ມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The gang was involved in various criminal activities.
meaning list.sentence translation: gang ໄດ້ມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມໃນກິດຈະກໍາທາງອາຍາຕ່າງໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຜະລິດ, ການສ້າງ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The new policy aims to generate more jobs in the region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍ​ບາຍ​ໃໝ່​ແນ​ໃສ່​ສ້າງ​ວຽກ​ເຮັດ​ງານ​ທຳ​ໃຫ້​ຫຼາຍ​ຂຶ້ນ​ໃນ​ພາກ​ພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະເພດ, ປະເພດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Science fiction is his favorite literary genre.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນິຍາຍວິທະຍາສາດແມ່ນປະເພດວັນນະຄະດີທີ່ລາວມັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັດການ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The country is governed by a parliamentary system.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດປົກຄອງດ້ວຍລະບົບລັດຖະສະພາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັບ, ຈັບ
meaning list.sentence: She grabbed her bag and ran out of the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ຈັບຖົງຂອງນາງແລະແລ່ນອອກຈາກຫ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: to grade, to ເກຣດ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher graded the exams over the weekend.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຈານໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄະແນນການສອບເສັງໃນທ້າຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່ອຍໆ, ຊ້າໆ
meaning list.sentence: The temperature gradually increased throughout the day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸນຫະພູມຄ່ອຍໆເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຕະຫຼອດມື້.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫຍ່, ສະຫງ່າງາມ
meaning list.sentence: They hosted a grand party for their anniversary.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ຈັດ​ງານ​ລ້ຽງ​ທີ່​ຍິ່ງ​ໃຫຍ່​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ວັນ​ຄົບ​ຮອບ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​.

meaning list.meaning: ມອບ, ຈັດສັນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The university granted him a scholarship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລໃຫ້ທຶນການສຶກສາແກ່ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິຈາກ, ບໍລິຈາກ
meaning list.sentence: The project was funded by a government grant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຮັບທຶນຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອລ້າຂອງລັດຖະບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບປະກັນ
meaning list.sentence: We guarantee the quality of our products.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຮັບປະກັນຄຸນນະພາບຂອງຜະລິດຕະພັນຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບປະກັນ, ຮັບປະກັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The warranty serves as a guarantee for the product.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃບຢັ້ງຢືນການຮັບປະກັນເຮັດຫນ້າທີ່ເປັນການຄໍ້າປະກັນສໍາລັບຜະລິດຕະພັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັດການກັບ, ຈັດການກັບ
meaning list.sentence: She handled the situation calmly and effectively.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈັດການສະຖານະການຢ່າງສະຫງົບແລະມີປະສິດທິພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັບ, ຈັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The handle of the door was broken.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມືຈັບປະຕູຖືກຫັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເສຍຫາຍ, ຄວາມເສຍຫາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The chemicals caused serious harm to the environment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສານເຄມີເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດຄວາມເສຍຫາຍຮ້າຍແຮງຕໍ່ສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຳຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: He would never harm an innocent animal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈະບໍ່ທຳຮ້າຍສັດບໍລິສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັນຕະລາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Smoking is harmful to your health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສູບຢາເປັນອັນຕະລາຍຕໍ່ສຸຂະພາບຂອງທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄດ້ຍິນ, ໄດ້ຍິນ
meaning list.sentence: Her hearing was affected by the loud noise.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງສົ່ງຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່ການໄດ້ຍິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໄດ້ຍິນ
meaning list.sentence: The court scheduled a hearing for next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສານ​ໄດ້​ກຳນົດ​ການ​ພິຈາລະນາ​ໃນ​ອາທິດ​ໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫວັນ
meaning list.sentence: They believe that good deeds lead to heaven.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ເຊື່ອ​ວ່າ​ການ​ປະພຶດ​ທີ່​ດີ​ນຳ​ໄປ​ສູ່​ສະຫວັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her shoe had a broken heel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສົ້ນເກີບຂອງລາວແຕກ.

meaning list.meaning: Hell (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Some believe hell is a place of eternal punishment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບາງຄົນເຊື່ອວ່ານະລົກເປັນສະຖານທີ່ຂອງການລົງໂທດນິລັນດອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລັງເລ
meaning list.sentence: She hesitated before answering the question.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລັງເລກ່ອນທີ່ຈະຕອບຄໍາຖາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸດສູງສຸດ, ຈຸດສູງສຸດ
meaning list.sentence: The stock market reached a new high today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕະຫຼາດຫຼັກຊັບໄດ້ບັນລຸລະດັບສູງໃຫມ່ໃນມື້ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຈ້າງ, ຈ້າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new hire will start next Monday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈ້າງຄົນໃໝ່ຈະເລີ່ມໃນວັນຈັນໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖື, ຄວບຄຸມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She kept a firm hold on the railing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຈັບ​ຮາວ​ຢາງ​ແໜ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູ
meaning list.sentence: The tree trunk was hollow inside.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລໍາຕົ້ນແມ່ນຫວ່າງເປົ່າພາຍໃນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັກສິດ
meaning list.sentence: This place is considered holy by many religions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານທີ່ນີ້ຖືວ່າເປັນບ່ອນສັກສິດຂອງຫຼາຍສາສະຫນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຮອງຮັບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The museum houses an impressive art collection.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນມີການເກັບກໍາສິລະປະທີ່ຫນ້າປະທັບໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົວເຮືອນ, ຄົວເຮືອນ
meaning list.sentence: There are five people in their household.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົວເຮືອນມີຫ້າຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ, ທີ່ພັກອາໄສ
meaning list.sentence: The city has a shortage of affordable housing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂາດເຂີນທີ່ຢູ່ອາໃສລາຄາບໍ່ແພງຢູ່ໃນຕົວເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ມ່ວນ, ຕະຫຼົກ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is known for his humorous remarks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບຄໍາຄິດຄໍາເຫັນທີ່ຕະຫຼົກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕະຫລົກ, ຕະຫລົກ
meaning list.sentence: Her sense of humour made her very popular.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຕະຫຼົກຂອງລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມນິຍົມຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍ (ອິຊິມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hunt for the missing person continued for days.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຊອກ​ຫາ​ຜູ້​ຫາຍ​ສາບ​ສູນ​ໄດ້​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ມາ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ຫຼາຍ​ມື້.

meaning list.meaning: ການລ່າສັດ
meaning list.sentence: Hunting is prohibited in this area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລ່າສັດຖືກຫ້າມໃນເຂດນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຈັບປວດ, ອັນຕະລາຍ
meaning list.sentence: He felt a deep hurt after the argument.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກເຈັບປວດຢ່າງເລິກເຊິ່ງຫຼັງຈາກການໂຕ້ຖຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເໝາະ ສົມທີ່ສຸດ, ຕົວຢ່າງທີ່ສົມບູນແບບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is an ideal candidate for the job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ສະຫມັກທີ່ເຫມາະສົມສໍາລັບວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົກ​ຕົວ​ຢ່າງ, ຊີ້​ໃຫ້​ເຫັນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The book is beautifully illustrated with colorful pictures.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ປະກອບ​ດ້ວຍ​ຮູບ​ແຕ້ມ​ທີ່​ມີ​ສີສັນ​ສວຍ​ງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບ, ແຕ້ມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The magazine includes an illustration of the new product.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວາລະສານປະກອບມີຮູບແຕ້ມຂອງຜະລິດຕະພັນໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວຢ່າງ, ຄໍາອະທິບາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The professor gave an illustration of the concept using a graph.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຈານໄດ້ສະແດງແນວຄວາມຄິດໂດຍໃຊ້ກາຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິນຕະນາການ
meaning list.sentence: The artist’s imagination brought the story to life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈິນຕະນາການຂອງນັກສິລະປິນໄດ້ນໍາເອົາເລື່ອງລາວໄປສູ່ຊີວິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອົດທົນ
meaning list.sentence: She grew impatient while waiting for the bus.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມອົດທົນໃນຂະນະທີ່ລໍຖ້າລົດເມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫມາຍເຖິງ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Her words implied a lack of trust.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາເວົ້າຂອງລາວຫມາຍເຖິງຄວາມບໍ່ໄວ້ວາງໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັງຄັບ, ບັງຄັບ
meaning list.sentence: The government imposed new taxes on luxury goods.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດ​ຖະ​ບານ​ໄດ້​ເກັບ​ພາ​ສີ​ໃໝ່​ຕໍ່​ສິນ​ຄ້າ​ຟຸ່ມ​ເຟືອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະທັບໃຈ, ປະທັບໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The presentation impressed everyone in the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ນໍາ​ສະ​ເຫນີ​ປະ​ທັບ​ໃຈ​ທຸກ​ຄົນ​ໃນ​ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​.

meaning list.meaning: ໄດ້ຮັບຜົນກະທົບ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: I was impressed by his dedication to the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າໄດ້ປະທັບໃຈໂດຍຄໍາຫມັ້ນສັນຍາຂອງລາວຕໍ່ກັບໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ນິ້ວ (ວັດແທກຄວາມຍາວ) (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The screen measures 24 inches diagonally.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫນ້າຈໍວັດແທກ 24 ນິ້ວຕາມເສັ້ນຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫດການ, ເຫດການ
meaning list.sentence: The police investigated the incident thoroughly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ສືບສວນ​ເຫດການ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ຢ່າງ​ລະອຽດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຍໄດ້
meaning list.sentence: His monthly income is sufficient to cover all expenses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຍໄດ້ປະຈໍາເດືອນຂອງລາວແມ່ນພຽງພໍທີ່ຈະກວມເອົາຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The weather is becoming increasingly unpredictable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະພາບອາກາດກາຍເປັນສິ່ງທີ່ບໍ່ສາມາດຄາດເດົາໄດ້ຫຼາຍຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸດສາຫະກໍາ, ທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບອຸດສາຫະກໍາ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The city has a large industrial zone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມືອງມີພື້ນທີ່ອຸດສາຫະກໍາຂະຫນາດໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການຕິດເຊື້ອ (ນາມ)
