meaning list.sentence: The doctor prescribed antibiotics for the infection.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍສັ່ງຢາຕ້ານເຊື້ອສໍາລັບການຕິດເຊື້ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຈ້ງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher informed the students about the upcoming exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ແຈ້ງໃຫ້ນັກຮຽນກ່ຽວກັບການສອບເສັງທີ່ຈະມາເຖິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທໍາອິດ, ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The initial results of the experiment were promising.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບທໍາອິດຂອງການທົດລອງແມ່ນດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນ​ເບື້ອງ​ຕົ້ນ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: Initially, the plan seemed perfect, but problems arose later.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນເບື້ອງຕົ້ນແຜນການເບິ່ງຄືວ່າສົມບູນ, ແຕ່ຫຼັງຈາກນັ້ນບັນຫາກໍ່ເກີດຂື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລິເລີ່ມ, ການລິເລີ່ມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government launched a new initiative to reduce unemployment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານໄດ້ເປີດຕົວຂໍ້ລິເລີ່ມໃຫມ່ເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການຫວ່າງງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາຍໃນ, ພາຍໃນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Meditation helps to explore your inner thoughts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການນັ່ງສະມາທິຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ທ່ານຄົ້ນຫາຄວາມຄິດພາຍໃນຂອງເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈ, ຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The report provides deep insights into the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານສະເຫນີຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈເລິກເຊິ່ງກ່ຽວກັບບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮຽກຮ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: She insisted on paying for the meal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ຈ່າຍຄ່າອາຫານ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຮງບັນດານໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher's words inspired the students to work harder.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາເວົ້າຂອງອາຈານໄດ້ຊຸກຍູ້ໃຫ້ນັກຮຽນເຮັດວຽກຫນັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຕິດຕັ້ງ, ການຕິດຕັ້ງ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The technician installed the software on the computer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊ່າງຕິດຕັ້ງຊອບແວໃນຄອມພິວເຕີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວຢ່າງ, ກໍລະນີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This is another instance of poor customer service.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນຕົວຢ່າງອື່ນຂອງການບໍລິການລູກຄ້າທີ່ບໍ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖາບັນ, ສະຖາບັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The institute offers advanced courses in engineering.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖາບັນມີຫຼັກສູດຂັ້ນສູງໃນວິສະວະກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖາບັນ, ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The institution has been serving the community for over 50 years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖາບັນດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຮັບໃຊ້ຊຸມຊົນມາເປັນເວລາຫຼາຍກວ່າ 50 ປີແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກັນໄພ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The car insurance covers damages caused by accidents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະກັນໄພລົດກວມເອົາຄວາມເສຍຫາຍທີ່ເກີດຈາກອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸດປະສົງ, ຈຸດປະສົງ
meaning list.sentence: The intended audience for this book is young readers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊົມທີ່ມີຈຸດປະສົງສໍາລັບປຶ້ມຫົວນີ້ແມ່ນຜູ້ອ່ານໄວຫນຸ່ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸມ, ຮຸນແຮງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The intense heat made it difficult to work outdoors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຮ້ອນທີ່ຮຸນແຮງເຮັດໃຫ້ການເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ນອກເຮືອນມີຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາຍໃນ, ພາຍໃນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company is investigating an internal issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດກໍາລັງສືບສວນບັນຫາພາຍໃນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປ, ແປ
meaning list.sentence: The translator interpreted the speech into French.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ແປ​ໄດ້​ແປ​ບົດ​ສົນທະນາ​ເປັນ​ພາສາ​ຝຣັ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັດຂວາງ, ຂັດຂວາງ
meaning list.sentence: Please do not interrupt while I’m speaking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຢ່າຂັດຂວາງຂ້ອຍໃນຂະນະທີ່ຂ້ອຍເວົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົ້ນຄ້ວາ, ສືບສວນ
meaning list.sentence: The police launched an investigation into the robbery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ເປີດ​ການ​ສືບສວນ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ລັກລອບ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລົງທຶນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They made a large investment in renewable energy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ລົງທຶນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນພະລັງງານທົດແທນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເຜີຍແຜ່, ແຈກຢາຍ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The company issued a statement regarding the incident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ອອກຖະແຫຼງການກ່ຽວກັບເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສຸກ, ຄວາມສຸກ
meaning list.sentence: She felt immense joy when she saw her family again.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກດີໃຈຫຼາຍເມື່ອລາວໄດ້ເຫັນຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວອີກຄັ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດ​ສິນ​ຕັດ​ສິນ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The court’s judgement was in favor of the defendant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຕັດສິນ​ຂອງ​ສານ​ແມ່ນ​ຢູ່​ຝ່າຍ​ຈຳ​ເລີຍ.

meaning list.meaning: junior, ຫນຸ່ມ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is a junior employee in the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະນັກງານລະດັບຕໍ່າໃນບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸດຕິທຳ, ສິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The case was resolved with fairness and justice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະດີດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຮັບການແກ້ໄຂດ້ວຍຄວາມຍຸດຕິທຳ ແລະ ທ່ຽງທຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປ້ອງກັນ, ປ້ອງກັນ
meaning list.sentence: He tried to justify his actions by explaining the situation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ພະຍາຍາມແກ້ໄຂການກະທໍາຂອງລາວໂດຍການອະທິບາຍສະຖານະການ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຮງງານ, ແຮງງານ
meaning list.sentence: The factory employs a large number of manual labour workers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງງານໄດ້ຈ້າງແຮງງານຄູ່ມືຈໍານວນຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ພູມສັນຖານ, ພູມສັນຖານ
meaning list.sentence: The painting depicts a beautiful mountain landscape.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບ​ແຕ້ມ​ສະ​ແດງ​ໃຫ້​ເຫັນ​ທິວ​ທັດ​ພູ​ດອຍ​ທີ່​ສວຍ​ງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນໃຫຍ່
meaning list.sentence: The success of the event was largely due to her efforts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມສໍາເລັດຂອງເຫດການສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ແມ່ນມາຈາກຄວາມພະຍາຍາມຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລ່າ​ສຸດ, ຫຼ້າ​ສຸດ (ຄຳ​ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Have you seen the latest update on the website?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າໄດ້ເຫັນການອັບເດດຫຼ້າສຸດຢູ່ໃນເວັບໄຊທ໌ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: to launch, to launch (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: The company will launch a new product next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດຈະເປີດຕົວຜະລິດຕະພັນໃຫມ່ໃນເດືອນຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: start, launch (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The launch of the campaign was a great success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເປີດຕົວແຄມເປນແມ່ນປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເປັນຜູ້ນໍາ
meaning list.sentence: Her leadership skills helped the team succeed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັກສະການເປັນຜູ້ນໍາຂອງລາວໄດ້ຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ທີມງານປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫະພັນ, ສະຫະພັນ
meaning list.sentence: The team moved up to a higher league this season.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມໄດ້ຖືກເລື່ອນຊັ້ນໄປສູ່ລີກຊັ້ນສູງໃນລະດູການນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເນີ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: He leaned against the wall while waiting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຢືນ​ກັບ​ກຳ​ແພງ​ໃນ​ຂະນະ​ທີ່​ລໍ​ຖ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກເດີນທາງ, ພັກຜ່ອນ
meaning list.sentence: He took a week’s leave to visit his family.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ພັກ​ອາ​ທິດ​ໄປ​ຢ້ຽມ​ຢາມ​ຄອບ​ຄົວ​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປ
meaning list.sentence: He leveled the ground before building the house.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ປັບ​ພື້ນ​ດິນ​ກ່ອນ​ການ​ສ້າງ​ເຮືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເທົ່າກັນ, ດຸ່ນດ່ຽງ
meaning list.sentence: The manager leveled the workload between the team members.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ຈັດ​ການ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເທົ່າ​ທຽມ​ກັນ​ການ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ໃນ​ບັນ​ດາ​ສະ​ມາ​ຊິກ​ທີມ​ງານ​.

meaning list.meaning: ໃບອະນຸຍາດ, ໃບອະນຸຍາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You need a licence to drive a car in this country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການໃບອະນຸຍາດຂັບຂີ່ໃນປະເທດນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຳກັດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The offer is available for a limited time only.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ສະເໜີມີເວລາຈຳກັດເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄືອບ, ເຄືອບ
meaning list.sentence: They lined the box with soft material to protect the contents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກມັນຕິດໃສ່ກ່ອງດ້ວຍວັດສະດຸອ່ອນໆເພື່ອປົກປ້ອງເນື້ອໃນ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຊີວິດຊີວາ, ຫ້າວຫັນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The market was full of lively colors and sounds.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕະຫຼາດເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍສີສັນ ແລະສຽງດັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຫຼດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The truck was carrying a heavy load of goods.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດບັນທຸກໄດ້ບັນທຸກສິນຄ້າໜັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕິດຕັ້ງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They loaded the boxes onto the truck.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ໂຫຼດ​ກ່ອງ​ໃສ່​ລົດ​ບັນ​ທຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິນເຊື່ອ, ຫນີ້ສິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He applied for a loan to buy a car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂໍກູ້ຢືມເພື່ອຊື້ລົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີເຫດຜົນ, ສົມເຫດສົມຜົນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her argument was clear and logical.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໂຕ້ຖຽງຂອງລາວແມ່ນຈະແຈ້ງແລະມີເຫດຜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລຍະຍາວ
meaning list.sentence: They are planning long-term investments in technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາກໍາລັງວາງແຜນການລົງທຶນໄລຍະຍາວໃນເຕັກໂນໂລຢີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລຍະຍາວ
meaning list.sentence: The policy aims to reduce emissions long-term.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະໂຍບາຍດັ່ງກ່າວມີຈຸດປະສົງເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການປ່ອຍອາຍພິດໃນໄລຍະຍາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ວ່າງ, ບໍ່ເສຍຄ່າ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The screws were loose, so the shelf fell down.
meaning list.sentence translation: screws ໄດ້ວ່າງດັ່ງນັ້ນ shelf ຫຼຸດລົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພຣະຜູ້ເປັນເຈົ້າ, ບຸກຄົນສູງສົ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: The lord of the castle welcomed his guests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະຜູ້ເປັນເຈົ້າຂອງ Castle ໄດ້ຕ້ອນຮັບແຂກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ່ໍາສຸດ, ຕ່ໍາສຸດ
meaning list.sentence: The stock market hit a new low last month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕະຫຼາດຫຼັກຊັບໄດ້ຫຼຸດລົງຕໍ່າສຸດໃຫມ່ໃນເດືອນແລ້ວນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດ, ຫຼຸດ
meaning list.sentence: They lowered the price of the tickets to attract more customers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາຫຼຸດລາຄາປີ້ເພື່ອດຶງດູດລູກຄ້າຫຼາຍຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປອດ
meaning list.sentence: Smoking can severely damage your lungs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສູບຢາສາມາດທໍາລາຍປອດຂອງທ່ານຢ່າງຮ້າຍແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັກສາ, ປົກປ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: It is important to maintain a healthy diet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນສິ່ງສໍາຄັນທີ່ຈະຮັກສາອາຫານທີ່ມີສຸຂະພາບດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ດູແລ
meaning list.sentence: The company maintains its equipment regularly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດຮັກສາອຸປະກອນຂອງຕົນເປັນປົກກະຕິ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The majority of people supported the new law.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາຊົນສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ໄດ້ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນກົດຫມາຍໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຍີ່ຫໍ້, ແບບ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: What make of car do you drive?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າໃຊ້ລົດຍີ່ຫໍ້ໃດ?

meaning list.meaning: ແຜນທີ່ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientists mapped the surface of the moon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ແຜນທີ່ພື້ນຜິວຂອງດວງຈັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ມະຫາຊົນ, heap (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A mass of people gathered in the square.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມວນ​ຊົນ​ໄດ້​ເຕົ້າ​ໂຮມ​ກັນ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ສະໜາມ​ຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ມວນ, ມະຫາສານ
meaning list.sentence: Mass communication has transformed society.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສື່ສານມວນຊົນໄດ້ຫັນປ່ຽນສັງຄົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫຍ່, ໃຫຍ່ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company made a massive profit last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ກໍາໄລຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ອາຈານ, ຊ່ຽວຊານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is a master of painting landscapes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນນັກແຕ້ມຮູບພູມສັນຖານ.

meaning list.meaning: to master, to master (ຄຳ​ກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She mastered the art of public speaking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຊໍານິຊໍານານສິລະປະການປາກເວົ້າສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າກັນໄດ້, ກົງກັນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: They wore matching outfits to the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ໃສ່​ຊຸດ​ທີ່​ສອດ​ຄ້ອງ​ກັນ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ການ​ພັກ​.

meaning list.meaning: ວັດສະດຸ, ສີມັງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The project requires significant material resources.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການຕ້ອງການຊັບພະຍາກອນທາງດ້ານການເງິນທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສູງສຸດ, ສູງສຸດ (ນາມສະກຸນ)
meaning list.sentence: The maximum speed of this car is 200 km/h.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມໄວສູງສຸດຂອງລົດນີ້ແມ່ນ 200 ກິໂລແມັດຕໍ່ຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຳນວນສູງສຸດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You can withdraw a maximum of $500 per day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດຖອນໄດ້ສູງສຸດ $500 ຕໍ່ມື້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງມື, ວິທີການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Education is a means to achieve success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສຶກສາແມ່ນວິທີການເພື່ອບັນລຸຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການວັດແທກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Accurate measurements are crucial for this experiment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການວັດແທກທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງແມ່ນສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບການທົດລອງນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະ​ຫນາດ​ກາງ​, ພາ​ຫະ​ນະ (ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: Television is a powerful medium for communication.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂທລະທັດເປັນເຄື່ອງມືການສື່ສານທີ່ມີປະສິດທິພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: melt, melt (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The snow melted quickly under the warm sun.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫິມະ melted ຢ່າງໄວວາພາຍໃຕ້ແສງຕາເວັນຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທະຫານ, ກ່ຽວກັບກອງທັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country increased its military spending.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດ​ໄດ້​ເພີ່ມ​ການ​ໃຊ້​ຈ່າຍ​ທາງ​ທະຫານ.

meaning list.meaning: ທະຫານ, ກອງທັບ
meaning list.sentence: The military played a key role in the operation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານໄດ້ມີບົດບາດສໍາຄັນໃນການປະຕິບັດງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຮ່ທາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The water is rich in essential minerals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ໍາແມ່ນອຸດົມສົມບູນໃນແຮ່ທາດທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງຫນ້ອຍ, ຕໍາ່ສຸດທີ່ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The minimum age to vote is 18.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຍຸການລົງຄະແນນສຽງແມ່ນຢ່າງໜ້ອຍ 18 ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະລິມານຕໍ່າສຸດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You need a minimum of $100 to open an account.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຕ້ອງການຢ່າງໜ້ອຍ $100 ເພື່ອເປີດບັນຊີ.

meaning list.meaning: ລັດຖະມົນຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The foreign minister attended the conference.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະມົນຕີການຕ່າງປະເທດເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ນ້ອຍ, ບໍ່ສຳຄັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a minor error in the report.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຂໍ້ຜິດພາດເລັກນ້ອຍໃນລາຍງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົນເຜົ່າສ່ວນນ້ອຍ
meaning list.sentence: The proposal was supported by a small minority of voters.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້​ສະ​ເໜີ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ສະ​ໜັບ​ສະ​ໜູນ​ຈາກ​ຜູ້​ລົງ​ຄະ​ແນນ​ສຽງ​ສ່ວນ​ໜ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜ້າທີ່, ພາລະກິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The team was sent on a dangerous mission.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານຖືກສົ່ງໄປໃນພາລະກິດອັນຕະລາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າໃຈຜິດ, ສັບສົນ
meaning list.sentence: She mistook his intentions for kindness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຂົ້າໃຈຄວາມຕັ້ງໃຈຂອງນາງໃນຄວາມເມດຕາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບສົນ, ປະສົມ
meaning list.sentence: The feedback on the new policy was mixed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາຕິຊົມກ່ຽວກັບນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່ໄດ້ຖືກປະສົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາແບບຢ່າງ, ເອົາເປັນຕົວຢ່າງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The architect modeled the new building after traditional designs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖາປະນິກໄດ້ສ້າງແບບຈໍາລອງຂອງອາຄານໃຫມ່ຫຼັງຈາກການອອກແບບແບບດັ້ງເດີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນແປງ, ການຈັດລຽງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The program allows you to modify the settings easily.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ທ່ານສາມາດປ່ຽນການຕັ້ງຄ່າໄດ້ຢ່າງງ່າຍດາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນ້າ​ຈໍ​, ຜູ້​ຊົມ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The computer monitor needs to be replaced.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈໍຄອມພິວເຕີຄວນຖືກປ່ຽນແທນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັງເກດເບິ່ງ, ສັງເກດ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The doctor monitored the patient’s condition closely.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານໝໍໄດ້ຕິດຕາມສະພາບຂອງຄົນເຈັບຢ່າງໃກ້ຊິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັນຍາບັນ, ຈັນຍາບັນ
meaning list.sentence: The story conveyed a strong moral message.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເລື່ອງດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖ່າຍທອດຂໍ້ຄວາມດ້ານສິນທໍາທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບັດສິນ
meaning list.sentence: He is a person of high moral standards.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເປັນ​ຄົນ​ທີ່​ມີ​ມາດຕະຖານ​ສິນລະທຳ​ສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງຈັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The car's motor needs to be repaired.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງຈັກຂອງລົດຕ້ອງໄດ້ຮັບການສ້ອມແປງ.

meaning list.meaning: ມໍເຕີກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He has a great interest in motor sports.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມສົນໃຈຫຼາຍໃນກິລາມໍເຕີ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກອບ, ຕິດຕັ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: The technician mounted the new TV on the wall.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊ່າງຕິດຕັ້ງໂທລະທັດໃໝ່ຢູ່ເທິງຝາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ, ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The pressure continued to mount as the deadline approached.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມກົດດັນຍັງສືບຕໍ່ເພີ່ມຂື້ນໃນຂະນະທີ່ເສັ້ນຕາຍໃກ້ເຂົ້າມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼາຍ, ຫຼາຍກວ່າໜຶ່ງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company operates in multiple countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດດໍາເນີນການຢູ່ໃນຫຼາຍປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄູນ, ຄູນ
meaning list.sentence: To calculate the total cost, multiply the price by the quantity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູນລາຄາດ້ວຍປະລິມານເພື່ອຄິດໄລ່ຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍທັງໝົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມລຶກລັບ
meaning list.sentence: The house has a mysterious charm that attracts visitors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອນມີສະເຫນ່ລຶກລັບທີ່ດຶງດູດນັກທ່ອງທ່ຽວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຳກັດ, ຈຳກັດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: They narrowed the options to just three candidates.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ຮັດ​ແຄບ​ທາງ​ເລືອກ​ລົງ​ໃຫ້​ພຽງ​ແຕ່ 3 ຜູ້​ສະ​ໝັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ພົນລະເມືອງ, ບຸກຄົນແຫ່ງຊາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is a national of Canada.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນພົນລະເມືອງການາດາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະອາດ, ກະທັດຮັດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her desk was always neat and tidy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຕະຂອງລາວແມ່ນເປັນລະບຽບຮຽບຮ້ອຍສະເໝີ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບ, ລົບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The test result came back negative.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນການທົດສອບແມ່ນລົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສັ້ນປະສາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The injury damaged the nerves in his arm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການບາດເຈັບເສຍຫາຍເສັ້ນປະສາດຢູ່ໃນແຂນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຖິງ​ແມ່ນ​ວ່າ​ນີ້, ຍັງ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: It was raining heavily; nevertheless, they continued their journey.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝົນຕົກໜັກ; ເຖິງ​ແມ່ນ​ວ່າ​ນີ້​, ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ສືບ​ຕໍ່​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຝັນຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: She woke up screaming from a nightmare.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕື່ນຂຶ້ນດ້ວຍສຽງດັງຈາກຝັນຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນວຄວາມຄິດ, ແນວຄວາມຄິດ
meaning list.sentence: The book explores the notion of freedom.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມ​ບັນ​ນີ້​ພິ​ຈາ​ລະ​ນາ​ແນວ​ຄວາມ​ຄິດ​ຂອງ​ອິດ​ສະ​ລະ​ພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼາຍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Numerous studies have shown the benefits of exercise.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສຶກສາຈໍານວນຫລາຍໄດ້ສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນຜົນປະໂຫຍດຂອງການອອກກໍາລັງກາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດຕາມ, ປະຕິບັດຕາມ
meaning list.sentence: You should obey the traffic rules to avoid accidents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຕ້ອງປະຕິບັດຕາມກົດລະບຽບຈະລາຈອນເພື່ອປ້ອງກັນອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄັດຄ້ານ, ຄັດຄ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: He objected to the decision made by the committee.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຄັດຄ້ານການຕັດສິນໃຈຂອງຄະນະກໍາມະການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸດປະສົງ, ເປົ້າໝາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The main objective of the meeting was to discuss the budget.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈຸດປະສົງຫຼັກຂອງກອງປະຊຸມແມ່ນເພື່ອປຶກສາຫາລືກ່ຽວກັບງົບປະມານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນກາງ, ຈຸດປະສົງ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Journalists should remain objective when reporting news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ຂ່າວ​ຕ້ອງ​ຮັກສາ​ຄວາມ​ຍຸດຕິ​ທຳ​ໃນ​ເວລາ​ລາຍ​ງານ​ຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັນທະ, ພັນທະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Parents have an obligation to provide for their children.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພໍ່ແມ່ມີພັນທະໃນການດູແລລູກຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສັງເກດການ
meaning list.sentence: The scientist made an important discovery through careful observation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂດຍຜ່ານການສັງເກດຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ, ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ຄົ້ນພົບທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັງເກດ, ສັງເກດ
meaning list.sentence: She observed the behavior of the animals in the wild.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສັງເກດເຫັນພຶດຕິກໍາຂອງສັດໃນປ່າທໍາມະຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄດ້​ຮັບ, ໄດ້​ຮັບ
meaning list.sentence: You need to obtain permission before entering the building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງໄດ້ຮັບການອະນຸຍາດກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເຂົ້າໄປໃນອາຄານ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາງຄັ້ງ, ບາງຄັ້ງ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: He occasionally visits his grandparents on weekends.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມຜູ້ເຖົ້າແກ່ຂອງລາວເປັນບາງໂອກາດໃນທ້າຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາຊະຍາກຳ, ການໂຈມຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The judge found him guilty of a minor offence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ພິພາກສາພົບວ່າລາວມີຄວາມຜິດໃນອາຊະຍາກຳເລັກນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະທໍາຜິດ, ກະທໍາຜິດ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She didn’t mean to offend anyone with her comments.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ບໍ່​ຢາກ​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ຜູ້​ໃດ​ຜິດ​ຫວັງ​ກັບ​ຄຳ​ເຫັນ​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮຸກຮານ, ກະທໍາຜິດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His remarks were considered offensive by many people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາເວົ້າຂອງລາວໄດ້ຖືກພົບເຫັນວ່າມີຄວາມລັງກຽດໂດຍຫຼາຍຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈົ້າໜ້າທີ່, ພະນັກງານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government official announced the new policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະກອນປະກາດນະໂຍບາຍໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດ, ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The opening of the new park was attended by many people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາຊົນຈໍານວນຫຼາຍໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມການເປີດສວນສາທາລະໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດ, ປະຕິບັດການ
meaning list.sentence: The company operates in several international markets.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດດໍາເນີນການໃນຕະຫຼາດສາກົນຈໍານວນຫນຶ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄູ່ແຂ່ງ, ຄູ່ຕໍ່ສູ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His opponent in the election was very strong.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູ່ແຂ່ງຂອງລາວໃນການເລືອກຕັ້ງແມ່ນມີຄວາມເຂັ້ມແຂງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄັດຄ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: Many people opposed the new government policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼາຍຄົນຄັດຄ້ານນະໂຍບາຍຂອງລັດຖະບານຊຸດໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ກົງກັນຂ້າມ, ກົງກັນຂ້າມ
meaning list.sentence: She is strongly opposed to the idea of increasing taxes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແມ່ນແທ້ໆຕໍ່ກັບຄວາມຄິດຂອງການເພີ່ມພາສີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຝ່າຍຄ້ານ, ຝ່າຍຄ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: The proposal faced strong opposition from environmental groups.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້​ສະ​ເໜີ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ປະ​ເຊີນ​ກັບ​ການ​ຄັດຄ້ານ​ຢ່າງ​ແຂງ​ແຮງ​ຈາກ​ບັນດາ​ກຸ່ມ​ສິ່ງ​ແວດ​ລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະໄວຍະວະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The heart is an essential organ in the human body.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫົວໃຈເປັນອະໄວຍະວະທີ່ສຳຄັນໃນຮ່າງກາຍຂອງມະນຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ມາ, ທີ່ມາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The origin of the custom is unknown.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົ້ນກໍາເນີດຂອງປະເພນີແມ່ນບໍ່ຮູ້ຈັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖ້າບໍ່ດັ່ງນັ້ນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: Hurry up; otherwise, we’ll miss the train.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮີບຮ້ອນ; ຖ້າບໍ່ດັ່ງນັ້ນພວກເຮົາຈະພາດລົດໄຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບ, ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The outcome of the election was surprising.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນຂອງການເລືອກຕັ້ງແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຫນ້າປະຫລາດໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາຍນອກ, ພາຍນອກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The outer layer of the building is made of glass.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊັ້ນນອກຂອງອາຄານແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍແກ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄງຮ່າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He presented a brief outline of the plan.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ເໜີ​ແຜນ​ຮ່າງ​ໂດຍ​ຫຍໍ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄງຮ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: The report outlines the main points of the discussion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານໄດ້ສະຫຼຸບຈຸດຕົ້ນຕໍຂອງການສົນທະນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍທົ່ວໄປ, ທັງຫມົດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The overall performance of the team was impressive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະຕິບັດໂດຍລວມຂອງທີມງານແມ່ນປະທັບໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍ​ທົ່ວ​ໄປ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: Overall, the project was a great success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂດຍລວມແລ້ວ, ໂຄງການແມ່ນປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນໜີ້
meaning list.sentence: I owe him $50 for the groceries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າ​ພະ​ເຈົ້າ​ເປັນ​ໜີ້​ລາວ $50 ສໍາ​ລັບ​ເຄື່ອງ​ແຫ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າວ, ຄວາມໄວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She walked at a steady pace through the park.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍ່າງຢູ່ໃນຈັງຫວະທີ່ສະຫມໍ່າສະເຫມີຜ່ານສວນສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າວ, ກ້າວ
meaning list.sentence: He paced back and forth while thinking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຍ່າງ​ໄປ​ມາ​ຕາມ​ທີ່​ລາວ​ຄິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫໍ່ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The factory packages the goods before shipping.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງງານຫຸ້ມຫໍ່ສິນຄ້າກ່ອນການຂົນສົ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະດານ, ກະດານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A panel of experts discussed the issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະຜູ້ຊ່ຽວຊານໄດ້ປຶກສາຫາລືກ່ຽວກັບບັນຫາດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະພາ, ສະພາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new law was debated in parliament.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດໝາຍ​ສະບັບ​ໃໝ່​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ພິຈາລະນາ​ໃນ​ລັດຖະສະພາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Each participant in the workshop received a certificate.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຕ່ລະຄົນທີ່ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກອງປະຊຸມໄດ້ຮັບໃບຢັ້ງຢືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາງສ່ວນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The delay was partly due to bad weather.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຊັກຊ້າແມ່ນສ່ວນຫນຶ່ງແມ່ນຍ້ອນສະພາບອາກາດທີ່ບໍ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: passage, passage (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The passage led to a hidden room.
meaning list.sentence translation: passage ໄດ້ນໍາໄປສູ່ຫ້ອງລັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ້ຄວາມ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The students were asked to analyze a passage from the book.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຮຽນຖືກຖາມໃຫ້ວິເຄາະບົດເລື່ອງໜຶ່ງຈາກປຶ້ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນ​ເຈັບ
meaning list.sentence: She remained patient despite the long wait.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຍັງ​ອົດ​ທົນ​ໄດ້​ເຖິງ​ວ່າ​ຕ້ອງ​ລໍ​ຖ້າ​ດົນ​ນານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເງິນບໍານານ
meaning list.sentence: He receives a pension after years of service.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບເງິນບໍານານຫຼັງຈາກການບໍລິການຫຼາຍປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖາວອນ, ຖາວອນ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They are looking for a permanent solution to the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາກໍາລັງຊອກຫາວິທີແກ້ໄຂຖາວອນຕໍ່ບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະ​ນຸ​ຍາດ​ໃຫ້
meaning list.sentence: The rules do not permit smoking in this area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດລະບຽບບໍ່ອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ສູບຢາໃນເຂດນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ອະນຸຍາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You need a permit to park here.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການໃບອະນຸຍາດຈອດຢູ່ທີ່ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ທັດສະນະ, ທັດສະນະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book provides a fresh perspective on the topic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ສະເໜີທັດສະນະໃໝ່ກ່ຽວກັບເລື່ອງດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວທີ, ເວທີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The project is in its final phase.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການແມ່ນຢູ່ໃນຂັ້ນຕອນສຸດທ້າຍຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫດການ, ຄວາມຈິງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The aurora borealis is a natural phenomenon.
meaning list.sentence translation: Aurora borealis ແມ່ນປະກົດການທໍາມະຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັດຊະຍາ
meaning list.sentence: Her philosophy emphasizes the importance of kindness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປັດຊະຍາຂອງລາວເນັ້ນຫນັກໃສ່ຄວາມສໍາຄັນຂອງຄວາມເມດຕາ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງເລືອກ, ຄວາມມັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The restaurant was a good pick for the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານອາຫານເປັນທາງເລືອກທີ່ດີສໍາລັບການປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິນຕະນາການ, ອະທິບາຍ
meaning list.sentence: She pictured herself living in a big city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈິນຕະນາການວ່າຕົນເອງອາໄສຢູ່ໃນເມືອງໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: stack (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a pile of books on the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີປຶ້ມຫຼາຍຫົວຢູ່ເທິງໂຕະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ້ອນກັນ
meaning list.sentence: They piled the boxes in the corner of the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ວາງ​ກ່ອງ​ຢູ່​ແຈ​ຂອງ​ຫ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາກສະຫນາມ, ພາກສະຫນາມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The football match was played on a muddy pitch.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຂ່ງຂັນບານເຕະໄດ້ຖືກຫຼີ້ນຢູ່ໃນສະຫນາມທີ່ມີຕົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຽງ, ສຽງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her voice has a high pitch.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງຂອງລາວມີສຽງສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຳມະດາ, ທຳມະດາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She prefers plain clothes over fancy ones.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງມັກເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງທີ່ລຽບງ່າຍແທນທີ່ຈະເປັນເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງທີ່ສົດໃສ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາງແຜນ, ການສົມຮູ້ຮ່ວມຄິດ
meaning list.sentence: They plotted a surprise party for their friend.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າວາງແຜນງານລ້ຽງແປກໃຈໃຫ້ໝູ່ຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ບວກ, ບວກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The temperature was a few degrees plus zero.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸນຫະພູມແມ່ນສອງສາມອົງສາສູງກວ່າສູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບວກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Add the numbers using the plus sign.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເພີ່ມຕົວເລກດ້ວຍເຄື່ອງໝາຍບວກ.

meaning list.meaning: ນອກຈາກນັ້ນ, ນອກຈາກນັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: She is a great singer, plus she plays the piano well.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນນັກຮ້ອງທີ່ດີ ແລະຍັງຫຼິ້ນເປຍໂນໄດ້ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຫຼມ, ແຫຼມ
meaning list.sentence: He used a pointed stick to draw in the sand.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໃຊ້​ໄມ້​ແຫຼມ​ແຕ້ມ​ໃນ​ດິນ​ຊາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ນິຍົມ, ມັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The actor's popularity increased after his latest movie.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມນິຍົມຂອງນັກສະແດງເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນກັບຮູບເງົາຫຼ້າສຸດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດບັນຫາ, ເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດບັນຫາ
meaning list.sentence: The new rules pose a challenge for small businesses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດລະບຽບໃຫມ່ສ້າງສິ່ງທ້າທາຍສໍາລັບທຸລະກິດຂະຫນາດນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາງ, ຕໍາແໜ່ງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The technician positioned the camera to capture the best angle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິຊາການໄດ້ວາງຕໍາແຫນ່ງກ້ອງຖ່າຍຮູບເພື່ອບັນທຶກມຸມທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານະການບວກ, ບວກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The test result was positive for the virus.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນ​ການ​ທົດ​ສອບ​ແມ່ນ​ມີ​ທາງ​ບວກ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ເຊື້ອ​ໄວຣ​ັ​ສ​.

meaning list.meaning: ມີ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: He possesses great talent in music.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີພອນສະຫວັນທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ໃນດົນຕີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນໄປໄດ້, probable (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: This investment has potential risks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລົງທຶນນີ້ມີຄວາມສ່ຽງທີ່ເປັນໄປໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ທ່າແຮງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has the potential to become a great artist.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີທ່າແຮງທີ່ຈະເປັນນັກສິລະປິນທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: to power, ປະຕິບັດການ
meaning list.sentence: The car is powered by an electric motor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດແມ່ນຂັບເຄື່ອນດ້ວຍມໍເຕີໄຟຟ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນລະເສີນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her work received high praise from her colleagues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກງານຂອງລາວໄດ້ຮັບການຍ້ອງຍໍສູງຈາກເພື່ອນຮ່ວມງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນລະເສີນ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher praised the students for their hard work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູ​ອາ​ຈານ​ໄດ້​ຍ້ອງ​ຍໍ​ຄວາມ​ພະ​ຍາ​ຍາມ​ຂອງ​ນັກ​ຮຽນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຖືພາ
meaning list.sentence: She announced that she was pregnant with twins.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງປະກາດວ່ານາງຖືພາລູກແຝດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການກະກຽມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The preparation for the event took several weeks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການກະກຽມສໍາລັບເຫດການໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການມີຢູ່, ການມີຢູ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her presence in the meeting made a significant impact.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະກົດຕົວຂອງລາວຢູ່ໃນກອງປະຊຸມໄດ້ມີຜົນກະທົບຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກປັກຮັກສາ, ປົກປັກຮັກສາ
meaning list.sentence: Efforts are being made to preserve the historic building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວມ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ພະຍາຍາມ​ເພື່ອ​ປົກ​ປັກ​ຮັກສາ​ສິ່ງ​ກໍ່ສ້າງ​ປະຫວັດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຄາ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The store has priced the new products competitively.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທາງຮ້ານໄດ້ປັບລາຄາສິນຄ້າໃໝ່ຢ່າງແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົ້ນຕໍ, ສໍາຄັນທີ່ສຸດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The prime reason for the delay was the weather.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫດຜົນຕົ້ນຕໍສໍາລັບການຊັກຊ້າແມ່ນສະພາບອາກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼັກການ, ຫຼັກການ
meaning list.sentence: She follows the principle of honesty in her work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະຕິບັດຕາມຫຼັກການຂອງຄວາມຊື່ສັດໃນການເຮັດວຽກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການພິມ, ຂຽນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book is available in both digital and print formats.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມແມ່ນມີຢູ່ໃນທັງຮູບແບບດິຈິຕອນ ແລະຮູບແບບພິມ.

meaning list.meaning: ບຸລິມະສິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Safety is our top priority.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມປອດໄພແມ່ນບຸລິມະສິດອັນດັບໜຶ່ງຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມລັບ, ຄວາມລັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She values her privacy and avoids sharing personal details online.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຫ້ຄຸນຄ່າຄວາມເປັນສ່ວນຕົວຂອງລາວແລະຫຼີກເວັ້ນການແບ່ງປັນຂໍ້ມູນສ່ວນບຸກຄົນອອນໄລນ໌.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັ້ນຕອນ, ການປະຕິບັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The procedure for applying for a visa is straightforward.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂັ້ນຕອນການຍື່ນຂໍວີຊາແມ່ນງ່າຍດາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: to process, to process (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: The company processes raw materials into finished products.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດປຸງແຕ່ງວັດຖຸດິບແລະປ່ຽນເປັນຜະລິດຕະພັນສໍາເລັດຮູບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜະລິດຕະພັນ, ການປູກພືດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The market sells fresh produce from local farms.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕະຫຼາດຂາຍຜະລິດຕະພັນສົດຈາກນິຄົມທ້ອງຖິ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ມືອາຊີບ, ຜູ້ຊ່ຽວຊານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a professional in the field of marketing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນມືອາຊີບໃນດ້ານການຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັດທະນາ, ພັດທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: The project is progressing according to the plan.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການແມ່ນມີຄວາມຄືບໜ້າຕາມແຜນການ.

meaning list.meaning: ວາງແຜນ, ສະທ້ອນ
meaning list.sentence: The company projects a 10% increase in sales for next year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດຄາດຄະເນການຂາຍເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ 10% ສໍາລັບປີຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼັກຖານ, ຫຼັກຖານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The lawyer presented new proof during the trial.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະ​ນາຍ​ຄວາມ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ເຫນີ​ຫຼັກ​ຖານ​ໃຫມ່​ໃນ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ການ​ທົດ​ລອງ​ໄດ້​.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ້ສະເໜີ, ຄຳແນະນຳ
meaning list.sentence: The committee will review the proposal next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະກໍາມະການຈະທົບທວນຄືນການສະເຫນີໃນອາທິດຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເໜີ, ສະເໜີ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He proposed a new plan to increase efficiency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ເໜີ​ແຜນການ​ໃໝ່​ເພື່ອ​ເພີ່ມ​ທະວີ​ການ​ປະ​ສິດທິ​ຜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເໜີ
meaning list.sentence: He proposed to her during a romantic dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ສະເຫນີໃຫ້ນາງໃນລະຫວ່າງການຄ່ໍາ romantic.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້, ຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The prospect of traveling abroad excites her.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມສົດໃສດ້ານທີ່ຈະເດີນທາງໄປຕ່າງປະເທດເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວຕື່ນເຕັ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປົກປ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The organization works to ensure the protection of endangered species.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງເຮັດວຽກເພື່ອຮັບປະກັນການປົກປ້ອງສັດທີ່ໃກ້ຈະສູນພັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກຈິດຕະວິທະຍາ
meaning list.sentence: She consulted a psychologist to help her manage stress.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປຶກສານັກຈິດຕະສາດເພື່ອຮັບມືກັບຄວາມກົດດັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິດຕະວິທະຍາ, ຈິດຕະວິທະຍາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is studying psychology at the university.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກໍາລັງຮຽນຈິດຕະວິທະຍາຢູ່ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ່ງພິມ, ການພິມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The publication of the book was delayed by several months.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການພິມຈຳໜ່າຍຂອງປຶ້ມດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຊັກຊ້າເປັນເວລາຫຼາຍເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກສຶກສາ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher asked her pupils to read the chapter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໃຫ້ນັກຮຽນອ່ານບົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກຮຽນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her pupils dilated in the dim light.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຮຽນຂອງລາວໄດ້ຂະຫຍາຍອອກໄປໃນແສງສະຫວ່າງທີ່ມືດມົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊື້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The receipt serves as proof of purchase.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃບຮັບເງິນໃຊ້ເປັນຫຼັກຖານຂອງການຊື້.

meaning list.sentence: She purchased a new laptop for her studies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊື້ຄອມພິວເຕີໂນດບຸກໃຫມ່ສໍາລັບການສຶກສາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິສຸດ
meaning list.sentence: The diamond is made of pure carbon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເພັດແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍຄາບອນບໍລິສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລ່ຕາມ, ໄລ່ຕາມ
meaning list.sentence: She decided to pursue a career in medicine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈເຮັດອາຊີບແພດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຄວາມຫຼາກຫຼາຍ, ກວມເອົາ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The prices range from $10 to $50.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຄາຕັ້ງແຕ່ $10 ຫາ $50.

meaning list.meaning: ແຖວ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The products are ranged on the shelves according to their categories.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນໄດ້ຖືກລະບຸໄວ້ໃນຊັ້ນວາງຕາມປະເພດຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັນດັບ, ອັນດັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He achieved the rank of captain in the army.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ຕໍາ​ແໜ່ງ​ເປັນ​ນາຍ​ເຮືອ​ໃນ​ກອງ​ທັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄັດ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The search engine ranks websites based on relevance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງຈັກຊອກຫາຈັດອັນດັບເວັບໄຊທ໌ໂດຍອີງໃສ່ຄວາມກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄວ, ໄວ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company experienced rapid growth last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປະສົບກັບການຂະຫຍາຍຕົວຢ່າງໄວວາໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໄວ, ດ່ວນ
meaning list.sentence: The population of the city is growing rapidly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາກອນຂອງເມືອງແມ່ນການຂະຫຍາຍຕົວຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະ​ເມີນ​ຜົນ​, ອັດ​ຕາ (verb​)
meaning list.sentence: The critics rated the movie highly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິຈານໃຫ້ຄະແນນຮູບເງົາສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ດິບ, ບໍ່ໄດ້ປຸງແຕ່ງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Raw vegetables are often healthier than cooked ones.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂດຍທົ່ວໄປແລ້ວຜັກດິບແມ່ນມີສຸຂະພາບດີກ່ວາຜັກທີ່ປຸງແຕ່ງແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າເຖິງ, ເຂົ້າເຖິງ
meaning list.sentence: The product is now within the reach of more customers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນໃນປັດຈຸບັນຢູ່ໃນການເຂົ້າເຖິງລູກຄ້າຫຼາຍຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິງ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her goals are realistic and achievable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເປົ້າຫມາຍຂອງພວກເຂົາແມ່ນຈິງແລະສາມາດບັນລຸໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມ​ເຫດ​ສົມ​ຜົນ​, ສົມ​ເຫດ​ສົມ​ຜົນ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: The price of the item seems reasonable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຄາຂອງຜະລິດຕະພັນເບິ່ງຄືວ່າສົມເຫດສົມຜົນ.

meaning list.sentence: I can’t recall the name of the restaurant we visited.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈື່ຊື່ຮ້ານອາຫານທີ່ພວກເຮົາໄປບໍ່ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ປິ່ນປົວ, ຟື້ນຟູ
meaning list.sentence: He is recovering from a serious illness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກໍາລັງຟື້ນຕົວຈາກພະຍາດຮ້າຍແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດລົງ, ຫຼຸດລົງ (noun)
meaning list.sentence: There has been a significant reduction in costs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການຫຼຸດຜ່ອນຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິຈາລະນາ
meaning list.sentence: He is highly regarded as a teacher.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບການເຄົາລົບນັບຖືເປັນຄູສອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຽດ, ຊື່ສຽງ
meaning list.sentence: She has great regard for her mentor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ເຄົາລົບ​ນັບຖື​ຕໍ່​ຜູ້​ແນະນຳ​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາກພື້ນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The regional office handles all local operations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງການພາກພື້ນຈັດການການດໍາເນີນງານໃນທ້ອງຖິ່ນທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົງທະບຽນ, ລົງທະບຽນ
meaning list.sentence: You need to register before attending the conference.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຕ້ອງລົງທະບຽນກ່ອນເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ທະບຽນ, ທະບຽນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her name is listed in the school register.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊື່ຂອງລາວແມ່ນຢູ່ໃນມ້ວນໂຮງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສຍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: She regrets not taking the job offer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເສຍໃຈທີ່ບໍ່ຍອມຮັບການສະເຫນີວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂສກເສົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: He expressed regret over his decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສະແດງຄວາມເສຍໃຈຕໍ່ການຕັດສິນໃຈຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະບຽບ, ລະບຽບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new regulation will affect all businesses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດລະບຽບໃຫມ່ຈະສົ່ງຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່ທຸລະກິດທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້ອນຂ້າງ, ປຽບທຽບ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The test was relatively easy compared to the previous one.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການທົດສອບແມ່ນຂ້ອນຂ້າງງ່າຍເມື່ອທຽບກັບຄັ້ງກ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ, ທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The lecture included relevant examples to help understand the topic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການບັນຍາຍປະກອບມີຕົວຢ່າງທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງເພື່ອຊ່ວຍເຂົ້າໃຈຫົວຂໍ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການບັນເທົາທຸກ, ການບັນເທົາທຸກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She felt a sense of relief after the exam was over.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກສະບາຍໃຈເມື່ອການສອບເສັງຈົບລົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄວ້​ວາງ​ໃຈ​, ອີງ​ໃສ່ (ຄໍາ​ກິ​ລິ​ຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: You can rely on her to complete the project on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດໄວ້ວາງໃຈໃຫ້ລາວສໍາເລັດໂຄງການຕາມເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຄິດເຫັນ, ຄວາມຄິດເຫັນ
meaning list.sentence: His remark about the movie was very insightful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການທົບທວນຄືນຂອງລາວກ່ຽວກັບຮູບເງົາແມ່ນ insightful ຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະແດງຄວາມເຫັນ, ເພື່ອສະແດງ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She remarked on the beauty of the sunset.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ໃຫ້ຂໍ້ສັງເກດກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມງາມຂອງ sunset ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວແທນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A representative from the company will attend the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົວແທນຈາກບໍລິສັດຈະເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວ​ແທນ​, ຕົວ​ຢ່າງ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: This sample is representative of the entire group.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົວຢ່າງນີ້ແມ່ນຕົວແທນຂອງກຸ່ມທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊື່ສຽງ, ຊື່ສຽງ
meaning list.sentence: The company has built a strong reputation for quality.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ສ້າງຊື່ສຽງທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງສໍາລັບຄຸນນະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຈໍາເປັນ, ເງື່ອນໄຂ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The main requirement for the job is a degree in engineering.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຕ້ອງການຕົ້ນຕໍສໍາລັບວຽກເຮັດງານທໍາແມ່ນລະດັບວິສະວະກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນທຶກ
meaning list.sentence: The firefighters rescued the family from the burning building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຫນ້າທີ່ດັບເພີງໄດ້ຊ່ວຍຊີວິດຄອບຄົວອອກຈາກອາຄານທີ່ຖືກໄຟໄຫມ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການຟື້ນຕົວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The rescue was carried out successfully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ກູ້​ໄພ​ໄດ້​ສຳ​ເລັດ​ຜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫງວນ, ການຈັດສັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hotel has a reserve of extra rooms for emergencies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງແຮມມີຫ້ອງພິເສດສະຫງວນໄວ້ສໍາລັບເຫດສຸກເສີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈອງ, ຈອງ
meaning list.sentence: I reserved a table at the restaurant for dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຈອງໂຕະຢູ່ຮ້ານອາຫານສໍາລັບຄ່ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫງົບ, ຄົນນັ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The residents of the apartment complex organized a meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວອາພາດເມັນໄດ້ຈັດກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັ້ງຖິ່ນຖານ, ທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ (ນາມສະກຸນ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a resident doctor at the local hospital.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນທ່ານໝໍຢູ່ໂຮງໝໍທ້ອງຖິ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ານ, ຕ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: He resisted the temptation to eat the cake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕໍ່ຕ້ານຄວາມຢາກກິນເຄັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ້ໄຂ, ຕັດສິນໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: They resolved the issue through negotiation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາໂດຍຜ່ານການເຈລະຈາ.

meaning list.meaning: ປາຍທາງວັນພັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We stayed at a beautiful resort by the sea.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາພັກຢູ່ໃນລີສອດທີ່ສວຍງາມຢູ່ແຄມທະເລ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັກສາ, ຮັກສາ
meaning list.sentence: The company aims to retain its best employees.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດມີຈຸດປະສົງເພື່ອຮັກສາພະນັກງານທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີດເຜີຍ, ເປີດເຜີຍ
meaning list.sentence: The investigation revealed new details about the case.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສືບສວນໄດ້ເປີດເຜີຍລາຍລະອຽດໃຫມ່ກ່ຽວກັບກໍລະນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິວັດ
meaning list.sentence: The industrial revolution changed society profoundly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ປະ​ຕິ​ວັດ​ອຸດ​ສາ​ຫະ​ກໍາ​ໄດ້​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ສັງ​ຄົມ​ຢ່າງ​ເລິກ​ເຊິ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາງວັນ
meaning list.sentence: She received a reward for her hard work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບລາງວັນສໍາລັບການເຮັດວຽກຫນັກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ລາງວັນ
meaning list.sentence: The company rewarded its employees with bonuses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ໃຫ້ລາງວັນແກ່ພະນັກງານຂອງຕົນດ້ວຍໂບນັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັງຫວະ, ຄວາມກົມກຽວກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The song has a catchy rhythm that everyone loves.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເພງມີຈັງຫວະທີ່ຈັບໃຈທີ່ທຸກຄົນມັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ກໍາຈັດ, ຊໍາລະ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She managed to rid her garden of weeds.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ກຳຈັດ​ຫຍ້າ​ໃນ​ສວນ​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮາກ, ຮາກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The tree's roots spread deep into the soil.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮາກຂອງຕົ້ນໄມ້ແຜ່ເລິກເຂົ້າໄປໃນດິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົມ, ຮູບກົມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The contestants completed three rounds of the competition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ເຂົ້າແຂ່ງຂັນໄດ້ສໍາເລັດສາມຮອບຂອງການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຈໍາວັນ, ທໍາມະດາ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her routine tasks include checking emails in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກງານປະຈໍາວັນຂອງນາງລວມມີການກວດສອບອີເມລ໌ໃນຕອນເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: rub, rub (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: He rubbed his hands together to keep them warm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຖູ​ມື​ໃສ່​ກັນ​ເພື່ອ​ໃຫ້​ຄວາມ​ອົບ​ອຸ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢາງພາລາ
meaning list.sentence: The tires are made of durable rubber.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢາງແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍຢາງທີ່ທົນທານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢາງພາລາ
meaning list.sentence: He wore rubber boots to walk in the rain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃສ່ເກີບຢາງພາລາຍ່າງໃນຝົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົນນະບົດ, ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບບ້ານ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She grew up in a rural village far from the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຕີບໃຫຍ່ຢູ່ໃນບ້ານຊົນນະບົດທີ່ຫ່າງໄກຈາກຕົວເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຟ້າວ, ຟ້າວ
meaning list.sentence: We had to rush to catch the train.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງຟ້າວໄປຈັບລົດໄຟ.

meaning list.meaning: Ace, rush (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The morning rush hour traffic was unbearable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊົ່ວໂມງເລັ່ງດ່ວນໃນຕອນເຊົ້າແມ່ນບໍ່ສາມາດທົນໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາຕົວຢ່າງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist sampled the water to test for pollutants.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ເອົາຕົວຢ່າງຂອງນ້ໍາເພື່ອທົດສອບການປົນເປື້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ດາວທຽມ
meaning list.sentence: The satellite sent back images of the Earth from space.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດາວ​ທຽມ​ສົ່ງ​ຮູບ​ພາບ​ຂອງ​ໜ່ວຍ​ໂລກ​ຄືນ​ມາ​ຈາກ​ອາ​ວະ​ກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພໍໃຈ, ພໍໃຈ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was satisfied with the results of the exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພໍໃຈກັບຜົນການສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພໍໃຈ, ພໍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The product satisfied all the customer's needs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນຕອບສະຫນອງຄວາມຕ້ອງການຂອງລູກຄ້າທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເງິນຝາກປະຢັດ
meaning list.sentence: Switching to energy-efficient appliances can lead to significant savings.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປ່ຽນໄປໃຊ້ເຄື່ອງໃຊ້ພະລັງງານທີ່ມີປະສິດທິພາບສາມາດນໍາໄປສູ່ການປະຫຍັດທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະຫນາດ, ຂະຫນາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The map uses a scale of 1:100,000.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນທີ່ໃຊ້ຂະຫນາດ 1: 100,000.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອກຳນົດເວລາ, ກຳນົດເວລາ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The meeting is scheduled for next Monday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ກໍາ​ນົດ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ວັນ​ຈັນ​ມື້​ຕໍ່​ໄປ​.

meaning list.meaning: ແຜນການ, ຄໍາສັ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government introduced a new scheme to improve education.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດ​ຖະ​ບານ​ໄດ້​ນໍາ​ສະ​ເຫນີ​ແຜນ​ການ​ໃຫມ່​ເພື່ອ​ປັບ​ປຸງ​ການ​ສຶກ​ສາ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: She screamed when she saw the spider.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮ້ອງອອກມາເມື່ອລາວເຫັນແມງມຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A loud scream echoed through the forest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງຮ້ອງດັງດັງດັງໄປທົ່ວປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: to show, to scan (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: All passengers were screened for security purposes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ໂດຍສານທັງໝົດໄດ້ຖືກກວດກາເພື່ອຈຸດປະສົງຄວາມປອດໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັ່ງລົງ
meaning list.sentence: The usher seated the guests before the show started.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະນັກງານນັ່ງນັ່ງໃຫ້ແຂກກ່ອນການສະແດງເລີ່ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະ​ແຫນງ​ການ​, ພາກ​ສະ​ຫນາມ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The technology sector is growing rapidly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂະ​ແຫນງ​ເຕັກ​ໂນ​ໂລ​ຊີ​ມີ​ການ​ຂະ​ຫຍາຍ​ຕົວ​ຢ່າງ​ວ່ອງ​ໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບປະກັນ, ຮັບປະກັນ
meaning list.sentence: He secured the door before leaving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ຮັບປະກັນປະຕູກ່ອນທີ່ຈະອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ປອດໄພ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This area is considered very secure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນທີ່ນີ້ຖືວ່າປອດໄພຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະແຫວງຫາ, ໄລ່ຕາມ
meaning list.sentence: He is seeking a new job in the tech industry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊອກຫາວຽກໃຫມ່ໃນອຸດສາຫະກໍາເຕັກໂນໂລຢີ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເລືອກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Please select the appropriate option from the list.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາເລືອກທາງເລືອກທີ່ເຫມາະສົມຈາກບັນຊີລາຍຊື່.

meaning list.meaning: ການເລືອກ, ການເລືອກ
meaning list.sentence: The selection of the winner was based on public votes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຄັດເລືອກຜູ້ຊະນະແມ່ນອີງໃສ່ການລົງຄະແນນສຽງຂອງປະຊາຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົນເອງ, ຕົນເອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He discovered his true self during the journey.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນລະຫວ່າງການເດີນທາງ, ລາວໄດ້ຄົ້ນພົບຕົວຕົນທີ່ແທ້ຈິງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາວຸໂສ, ຊັ້ນສູງ
meaning list.sentence: She holds a senior position in the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖືຕໍາແຫນ່ງອາວຸໂສໃນບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູ້ສຶກ, ຮັບຮູ້
meaning list.sentence: He sensed that something was wrong.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກວ່າມີບາງຢ່າງຜິດພາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນໄຫວ, ອ່ອນໄຫວ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her skin is very sensitive to sunlight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜິວໜັງຂອງລາວມີຄວາມອ່ອນໄຫວຕໍ່ກັບແສງແດດຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດສິນລົງໂທດ
meaning list.sentence: The judge sentenced him to five years in prison.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ພິພາກສາ​ໄດ້​ຕັດສິນ​ລົງ​ໂທດ​ໃຫ້​ຕິດ​ຄຸກ 5 ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ລຳດັບ, ຊຸດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The events unfolded in a logical sequence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫດການໄດ້ເປີດເຜີຍໃນລໍາດັບຢ່າງມີເຫດຜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: Session, Session (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The training session lasted for three hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຝຶກອົບຮົມໃຊ້ເວລາສາມຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກລົງ, ຕັ້ງຖິ່ນຖານ
meaning list.sentence: They settled in a small town after retirement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກກິນເບັ້ຍບໍານານ, ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຕັ້ງຖິ່ນຖານຢູ່ໃນຕົວເມືອງຂະຫນາດນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮຸນແຮງ, ຮ້າຍແຮງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The storm caused severe damage to the area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາຍຸ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຄວາມ​ເສຍ​ຫາຍ​ຢ່າງ​ໜັກໜ່ວງ​ໃນ​ພາກ​ພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮົ່ມ, ໂຕນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We sat under the shade of a large tree.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົານັ່ງຢູ່ໃຕ້ຮົ່ມຕົ້ນໄມ້ໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເງົາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The tree cast a long shadow on the ground.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົ້ນ​ໄມ້​ໄດ້​ໂຍນ​ເງົາ​ຍາວ​ລົງ​ເທິງ​ພື້ນ​ດິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນ້ຳຕື້ນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The water is shallow near the shore.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ຳໃກ້ຝັ່ງແມ່ນຕື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມອັບອາຍ, ຄວາມອັບອາຍ
meaning list.sentence: It’s a shame that he couldn’t attend the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນຄວາມອັບອາຍທີ່ລາວບໍ່ສາມາດເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກອງປະຊຸມໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບຮ່າງ, ຮູບຮ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: The artist shaped the clay into a beautiful vase.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ສິລະ​ປິນ​ໄດ້​ປັ້ນດິນ​ເຜົາ​ໃຫ້​ເປັນ​ກະ​ຕຸກ​ທີ່​ສວຍ​ງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ພັກອາໄສ, ທີ່ພັກອາໄສ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They found shelter from the storm in a small cabin.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ພົບ​ເຫັນ​ທີ່​ພັກ​ອາ​ໄສ​ຈາກ​ພະ​ຍຸ​ຢູ່​ໃນ hut ຂະ​ຫນາດ​ນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່​ພັກ​ອາ​ໄສ, ປົກ​ປັກ​ຮັກ​ສາ
meaning list.sentence: The cave sheltered them from the heavy rain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້ໍາໄດ້ປົກປ້ອງພວກເຂົາຈາກຝົນຕົກຫນັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນ, ປ່ຽນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She shifted her focus to more important tasks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຫັນ​ຄວາມ​ສົນ​ໃຈ​ໄປ​ຫາ​ວຽກ​ງານ​ທີ່​ສຳຄັນ​ກວ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົ່ງ, ສົ່ງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The company ships its products worldwide.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດສົ່ງຜະລິດຕະພັນຂອງຕົນໄປທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ໊ອກ, ກະທົບກະເທືອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The news came as a shock to everyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ່າວ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ເກີດ​ຄວາມ​ຕື່ນ​ຕົກ​ໃຈ​ກັບ​ທຸກ​ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັ່ນ, ສັ່ນ
meaning list.sentence: The sudden announcement shocked the audience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະກາດຢ່າງກະທັນຫັນເຮັດໃຫ້ຜູ້ຊົມຕົກໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກໃຈ, ຕົກໃຈ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was shocked to hear the unexpected news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕົກໃຈທີ່ໄດ້ຍິນຂ່າວທີ່ບໍ່ຄາດຄິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍິງ, ຍິງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The shooting of the movie took several months.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຖ່າຍທຳໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍິງ, ຍິງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He made an incredible shot during the basketball game.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຍິງຢ່າງບໍ່ໜ້າເຊື່ອໃນເກມບ້ວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳຄັນ, ໜ້າສັງເກດ
meaning list.sentence: This discovery is a significant step forward in medicine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຄົ້ນພົບນີ້ແມ່ນຄວາມກ້າວຫນ້າທີ່ສໍາຄັນໃນຢາປົວພະຍາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງ​ຫຼວງ​ຫຼາຍ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: The company’s profits have increased significantly this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກໍາໄລຂອງບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ງຽບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The silence in the library was calming.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມງຽບຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງສະໝຸດໄດ້ຜ່ອນຄາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ້າໄໝ
meaning list.sentence: The scarf is made of pure silk.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜ້າບວມແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍຜ້າໄຫມບໍລິສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິງໃຈ, ຈິງໃຈ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She gave a sincere apology for her mistake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຂໍໂທດຢ່າງຈິງໃຈສໍາລັບຄວາມຜິດພາດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້າທາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The museum has an exhibit on the history of slaves.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນມີງານວາງສະແດງກ່ຽວກັບປະຫວັດສາດຂອງຂ້າທາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເລື່ອນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The kids slid down the snowy hill.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ເລື່ອນລົງຈາກພູຫິມະ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໄລ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The children enjoyed the water slide at the park.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍມັກສະໄລ້ນ້ໍາໃນສວນສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນ, ນ້ອຍ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a slight change in the schedule.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການປ່ຽນແປງເລັກນ້ອຍໃນໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົ້ມ, ລົ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: She slipped on the wet floor and fell.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ລົ້ມ​ລົງ​ເທິງ​ພື້ນ​ທີ່​ປຽກ​ຊຸ່ມ​ແລະ​ລົ້ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ້ອຍ, ຄ້ອຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The slope of the hill makes it perfect for skiing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເນີນພູແມ່ນດີເລີດສໍາລັບການສະກີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປີ້ນພູ
meaning list.sentence: The road slopes gently down to the river.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫົນທາງໄດ້ຄ້ອຍໄປທາງແມ່ນໍ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວກັບແສງຕາເວັນ, ພະລັງງານແສງຕາເວັນ
meaning list.sentence: The house is equipped with solar panels.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອນໄດ້ຖືກຕິດຕັ້ງດ້ວຍແຜງແສງອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາງຢ່າງ, ບາງສ່ວນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The task was somewhat difficult but manageable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກງານແມ່ນມີຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກເລັກນ້ອຍແຕ່ສາມາດຈັດການໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ວິນຍານ, ວິນຍານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Music is often considered the soul of a culture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດົນຕີມັກຈະຖືວ່າເປັນຈິດວິນຍານຂອງວັດທະນະທໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່ຽວຊານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a specialist in environmental science.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ຊ່ຽວຊານດ້ານວິທະຍາສາດສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ອງການຄວາມຊໍານານ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hospital provides specialist care for rare diseases.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງຫມໍໃຫ້ການດູແລພິເສດສໍາລັບພະຍາດທີ່ຫາຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊະນິດ, ສະກຸນ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: Many plant species are found only in this region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພືດຊະນິດຕ່າງໆແມ່ນພົບເຫັນຢູ່ໃນພາກພື້ນນີ້ເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລັ່ງ, ເລັ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: The new software speeds up data processing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊອບແວໃຫມ່ເລັ່ງການປະມວນຜົນຂໍ້ມູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງວິນຍານ, ທາງວິນຍານ
meaning list.sentence: Yoga is often practiced for spiritual well-being.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຍຄະມັກຈະເຮັດເພື່ອຄວາມສຸກທາງວິນຍານ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຍກ, ແຍກ
meaning list.sentence: They split the profits equally among the team members.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາແບ່ງຜົນກໍາໄລເທົ່າທຽມກັນລະຫວ່າງສະມາຊິກໃນທີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ແບ່ງ​ແຍກ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: There was a split in the political party over the issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີ​ການ​ແບ່ງ​ແຍກ​ພັກ​ການ​ເມືອງ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ບັນຫາ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໜັບສະໜູນ, ສະໜັບສະໜຸນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The company sponsored the event to promote its brand.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວເພື່ອສົ່ງເສີມຍີ່ຫໍ້ຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ, ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The event had multiple sponsors, including local businesses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີ​ຜູ້​ອຸປະຖຳ​ຫຼາຍ​ຄົນ​ໃນ​ງານ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ, ລວມທັງ​ບັນດາ​ນັກທຸລະກິດ​ທ້ອງ​ຖິ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັງເກດເຫັນ, ເພື່ອເບິ່ງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She spotted her friend in the crowd.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສັງເກດເຫັນຫມູ່ຂອງລາວຢູ່ໃນຝູງຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຜ່ກະຈາຍ, ການແຜ່ກະຈາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The spread of the disease was rapid.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຜ່ລະບາດຂອງພະຍາດແມ່ນໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຳນົດ, ຄົງທີ່ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The patient's condition is now stable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂະນະ​ນີ້ ສະພາບ​ຂອງ​ຄົນເຈັບ​ແມ່ນ​ໝັ້ນຄົງ.

meaning list.meaning: to stage, ການຈັດລຽງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The theater group staged a new play last weekend.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຸ່ມສະແດງລະຄອນໄດ້ສະແດງລະຄອນໃຫມ່ໃນອາທິດທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານະການ, ທ່າທີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company took a strong stand on environmental issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປະຕິບັດຢ່າງເຂັ້ມງວດກ່ຽວກັບບັນຫາສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນມເບິ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: He stared at the painting for a long time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເບິ່ງຮູບແຕ້ມເປັນເວລາດົນນານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານະພາບ, ສະຖານະພາບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The status of the project is still uncertain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານະຂອງໂຄງການຍັງບໍ່ຈະແຈ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົງທີ່, ປົກກະຕິ
meaning list.sentence: He has shown steady improvement in his grades.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນການປັບປຸງຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງໃນຊັ້ນຮຽນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫຼັກກ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The building’s structure is made of steel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງສ້າງຂອງອາຄານແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍເຫຼັກກ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັນ, ຊັນ
meaning list.sentence: The mountain has very steep slopes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພູມີຄ້ອຍຊັນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າວ
meaning list.sentence: She stepped carefully on the icy pavement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຍ່າງ​ຢ່າງ​ລະມັດລະວັງ​ຢູ່​ເທິງ​ທາງ​ຍ່າງ​ທີ່​ໜາວ​ເຢັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜຽວ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The glue left a sticky residue on the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກາວໄດ້ປະໄວ້ສິ່ງເສດເຫຼືອທີ່ຫນຽວຢູ່ເທິງໂຕະ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຂງ, ແຂງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His muscles were stiff after the workout.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກ້າມຊີ້ນຂອງລາວແຂງກະດ້າງຫຼັງຈາກອອກກໍາລັງກາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຸ້ນ, ຫຸ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company increased its stock levels to meet demand.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເພີ່ມລະດັບຫຼັກຊັບຂອງຕົນເພື່ອຕອບສະຫນອງຄວາມຕ້ອງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະແສ, ກະແສ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They crossed a small stream during their hike.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນລະຫວ່າງການຍ່າງຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ, ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຂ້າມນ້ໍາຂະຫນາດນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍືດ, ຂະຫຍາຍ
meaning list.sentence: She stretched her arms before starting the exercise.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ stretched ແຂນຂອງລາວກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເລີ່ມຕົ້ນການອອກກໍາລັງກາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: tension, stretch (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a long stretch of road with no buildings.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີເສັ້ນທາງຍາວໄກ ບໍ່ມີຕຶກອາຄານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄັ່ງຄັດ, ເຄັ່ງຄັດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The school has strict rules about attendance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງຮຽນມີກົດລະບຽບທີ່ເຂັ້ມງວດກ່ຽວກັບການເຂົ້າຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕີ, ຕີ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The player struck the ball with great force.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ນຕີລູກດ້ວຍກໍາລັງທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຈມຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The workers went on strike to demand better wages.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນງານພາກັນປະທ້ວງ ຮຽກຮ້ອງຄ່າແຮງງານທີ່ດີຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄງສ້າງ, ການຈັດລະບຽບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The course is structured to help students learn step by step.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັກສູດດັ່ງກ່າວແມ່ນມີໂຄງສ້າງເພື່ອຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ນັກຮຽນຮຽນຮູ້ເປັນຂັ້ນຕອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະຍາຍາມ, ພະຍາຍາມ
meaning list.sentence: He struggled to finish his assignment on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ພະຍາຍາມ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ໃຫ້​ສຳເລັດ​ຕາມ​ເວລາ​ກຳນົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມພະຍາຍາມ, ຄວາມພະຍາຍາມ
meaning list.sentence: The struggle for independence was long and difficult.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕໍ່ສູ້ເພື່ອເອກະລາດແມ່ນຍາວນານແລະຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕຳ, ຕື່ມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She stuffed her bag with books before leaving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເອົາ​ປຶ້ມ​ໃສ່​ຖົງ​ເຕັມ​ກ່ອນ​ອອກ​ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂຶ້ນກັບ, ຫົວຂໍ້ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The offer is subject to approval by the management.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ສະເໜີແມ່ນຂຶ້ນກັບການອະນຸມັດຈາກການຈັດການ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົ່ງ, ນຳສະເໜີ
meaning list.sentence: Please submit your application before the deadline.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາສົ່ງໃບສະໝັກຂອງເຈົ້າກ່ອນກຳນົດເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັງໝົດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The sum of the two numbers is 50.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນລວມຂອງສອງຕົວເລກແມ່ນ 50.

meaning list.meaning: ລວບລວມ, ສະຫຼຸບ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He summed up the main points of the discussion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ສະຫຼຸບຈຸດຕົ້ນຕໍຂອງການສົນທະນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຜ່າຕັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The patient underwent major surgery last week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນເຈັບໄດ້ຮັບການຜ່າຕັດໃຫຍ່ໃນອາທິດທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ້ອມຮອບ, ອ້ອມຮອບ
meaning list.sentence: The garden is surrounded by a wooden fence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສວນແມ່ນອ້ອມຮອບດ້ວຍຮົ້ວໄມ້.

meaning list.meaning: ອ້ອມຮອບ, ອ້ອມຮອບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The surrounding mountains are covered with snow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພູເຂົາທີ່ອ້ອມຮອບແມ່ນປົກຄຸມດ້ວຍຫິມະ.

meaning list.meaning: ກວດກາ, ກວດກາ
meaning list.sentence: The company surveyed customer satisfaction.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຄົ້ນຄວ້າຄວາມພໍໃຈຂອງລູກຄ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງໃສ
meaning list.sentence: The police suspect him of theft.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳ​ຫຼວດ​ສົງ​ໄສ​ວ່າ​ລາວ​ຖືກ​ລັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງໃສ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The suspect was taken into custody for questioning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຕ້ອງສົງໄສໄດ້ຖືກກັກຕົວເພື່ອສອບຖາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາບານ
meaning list.sentence: She swore to tell the truth in court.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສາບານທີ່ຈະບອກຄວາມຈິງໃນສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາບານ
meaning list.sentence: He swore loudly when he hit his thumb with a hammer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ສາບ​ແຊ່ງ​ສຽງ​ດັງ​ເມື່ອ​ຄ້ອນ​ຕີ​ໂປ້​ມື​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກວາດ, ກວາດ
meaning list.sentence: She swept the floor after dinner.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກວາດພື້ນຫຼັງຄ່ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄີ, ປ່ຽນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The light switch is located near the door.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະວິດໄຟຕັ້ງຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບປະຕູ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງສານ, ຄວາມສົງສານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She expressed her sympathy for the victims of the disaster.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະແດງຄວາມເຫັນອົກເຫັນໃຈຕໍ່ຜູ້ປະສົບໄພພິບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ນິທານ, ນິທານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The grandmother told the children a tale about a brave knight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແມ່ຕູ້ໄດ້ເລົ່ານິທານໃຫ້ເດັກນ້ອຍຟັງກ່ຽວກັບ knight ທີ່ກ້າຫານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖັງ, ສາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The water tank on the roof was almost empty.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖັງນ້ຳເທິງຫຼັງຄາເກືອບໝົດແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ມຸ່ງ, ມຸ່ງໝາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The marketing campaign targets young adults.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໂຄສະນາການຕະຫຼາດເປົ້າຫມາຍໄວຫນຸ່ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈີກ
meaning list.sentence: She tore the letter into pieces after reading it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ອ່ານ​ຈົດ​ໝາຍ​ແລ້ວ, ລາວ​ກໍ​ຈີກ​ເປັນ​ຕ່ອນໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ນ້ຳຕາ
meaning list.sentence: Tears rolled down her cheeks as she spoke.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນໍ້າຕາໄຫລລົງແກ້ມຂອງລາວໃນຂະນະທີ່ລາວເວົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົ່ວຄາວ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This is a temporary solution until a permanent one is found.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນການແກ້ໄຂຊົ່ວຄາວຈົນກວ່າຈະພົບເຫັນການແກ້ໄຂຖາວອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊື່, ສະແດງອອກ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: They termed the project a success after its completion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ເອີ້ນ​ໂຄງ​ການ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ວ່າ​ສໍາ​ເລັດ​ຜົນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ການປິ່ນປົວ, ການປິ່ນປົວ
meaning list.sentence: He is undergoing therapy to deal with his anxiety.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບການປິ່ນປົວເພື່ອເອົາຊະນະຄວາມກັງວົນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄພຂົ່ມຂູ່, ອັນຕະລາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The storm posed a threat to the coastal areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາຍຸ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ເປັນ​ໄພ​ຂົ່ມຂູ່​ຕໍ່​ເຂດ​ແຄມ​ທະ​ເລ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂົ່ມຂູ່
meaning list.sentence: The criminal threatened the witness to remain silent.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະດີອາຍາໄດ້ຂົ່ມຂູ່ພະຍານໃຫ້ມິດງຽບ.

meaning list.meaning: ດັ່ງນັ້ນ, ດັ່ງນັ້ນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The evidence was not credible, thus the case was dismissed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັກຖານບໍ່ຫນ້າເຊື່ອຖື, ດັ່ງນັ້ນກໍລະນີດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖືກຍົກຟ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຳນົດເວລາ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The runner timed his sprint perfectly to win the race.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກແລ່ນໄດ້ກໍານົດເວລາການແລ່ນຂອງລາວຢ່າງສົມບູນເພື່ອຊະນະການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກັບຫົວຂໍ້, ຊື່ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She titled her book 'The Journey of Life'.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໃຫ້​ຫົວ​ຂໍ້​ວ່າ 'ການ​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ຂອງ​ຊີວິດ'.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຕນ, ແບບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The tone of the letter was formal and polite.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຕນຂອງຈົດໝາຍແມ່ນເປັນທາງການ ແລະສຸພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຂງ, ທົນທານ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The exam was tough, but she managed to pass.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ສອບ​ເສັງ​ແມ່ນ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ຫຍຸ້ງ​ຍາກ​ແຕ່​ເຂົາ​ສາ​ມາດ​ຜ່ານ​ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຕິດຕາມ, ສັງເກດເບິ່ງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The app tracks your daily steps and activity.
meaning list.sentence translation: app ຕິດຕາມຂັ້ນຕອນປະຈໍາວັນແລະກິດຈະກໍາຂອງທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ພົກພາ, ໂອນ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: She transferred the files to a USB drive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂອນໄຟລ໌ໄປຫາ USB drive.

meaning list.meaning: ໂອນ, ໂອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The transfer of funds was completed successfully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໂອນເງິນສຳເລັດແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນແປງ, ປ່ຽນແປງ
meaning list.sentence: The renovation transformed the old house into a modern home.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ສ້ອມ​ແປງ​ປ່ຽນ​ເຮືອນ​ເກົ່າ​ໃຫ້​ກາຍ​ເປັນ​ເຮືອນ​ທັນ​ສະ​ໄໝ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປ່ຽນແປງ, ການປ່ຽນແປງ
meaning list.sentence: The transition from high school to university can be challenging.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຫັນປ່ຽນຈາກໂຮງຮຽນມັດທະຍົມໄປວິທະຍາໄລສາມາດເປັນສິ່ງທ້າທາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການທົດລອງ, ການທົດລອງ
meaning list.sentence: The trial for the accused began yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ຄະດີ​ຕໍ່​ຈຳ​ເລີຍ​ໄດ້​ເລີ່​ມດຳ​ເນີນ​ໃນ​ມື້​ວານ​ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສະດຸດ, ລົ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: She tripped on the carpet and fell.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຍ່າງ​ເທິງ​ຜ້າ​ພົມ​ແລະ​ລົ້ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂດຮ້ອນ, ເປັນຂອງສະພາບອາກາດຮ້ອນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They are planning a vacation to a tropical island.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາ ກຳ ລັງວາງແຜນການພັກຜ່ອນທີ່ເກາະເຂດຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບກວນ, ເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດບັນຫາ
meaning list.sentence: The noise from the construction site troubled her sleep.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງຈາກບ່ອນກໍ່ສ້າງລົບກວນການນອນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ແທ້ໆ, ແທ້ໆ (ຄຳສຸພາສິດ)
meaning list.sentence: She truly believes in the importance of education.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຊື່ອຢ່າງແທ້ຈິງໃນຄວາມສໍາຄັນຂອງການສຶກສາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໄວ້ວາງໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: Trust is the foundation of any strong relationship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມໄວ້ວາງໃຈແມ່ນພື້ນຖານຂອງທຸກໆຄວາມສໍາພັນທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄວ້ໃຈ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: You can trust her with any secret.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດເຊື່ອລາວດ້ວຍຄວາມລັບໃດໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ການທົດລອງ, ພະຍາຍາມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Give it another try if it doesn’t work the first time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້າມັນບໍ່ໄດ້ຜົນໃນຄັ້ງທໍາອິດ, ລອງອີກຄັ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: Melody, melody (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She hummed a cheerful tune while cooking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຮ້ອງ​ເພງ​ມ່ວນ​ຊື່ນ​ໃນ​ຂະນະ​ທີ່​ກຳລັງ​ແຕ່ງ​ກິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸໂມງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The train passed through a long tunnel under the mountain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດໄຟໄດ້ຜ່ານອຸໂມງຍາວໃຕ້ພູເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸດທ້າຍ, ສຸດທ້າຍ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: Ultimately, the decision is up to you.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນທີ່ສຸດ, ການຕັດສິນໃຈແມ່ນຂຶ້ນກັບທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: unconscious, unconscious (ຄໍາຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He was unconscious after the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເສຍສະຕິຫຼັງຈາກອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່​ໄດ້​ຄາດ​ຫວັງ, ທັນ​ທີ​ທັນ​ໃດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The storm was unexpected and caught everyone off guard.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາຍຸ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ບໍ່​ໄດ້​ຄາດ​ຄິດ ແລະ​ໄດ້​ພາ​ໃຫ້​ທຸກ​ຄົນ​ເຝົ້າ​ລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນເອກະລັກ, ເປັນເອກະລັກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Her voice has a unique quality that stands out.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງຂອງລາວມີລັກສະນະພິເສດທີ່ໂດດເດັ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັກກະວານ, ຈັກກະວານ
meaning list.sentence: The universe is vast and full of mysteries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈັກກະວານກວ້າງໃຫຍ່ ແລະເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍຄວາມລຶກລັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ຮູ້, ບໍ່ຮູ້ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The cause of the problem remains unknown.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາເຫດຂອງບັນຫາຍັງບໍ່ຮູ້ຈັກເທື່ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້າງເທິງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The upper floor of the building is reserved for offices.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊັ້ນເທິງຂອງອາຄານແມ່ນສະຫງວນໄວ້ສໍາລັບຫ້ອງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The balloon floated upwards into the sky.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປູມເປົ້າໄດ້ລຸກຂຶ້ນສູ່ທ້ອງຟ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: urban, ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ຕົວ​ເມືອງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Urban areas tend to have more amenities than rural ones.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂດຕົວເມືອງມີໂອກາດຫຼາຍກວ່າເຂດຊົນນະບົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈູດ, ຊຸກຍູ້
meaning list.sentence: He urged his team to complete the project on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຊຸກຍູ້ທີມງານຂອງລາວໃຫ້ສໍາເລັດໂຄງການຕາມເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: to value, ການ​ຄາດ​ຄະ​ເນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She values honesty in her friendships.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃຫ້ຄຸນຄ່າຄວາມຊື່ສັດໃນມິດຕະພາບຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນແປງ, to vary (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The prices of these products vary depending on quality.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຄາຂອງຜະລິດຕະພັນເຫຼົ່ານີ້ແຕກຕ່າງກັນໄປຕາມຄຸນນະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫຍ່, ໃຫຍ່ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The vast desert stretched as far as the eye could see.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະ​ເລ​ຊາຍ​ທີ່​ກວ້າງ​ໃຫຍ່​ໄດ້​ຍືດ​ຍາວ​ເທົ່າ​ທີ່​ຕາ​ສາ​ມາດ​ເບິ່ງ​ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານທີ່, ສະຖານທີ່
meaning list.sentence: The concert venue was packed with fans.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານທີ່ຄອນເສີດແມ່ນເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍແຟນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ
meaning list.sentence: He was standing at the very edge of the cliff.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຢືນ​ຢູ່​ແຄມ​ໜ້າຜາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ່ານ, ຜ່ານ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: We traveled to the city via train.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄປເມືອງໂດຍລົດໄຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຊຊະນະ
meaning list.sentence: The team celebrated their victory after the final match.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານໄດ້ສະຫຼອງໄຊຊະນະຂອງພວກເຂົາຫຼັງຈາກການແຂ່ງຂັນສຸດທ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮຸນແຮງ
meaning list.sentence: The government is taking measures to reduce violence in the community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານກໍາລັງໃຊ້ມາດຕະການເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນຄວາມຮຸນແຮງໃນຊຸມຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: Virtual, ເກືອບ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company hosted a virtual meeting for employees worldwide.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຈັດກອງປະຊຸມ virtual ສໍາລັບພະນັກງານໃນທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິໄສທັດ, ວິໄສທັດ (ນາມ)
