meaning list.sentence: Her vision for the project was both innovative and practical.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວິໄສທັດຂອງລາວສໍາລັບໂຄງການແມ່ນທັງປະດິດສ້າງແລະການປະຕິບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: Visual, visible (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The presentation included many visual aids to explain the concept.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການນໍາສະເຫນີປະກອບມີການຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອດ້ານສາຍຕາຈໍານວນຫຼາຍເພື່ອອະທິບາຍແນວຄວາມຄິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳຄັນ, ສຳຄັນ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Water is vital for all forms of life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ໍາແມ່ນສໍາຄັນຕໍ່ທຸກຮູບແບບຂອງຊີວິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິຕາມິນ
meaning list.sentence: Fruits and vegetables are rich in essential vitamins.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫມາກໄມ້ແລະຜັກແມ່ນອຸດົມສົມບູນໃນວິຕາມິນທີ່ຈໍາເປັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະດັບສຽງ, ລະດັບສຽງ
meaning list.sentence: The volume of the container is measured in liters.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະລິມານຂອງບັນຈຸແມ່ນວັດແທກເປັນລິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່າຈ້າງ, ເງິນເດືອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company increased the wages of its employees.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເພີ່ມເງິນເດືອນຂອງພະນັກງານຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼາຍ, ຂ້ອນຂ້າງ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: This book is way more interesting than the previous one.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມຫົວນີ້ມີຄວາມຫນ້າສົນໃຈຫຼາຍກ່ວາປື້ມທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນເພຍ, impotence (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His main weakness is his inability to focus for long periods.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມອ່ອນແອທີ່ໃຫຍ່ທີ່ສຸດຂອງລາວແມ່ນຄວາມບໍ່ສາມາດທີ່ຈະເອົາໃຈໃສ່ເປັນເວລາດົນນານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮັ່ງມີ, ຄວາມຮັ່ງມີ
meaning list.sentence: The family accumulated great wealth over the years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອບ​ຄົວ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ສົມ​ຊັບ​ສິນ​ຂະ​ຫນາດ​ໃຫຍ່​ໃນ​ໄລ​ຍະ​ປີ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັ່ງມີ, ຮັ່ງມີ
meaning list.sentence: The wealthy businessman donated generously to charity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກທຸລະກິດທີ່ຮັ່ງມີໄດ້ບໍລິຈາກເງິນເພື່ອການກຸສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນຂະນະທີ່, ໃນຂະນະທີ່ (ການສົມທົບ)
meaning list.sentence: He prefers tea, whereas she likes coffee.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຂະນະທີ່ນາງມັກຊາ, ລາວມັກກາເຟ.

meaning list.meaning: ບ່ອນໃດກໍໄດ້ (ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່)
meaning list.sentence: You can sit wherever you like.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດນັ່ງບ່ອນໃດກໍໄດ້ທີ່ທ່ານຕ້ອງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຊິບ
meaning list.sentence: She whispered a secret into his ear.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກະຊິບຄວາມລັບເຂົ້າໄປໃນຫູຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຊິບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The room was filled with whispers of excitement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍສຽງກະຊິບທີ່ຕື່ນເຕັ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຜ, ໃຜ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: To whom should I address this letter?
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຄວນກ່າວເຖິງຈົດໝາຍສະບັບນີ້ໃຫ້ໃຜ?

meaning list.meaning: ກວ້າງຂວາງ, ກວ້າງຂວາງ
meaning list.sentence: This theory is widely accepted in the scientific community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທິດສະດີນີ້ໄດ້ຮັບການຍອມຮັບຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງໃນຊຸມຊົນວິທະຍາສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັດປ່າ
meaning list.sentence: The park is home to a variety of wildlife species.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສວນສາທາລະນະແມ່ນບ່ອນຢູ່ຂອງສັດປ່າຊະນິດຕ່າງໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕັມໃຈ, ສະໝັກໃຈ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is willing to help with the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຕັມໃຈທີ່ຈະຊ່ວຍໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫໍ່ອ້ອມ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: He wound the rope around the tree.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເອົາ​ເຊືອກ​ມັດ​ອ້ອມ​ຕົ້ນ​ໄມ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສາຍ, ສາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The electrical wires need to be replaced.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາຍໄຟຟ້າຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງໄດ້ປ່ຽນແທນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫລາດ, ສະຫລາດ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It was a wise decision to save money for emergencies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນການຕັດສິນໃຈທີ່ສະຫຼາດທີ່ຈະຊ່ວຍປະຢັດເງິນສໍາລັບການສຸກເສີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະຍານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The witness testified in court about what he saw.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍານບອກສານວ່າລາວເຫັນຫຍັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນພະຍານ
meaning list.sentence: She witnessed a beautiful sunrise from the hilltop.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄດ້ເຫັນຕາເວັນຂຶ້ນທີ່ສວຍງາມຈາກເທິງຍອດພູ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານະການຮ້າຍແຮງກວ່າເກົ່າ
meaning list.sentence: After the storm, the situation became even worse.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານະການໄດ້ຮ້າຍແຮງຂຶ້ນຫຼັງຈາກພະຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ກໍລະນີຮ້າຍແຮງທີ່ສຸດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This was the worst disaster in the country’s history.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນໄພພິບັດທີ່ຮ້າຍແຮງທີ່ສຸດໃນປະຫວັດສາດຂອງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸນຄ່າ, ຄຸນຄ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The painting is worth millions of dollars.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມູນຄ່າຂອງຮູບແຕ້ມແມ່ນຫຼາຍລ້ານໂດລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາດແຜ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The soldier was treated for a serious wound.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານໄດ້ຮັບການປິ່ນປົວບາດແຜທີ່ຮຸນແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາດແຜ
meaning list.sentence: He was wounded in the battle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບບາດເຈັບໃນສົງຄາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫໍ່, ຫໍ່ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She wrapped the gift with colorful paper.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຫໍ່ຂອງຂວັນດ້ວຍເຈ້ຍສີ.

meaning list.meaning: error, ຜິດ​ພາດ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: He admitted his wrong and apologized.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍອມຮັບຄວາມຜິດພາດຂອງລາວແລະຂໍໂທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງໃດກໍຕາມ, ຍັງ (ການສົມທົບ)
meaning list.sentence: It was raining, yet they continued their journey.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝົນຕົກ, ແຕ່ເຂົາເຈົ້າສືບຕໍ່ເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາກພື້ນ, ພື້ນທີ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The area was declared a disaster zone after the earthquake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຂດ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ປະກາດ​ເປັນ​ເຂດ​ປະສົບ​ໄພ​ພາຍຫຼັງ​ແຜ່ນດິນ​ໄຫວ.

meaning list.meaning: ດູດ, ດູດ
meaning list.sentence: The sponge absorbed all the spilled water.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຟອງນ້ຳໄດ້ດູດເອົານ້ຳທີ່ຮົ່ວໄຫຼອອກມາທັງໝົດ.

meaning list.meaning: abstract (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The concept is too abstract for young children to understand.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນວຄວາມຄິດແມ່ນບໍ່ມີຕົວຕົນເກີນໄປສໍາລັບເດັກນ້ອຍທີ່ຈະເຂົ້າໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳນຽງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her British accent is very distinct.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຳນຽງອັງກິດຂອງລາວແມ່ນອອກສຽງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍບັງເອີນ, ໂດຍບໍ່ໄດ້ຕັ້ງໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: She accidentally dropped her phone into the pool.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຕົກ​ໂທລະສັບ​ລົງ​ໃນ​ສະ​ລອຍ​ນ້ຳ​ໂດຍ​ບັງ​ເອີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່​ພັກ​ອາ​ໄສ​, ສະ​ຫນອງ​ຊ່ອງ (verb​)
meaning list.sentence: The hotel can accommodate up to 200 guests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງແຮມສາມາດຮອງຮັບແຂກໄດ້ເຖິງ 200 ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສໍາເລັດ, ສໍາເລັດ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She accomplished her goal of running a marathon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ບັນລຸເປົ້າຫມາຍຂອງລາວໃນການແລ່ນມາຣາທອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນຊີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The accountant prepared the company's financial statements.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກບັນຊີໄດ້ກະກຽມລາຍງານການເງິນຂອງບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຖືກຕ້ອງ, ຄວາມແມ່ນຍໍາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The accuracy of the data is crucial for the analysis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຖືກຕ້ອງຂອງຂໍ້ມູນແມ່ນມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນຫຼາຍສໍາລັບການວິເຄາະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖືກຕ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: The report was written accurately and comprehensively.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານໄດ້ຖືກຂຽນຢ່າງຖືກຕ້ອງແລະຄົບຖ້ວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາຊິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist explained the properties of the acid.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ອະທິບາຍຄຸນສົມບັດຂອງອາຊິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕຸ້ນ, ກະຕຸ້ນ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: You need to activate your account before logging in.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງເປີດໃຊ້ມັນກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບບັນຊີຂອງທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ່ງເສບຕິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Addiction to social media is becoming a widespread issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສິ່ງເສບຕິດໃນສື່ມວນຊົນສັງຄົມແມ່ນກາຍເປັນບັນຫາທົ່ວໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ນອກຈາກນັ້ນ, ຍັງ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: Additionally, the new policy aims to reduce costs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນອກຈາກນັ້ນ, ນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່ມີຈຸດປະສົງເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ພຽງພໍ, ເຫມາະສົມ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The storage space is adequate for our needs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນທີ່ເກັບຮັກສາແມ່ນພຽງພໍກັບຄວາມຕ້ອງການຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ພຽງພໍ, ພຽງພໍ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The problem was adequately addressed in the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນຫາດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖືກແກ້ໄຂຢ່າງພຽງພໍໃນກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັບ, ປັບຕົວ
meaning list.sentence: She adjusted the mirror before driving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປັບກະຈົກກ່ອນຂັບລົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຄາບໍ່ແພງ, ເຂົ້າເຖິງໄດ້ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The store offers high-quality products at affordable prices.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທາງຮ້ານໄດ້ສະໜອງສິນຄ້າຄຸນນະພາບສູງໃນລາຄາທີ່ເໝາະສົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະເສດ, ກະເສດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Agriculture is a vital sector in the country’s economy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະ​ສິ​ກໍາ​ແມ່ນ​ຂະ​ແຫນງ​ການ​ທີ່​ສໍາ​ຄັນ​ໃນ​ເສດ​ຖະ​ກິດ​ຂອງ​ປະ​ເທດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ມະນຸດຕ່າງດາວ, ມະນຸດຕ່າງດາວ
meaning list.sentence: The movie is about an alien visiting Earth.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາແມ່ນກ່ຽວກັບມະນຸດຕ່າງດາວທີ່ໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ນອກຈາກນີ້, ນອກຈາກ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The new teacher worked alongside the experienced staff.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູສອນໃໝ່ໄດ້ເຮັດວຽກຄຽງຄູ່ກັບພະນັກງານທີ່ມີປະສົບການ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ, ທັງໝົດ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The project cost $500 altogether.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການນີ້ມີມູນຄ່າທັງຫມົດ 500 ໂດລາ.

meaning list.meaning: Ambulance (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The ambulance arrived quickly at the accident site.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດສຸກເສີນໄດ້ມາຮອດຈຸດເກີດເຫດຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ມ່ວນ, ຕະຫລົກ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie was both amusing and thought-provoking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາແມ່ນທັງຄວາມບັນເທີງ ແລະກະຕຸ້ນຄວາມຄິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກວິເຄາະ, ນັກວິເຄາະ (noun)
meaning list.sentence: The analyst predicted a rise in stock prices.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິເຄາະຄາດຄະເນການເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຂອງລາຄາຮຸ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: Ata, ຂ້ອຍແມ່ນ (isim)
meaning list.sentence: She traced her ancestors back to the 18th century.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຕິດຕາມບັນພະບຸລຸດຂອງລາວກັບຄືນສູ່ສະຕະວັດທີ 18.

meaning list.meaning: ອະນິເມຊັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The kids enjoyed the animation film at the theater.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍກໍ່ມັກຮູບເງົາສັດໃນໂຮງໜັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຸກໆປີ, ປະຈໍາປີ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The report is published annually in January.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດ​ລາຍ​ງານ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ພິມ​ເຜີຍ​ແຜ່​ທຸກໆ​ປີ​ໃນ​ເດືອນ​ມັງ​ກອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄາດ, ຄາດການ
meaning list.sentence: They anticipate an increase in demand next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າຄາດວ່າຈະມີຄວາມຕ້ອງການເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນໃນເດືອນຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກັງວົນ, ຄວາມກັງວົນ
meaning list.sentence: She felt a lot of anxiety before the big presentation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກກັງວົນຫຼາຍກ່ອນທີ່ຈະນໍາສະເຫນີຂະຫນາດໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳຂໍໂທດ
meaning list.sentence: He offered a sincere apology for his mistake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຂໍໂທດຢ່າງຈິງໃຈສໍາລັບຄວາມຜິດພາດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ສະໝັກ, ຜູ້ສະໝັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Each applicant must submit their resume online.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ສະຫມັກທຸກຄົນຕ້ອງສົ່ງຊີວະປະຫວັດຂອງລາວອອນໄລນ໌.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫມາະສົມ, ໃນສະຖານທີ່ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She dressed appropriately for the formal event.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ນຸ່ງເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງທີ່ເຫມາະສົມກັບເຫດການທີ່ເປັນທາງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ລູກສອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hunter shot an arrow at the target.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາຍພານໄດ້ຍິງລູກສອນໃສ່ເປົ້າໝາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິລະປະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The gallery displayed various modern artworks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍ​ວາງສະ​ແດງ​ບັນດາ​ວຽກ​ງານ​ສິລະ​ປະ​ທີ່​ທັນ​ສະ​ໄໝ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: He set the book aside to focus on his work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ວາງ​ປຶ້ມ​ໄວ້​ຂ້າງ​ໜ້າ​ແລະ​ສຸມ​ໃສ່​ວຽກ​ງານ​ຂອງ​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັບສິນ, ວັດຖຸມີຄ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her creativity is a great asset to the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຄິດສ້າງສັນຂອງລາວເປັນຊັບສິນທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ສໍາລັບທີມງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕ່ງຕັ້ງ, ແຕ່ງຕັ້ງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher assigned homework to the class.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໃຫ້ວຽກບ້ານໃຫ້ຫ້ອງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອ, ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She offered her assistance to the elderly woman.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ໃຫ້​ຄວາມ​ຊ່ວຍ​ເຫຼືອ​ແກ່​ແມ່​ເຖົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມມຸດຕິຖານ, ເດົາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His assumption was based on incomplete data.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສົມມຸດຕິຖານຂອງລາວແມ່ນອີງໃສ່ຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ຂາດຫາຍໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບປະກັນ, ຮັບປະກັນ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The manager assured us that the issue would be resolved.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການຮັບປະກັນຂ້ອຍວ່າບັນຫາຈະຖືກແກ້ໄຂ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຫລາດໃຈ, ປະຫລາດໃຈ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The results of the experiment were astonishing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບຂອງການທົດລອງແມ່ນປະຫລາດໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນບ, ຄັດຕິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She felt a strong attachment to her hometown.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກເຖິງຄວາມຜູກມັດທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງກັບບ້ານເກີດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປະມູນ
meaning list.sentence: The painting was sold at an auction for a record price.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບແຕ້ມດັ່ງກ່າວຖືກຂາຍຢູ່ໃນການປະມູນໃນລາຄາເປັນສະຖິຕິ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຽງ, auditory (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The audio quality of the recording was excellent.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຸນະພາບສຽງຂອງການບັນທຶກແມ່ນດີເລີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດ​ຕະ​ໂນ​ມັດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The car has an automatic transmission system.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດມີລະບົບສາຍສົ່ງອັດຕະໂນມັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດ​ຕະ​ໂນ​ມັດ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: The lights turn on automatically when it gets dark.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄຟຈະເປີດອັດຕະໂນມັດເມື່ອມັນມືດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮັບຮູ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The campaign aims to raise awareness about climate change.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ໂຄ​ສະ​ນາ​ເພື່ອ​ແນ​ໃສ່​ຍົກ​ສູງ​ຄວາມ​ຮັບ​ຮູ້​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ຂອງ​ດິນ​ຟ້າ​ອາ​ກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ງຸ່ມງ່າມ, clumsy (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The conversation became awkward when no one knew what to say.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສົນທະນາໄດ້ກາຍເປັນງຸ່ມງ່າມທີ່ບໍ່ມີໃຜຮູ້ວ່າຈະເວົ້າຫຍັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້າຍ, ບັດປະຈຳຕົວ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: Each employee is required to wear a badge at all times.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະນັກງານທຸກຄົນຕ້ອງໃສ່ປ້າຍຢູ່ຕະຫຼອດເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມດຸນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A balanced diet is essential for good health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຫານທີ່ສົມດູນເປັນສິ່ງຈໍາເປັນເພື່ອສຸຂະພາບທີ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: Ballet (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has been practicing ballet since she was a child.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ເຮັດ ballet ຕັ້ງແຕ່ເດັກນ້ອຍຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປູມເປົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The children enjoyed playing with the colorful balloons.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍມັກຫຼິ້ນກັບປູມເປົ້າທີ່ມີສີສັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກືອບບໍ່ເຄີຍ, barely (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: He could barely keep his eyes open after working all night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ໝົດ​ຄືນ​ແລ້ວ ລາວ​ບໍ່​ສາມາດ​ເປີດ​ຕາ​ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການຕໍ່ລອງ, ການຊື້ເຄື່ອງລາຄາບໍ່ແພງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: I found this coat on sale; it was a real bargain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າ​ພະ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ພົບ​ເຫັນ jacket ນີ້​ໃນ​ການ​ຂາຍ; ມັນເປັນໄປໄດ້ແທ້ໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັ້ນໃຕ້ດິນ
meaning list.sentence: The basement is used for storage and laundry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງໃຕ້ດິນແມ່ນໃຊ້ສໍາລັບການເກັບຮັກສາແລະການຊັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She carried the apples in a wicker basket.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເອົາ​ໝາກ​ໂປມ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ໃສ່​ໃນ​ກະຕ່າ​ເຄື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Bats are nocturnal creatures and usually fly at night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈຍເປັນສັດທີ່ຫາກິນໃນເວລາກາງຄືນ ແລະມັກຈະບິນໃນຕອນກາງຄືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີປະໂຫຍດ, ມີປະໂຫຍດ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A balanced diet is beneficial for overall health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຫານທີ່ສົມດູນແມ່ນມີປະໂຫຍດຕໍ່ສຸຂະພາບໂດຍລວມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້າງ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: She sat beside her friend during the concert.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວນັ່ງຢູ່ຂ້າງໝູ່ຂອງລາວໃນລະຫວ່າງການສະແດງຄອນເສີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ນອກຈາກ, ຍັງ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: Besides math, she excels in science.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນອກຈາກຄະນິດສາດ, ລາວຍັງປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດໃນວິທະຍາສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ນອກ​ຈາກ​ນີ້ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: I don’t want to go out; besides, it’s raining.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ຢາກອອກໄປ; ຝົນຍັງຕົກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມລຳອຽງ, ຄວາມພາກພຽນ
meaning list.sentence: The article shows a clear bias against the policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດຄວາມສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນຄວາມລໍາອຽງທີ່ຊັດເຈນຕໍ່ກັບການເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ້ສະເຫນີ, quote (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His bid was the highest at the auction.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສະເຫນີລາຄາຂອງລາວແມ່ນສູງທີ່ສຸດໃນການປະມູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເໜີລາຄາ
meaning list.sentence: They bid on the house but didn’t win.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ປະ​ມູນ​ກັບ​ເຮືອນ​ແຕ່​ບໍ່​ໄດ້​ຊະ​ນະ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຊີວະວິທະຍາ
meaning list.sentence: She is studying the biological aspects of human behavior.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສຶກສາດ້ານຊີວະວິທະຍາຂອງພຶດຕິກໍາຂອງມະນຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ້າຫົ່ມ
meaning list.sentence: He covered himself with a warm blanket.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ປົກ​ຕົວ​ລາວ​ດ້ວຍ​ຜ້າ​ຫົ່ມ​ທີ່​ອົບ​ອຸ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປົ່າລົມ
meaning list.sentence: The boxer delivered a strong blow to his opponent.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກມວຍໄດ້ທຳຮ້າຍຄູ່ຕໍ່ສູ້ຢ່າງມີພະລັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າຫານ, ເດັ່ນຊັດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her bold decision led to significant changes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕັດສິນໃຈອັນກ້າຫານຂອງລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ມີການປ່ຽນແປງທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The city suffered extensive damage during the bombing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມືອງໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມເສຍຫາຍຢ່າງໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງໃນລະຫວ່າງການວາງລະເບີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We made a booking for a table at the restaurant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄດ້ຈອງໂຕະຢູ່ໃນຮ້ານອາຫານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ, ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The new policy aims to boost the economy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍ​ບາຍ​ໃໝ່​ແນ​ໃສ່​ຊຸກ​ຍູ້​ເສດ​ຖະ​ກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ, ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company saw a significant boost in sales last month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເຫັນການຂາຍເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນເດືອນແລ້ວນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູກມັດ, ຜູກມັດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was bound by the terms of the contract.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນຂຶ້ນກັບເງື່ອນໄຂຂອງສັນຍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ດິນຈີ່
meaning list.sentence: The house was built entirely of red bricks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອນແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍດິນຈີ່ສີແດງທັງໝົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍຫຍໍ້, ສະຫຼຸບ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She explained the plan briefly before the meeting started.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ອະ​ທິ​ບາຍ​ແຜນ​ການ​ໂດຍ​ຫຍໍ້​ກ່ອນ​ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ເລີ່ມ​ຕົ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ເຜີຍແຜ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The broadcaster covered the event live.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວິທະຍຸກະຈາຍສຽງໄດ້ກວມເອົາເຫດການສົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍ​ທົ່ວ​ໄປ​ແລ້ວ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: The new policy is broadly supported by the public.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່ໄດ້ຮັບການສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງຈາກປະຊາຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັກ, ບັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The software had a bug that caused it to crash.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຂໍ້ຜິດພາດທີ່ເຮັດໃຫ້ຊອບແວຂັດຂ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: hut, cabin (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The family stayed in a small cabin by the lake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອບ​ຄົວ​ໄດ້​ພັກ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ກະ​ຕ່າ​ນ້ອຍ​ຢູ່​ແຄມ​ທະ​ເລ​ສາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄອງ, ທາງນໍ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The canal connects the two major rivers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອງໄດ້ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ສອງແມ່ນ້ໍາທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຽນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She lit a candle during the power outage.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຈູດ​ທຽນ​ໃນ​ລະຫວ່າງ​ໄຟ​ຟ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄາບອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Carbon is a key element in organic chemistry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄາບອນເປັນອົງປະກອບພື້ນຖານໃນເຄມີອິນຊີ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຈໍາວັນ, ທໍາມະດາ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He wore casual clothes to the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄປງານລ້ຽງໃນເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງແບບທໍາມະດາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖ້ຳ
meaning list.sentence: The explorers discovered an ancient cave.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສຳຫຼວດຄົ້ນພົບຖ້ຳບູຮານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຊັດເຈນ, ຄວາມຊັດເຈນ
meaning list.sentence: There is no certainty that the project will succeed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ່ມີຄວາມແນ່ນອນວ່າໂຄງການຈະປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃບຢັ້ງຢືນ, ເອກະສານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She received a certificate for completing the course.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບໃບຢັ້ງຢືນສໍາລັບການສໍາເລັດຫຼັກສູດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍາກ, ທ້າທາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This was one of the most challenging tasks he had ever faced.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້​ແມ່ນ​ໜຶ່ງ​ໃນ​ວຽກ​ງານ​ທີ່​ທ້າ​ທາຍ​ທີ່​ສຸດ​ທີ່​ລາວ​ເຄີຍ​ປະ​ເຊີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຊ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: The team won the national championship last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມໄດ້ແຊ້ມລະດັບຊາດໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງດູດ, ໜ້າສົນໃຈ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The small village had a charming atmosphere.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝູ່​ບ້ານ​ນ້ອຍ​ມີ​ບັນ​ຍາ​ກາດ​ທີ່​ມີ​ສະ​ເໜ່.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລ່, ຕິດຕາມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The police chased the suspect through the city streets.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ໄລ່​ຈັບ​ຜູ້​ຕ້ອງ​ສົງ​ໄສ​ຜ່ານ​ຖະໜົນ​ຫົນທາງ​ໃນ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລ່, ໄລ່ຕາມ
meaning list.sentence: The car chase was shown live on television.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ແລ່ນ​ລົດ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ຖ່າຍ​ທອດ​ສົດ​ທາງ​ໂທລະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: She kissed him on the cheek before leaving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈູບນາງໃສ່ແກ້ມກ່ອນທີ່ຈະອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ເບີກບານ, ເບີກບານ
meaning list.sentence: The fans cheered loudly as their team scored a goal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຟນບານຮ້ອງດັງໆເມື່ອທີມຂອງພວກເຂົາໄດ້ຄະແນນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສຸກ, ຄວາມເບີກບານມ່ວນຊື່ນ
meaning list.sentence: The room was filled with cheers after the announcement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ແດງ​ຄວາມ​ຊົມ​ເຊີຍ​ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ການ​ປະ​ກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ອງເພງ
meaning list.sentence: The church choir performed beautifully during the service.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະ​ຮ້ອງ​ເພງ​ຂອງ​ໂບດ​ໄດ້​ໃຫ້​ການ​ສະ​ແດງ​ທີ່​ດີ​ເລີດ​ໃນ​ລະຫວ່າງ​ການ​ຮັບ​ໃຊ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດ, ຕັດ
meaning list.sentence: He chopped the vegetables for the salad.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຟັກຜັກສໍາລັບສະຫຼັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ວົງຈອນ, ການທ່ອງທ່ຽວ
meaning list.sentence: The electrical circuit was damaged during the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວົງຈອນໄຟຟ້າໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມເສຍຫາຍໃນລະຫວ່າງການພະຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ພົນລະເຮືອນ, ພົນລະເຮືອນ
meaning list.sentence: Ancient civilizations provide valuable insights into human history.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພົນລະເມືອງບູຮານໃຫ້ຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ມີຄຸນຄ່າກ່ຽວກັບປະຫວັດສາດຂອງມະນຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊີ້ແຈງ, ແຈ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: She clarified her point during the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ໄດ້​ຊີ້​ແຈງ​ທັດສະນະ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​ໃນ​ກອງ​ປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈັດປະເພດ, ກຸ່ມ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The books are classified according to their genres.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມຖືກຈັດປະເພດຕາມປະເພດຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະນັກງານ, ພະນັກງານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The clerk at the front desk helped me with my reservation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະນັກງານຕ້ອນຮັບຊ່ວຍຂ້ອຍໃນການຈອງຂອງຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: Abyss (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The cliff offers a stunning view of the ocean.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫນ້າຜາໄດ້ສະຫນອງທັດສະນະທີ່ຫນ້າປະທັບໃຈຂອງມະຫາສະຫມຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄລີນິກ
meaning list.sentence: She visited the clinic for her annual check-up.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມຄລີນິກເພື່ອກວດສຸຂະພາບປະຈໍາປີຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄລິບ, ສ່ວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie clip was shared widely on social media.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄລິບຮູບເງົາດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖືກແບ່ງປັນຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງໃນສື່ສັງຄົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັງເອີນ, ບັງເອີນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It was a coincidence that we met at the same restaurant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນເລື່ອງບັງເອີນທີ່ພວກເຮົາພົບກັນຢູ່ຮ້ານອາຫານດຽວກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ເກັບ, ຜູ້ເກັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is a collector of rare coins.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນນັກສະສົມຂອງຫຼຽນທີ່ຫາຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: Colony, colony (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country was once a British colony.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດນີ້ເຄີຍເປັນອານານິຄົມຂອງອັງກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີສີສັນ, ມີຊີວິດຊີວາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The market was filled with colourful stalls and goods.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕະຫຼາດເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍຮ້ານຂາຍສິນຄ້າ ແລະ ສິນຄ້າທີ່ມີສີສັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕະຫລົກ, ຕະຫລົກ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The comedian’s performance was very comic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສະແດງຂອງ comedian ແມ່ນຂ້ອນຂ້າງຕະຫລົກ.

meaning list.meaning: comic (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He bought a new comic to add to his collection.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊື້ປຶ້ມກາຕູນໃໝ່ເພື່ອເພີ່ມໃສ່ຄໍເລັກຊັນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ບັນຊາການ
meaning list.sentence: The commander gave clear orders to his troops.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ບັນຊາການໄດ້ອອກຄຳສັ່ງຢ່າງຈະແຈ້ງແກ່ທະຫານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປຽບທຽບ, ຂ້ອນຂ້າງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The study provided comparative data on different species.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສຶກສາໄດ້ໃຫ້ຂໍ້ມູນປຽບທຽບກ່ຽວກັບຊະນິດພັນຕ່າງໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳເລັດ, ຈົບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The completion of the project took several months.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍເດືອນເພື່ອສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕ່ງ, ແຕ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: She composed a beautiful melody for the piano.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ປະກອບເປັນ melody ງາມສໍາລັບ piano ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກປະພັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Beethoven is one of the greatest composers in history.
meaning list.sentence translation: Beethoven ແມ່ນຫນຶ່ງໃນບັນດານັກປະພັນທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ທີ່ສຸດໃນປະຫວັດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາດປະສົມ, ໂຄງສ້າງປະສົມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Water is a compound of hydrogen and oxygen.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ໍາແມ່ນສານປະກອບຂອງ hydrogen ແລະອົກຊີເຈນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະອຽດ, ລະອຽດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The report provided a comprehensive analysis of the data.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານໄດ້ສະຫນອງການວິເຄາະທີ່ສົມບູນແບບຂອງຂໍ້ມູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກອບ, ປະກອບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The committee comprises experts from various fields.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະ​ນະ​ກໍາ​ມະ​ການ​ປະ​ກອບ​ມີ​ຜູ້​ຊ່ຽວ​ຊານ​ຈາກ​ຂະ​ແຫນງ​ການ​ຕ່າງໆ​.

meaning list.meaning: ບັງຄັບ, obligatory (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Wearing a seatbelt is compulsory in many countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໃສ່ເຂັມຂັດນິລະໄພແມ່ນບັງຄັບຢູ່ໃນຫຼາຍປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄອນກີດ
meaning list.sentence: The building was constructed using reinforced concrete.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ກໍ່ສ້າງໂດຍໃຊ້ຄອນກີດເສີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄອນກີດ, ສາມາດເຫັນໄດ້ຊັດເຈນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She provided concrete evidence to support her claim.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ສະແດງຫຼັກຖານທີ່ຊັດເຈນເພື່ອສະຫນັບສະຫນູນການຮຽກຮ້ອງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາລະພາບ
meaning list.sentence: He confessed to stealing the money.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍອມຮັບວ່າລັກເງິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມວຸ່ນວາຍ, ສັບສົນ
meaning list.sentence: There was a lot of confusion after the announcement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມສັບສົນອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງຫຼັງຈາກການປະກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ດັ່ງນັ້ນ, ດັ່ງນັ້ນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The team failed to score; consequently, they lost the match.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມ​ບໍ່​ໄດ້​ຄະ​ແນນ; ນັ້ນແມ່ນເຫດຜົນທີ່ພວກເຂົາສູນເສຍການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກປັກຮັກສາ, ປົກປັກຮັກສາ
meaning list.sentence: The conservation of wildlife is essential for ecological balance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປົກປ້ອງສັດປ່າແມ່ນມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນຫຼາຍຕໍ່ຄວາມສົມດຸນຂອງລະບົບນິເວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳຄັນ, ສຳຄັນ
meaning list.sentence: She has made considerable progress in her studies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມກ້າວຫນ້າຢ່າງໂດດເດັ່ນໃນການສຶກສາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້ອນຂ້າງ, ຂ້ອນຂ້າງນ້ອຍ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The cost of living has increased considerably in recent years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າຄອງຊີບເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນຊຸມປີມໍ່ໆມານີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງສະໝໍ່າສະເໝີ
meaning list.sentence: She has consistently performed well in her exams.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດໄດ້ດີຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງໃນການສອບເສັງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສົມຮູ້ຮ່ວມຄິດ, ແຜນການລັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They were accused of being part of a conspiracy to overthrow the government.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ຖືກ​ກ່າວ​ຫາ​ວ່າ​ເປັນ​ສ່ວນ​ນຶ່ງ​ຂອງ​ການ​ສົມ​ຮູ້​ຮ່ວມ​ຄິດ​ເພື່ອ​ໂຄ່ນ​ລົ້ມ​ລັດ​ຖະ​ບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ປຶກສາຫາລື, ປຶກສາຫາລື
meaning list.sentence: You should consult your doctor before starting a new exercise program.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຄວນປຶກສາກັບທ່ານຫມໍຂອງທ່ານກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເລີ່ມໂຄງການອອກກໍາລັງກາຍໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ປຶກສາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company hired a consultant to improve its efficiency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຈ້າງທີ່ປຶກສາເພື່ອປັບປຸງປະສິດທິພາບຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການບໍລິໂພກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government is trying to reduce energy consumption.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານພະຍາຍາມຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການໃຊ້ພະລັງງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຕ້ແຍ້ງ, ໂຕ້ແຍ້ງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new policy has been highly controversial.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍ​ບາຍ​ໃຫມ່​ໄດ້​ພິ​ສູດ​ທີ່​ຂ້ອນ​ຂ້າງ​ຂັດ​ແຍ່ງ​.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຕ້ຖຽງ, ການຂັດແຍ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a lot of controversy surrounding the decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການຂັດແຍ້ງຫຼາຍກ່ຽວກັບການຕັດສິນໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະດວກ, ສະດວກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Online shopping offers the convenience of shopping from home.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຊື້ເຄື່ອງອອນໄລນ໌ໃຫ້ຄວາມສະດວກໃນການຊື້ເຄື່ອງຈາກເຮືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກອງປະຊຸມ, ກອງປະຊຸມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The convention was attended by thousands of people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫລາຍພັນຄົນໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກອງປະຊຸມໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ປະເພນີ, ປະເພນີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He broke with convention and spoke his mind.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວທໍາລາຍປະເພນີແລະເວົ້າຈິດໃຈຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະເພນີ, ປະເພນີ
meaning list.sentence: The house was built in a conventional style.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອນ​ຫຼັງ​ນີ້​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ກໍ່​ສ້າງ​ໃນ​ແບບ​ພື້ນ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ບົ່ງບອກ, ບົ່ງບອກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The artist tried to convey his emotions through his work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສິລະປິນໄດ້ພະຍາຍາມຖ່າຍທອດຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກຂອງລາວໂດຍຜ່ານວຽກງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັກຊວນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She gave a convincing argument during the debate.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີການໂຕ້ຖຽງທີ່ຫນ້າເຊື່ອຖືໃນລະຫວ່າງການໂຕ້ວາທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບມືກັບ, ເອົາຊະນະ
meaning list.sentence: She had to cope with a lot of stress at work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕ້ອງຮັບມືກັບຄວາມກົດດັນຫຼາຍໃນບ່ອນເຮັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິສັດ, ສະຖາບັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The corporation has branches in several countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດມີສາຂາຢູ່ໃນຫຼາຍປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແລວທາງ, ເສັ້ນທາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The children ran down the corridor to their classrooms.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍແລ່ນລົງຫ້ອງໂຖງເພື່ອໄປຫ້ອງຮຽນຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dishes were piled on the kitchen counter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້ວຍຖືກວາງໄວ້ເທິງເຄົາເຕີເຮືອນຄົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຍງານຂ່າວ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The news coverage of the event was extensive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລາຍງານຂ່າວຂອງເຫດການແມ່ນກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕກ, ແຕກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The ice cracked under the weight of the skater.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ຳກ້ອນແຕກພາຍໃຕ້ນ້ຳໜັກຂອງຜູ້ສະເກັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮອຍແຕກ
meaning list.sentence: There was a small crack in the glass.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຮອຍແຕກນ້ອຍໆຢູ່ໃນແກ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫັດຖະກຳ, ຫັດຖະກຳ
meaning list.sentence: She enjoys making crafts in her free time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງມັກເຮັດເຄື່ອງຫັດຖະກໍາໃນເວລາຫວ່າງຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຄິດສ້າງສັນ
meaning list.sentence: Creativity is essential for innovation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຄິດສ້າງສັນແມ່ນສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບການປະດິດສ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງຈິງຈັງ, ວິຈານ
meaning list.sentence: He is critically acclaimed for his work in the film industry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບການຍ້ອງຍໍຢ່າງຈິງຈັງສໍາລັບການເຮັດວຽກຂອງລາວໃນອຸດສາຫະກໍາຮູບເງົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ລ່ອງເຮືອ
meaning list.sentence: They went on a cruise to the Caribbean.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ໄປ cruise ກັບ Caribbean ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ຽມຢາມ, ຊົມ
meaning list.sentence: The car cruised along the highway.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດ​ຄັນ​ນີ້​ໄດ້​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ຢູ່​ເທິງ​ທາງ​ດ່ວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ້ຄຶດ, ສັນຍານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She took his silence as a cue to leave.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເອົາຄວາມງຽບຂອງນາງເປັນສັນຍານທີ່ຈະອອກໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: Curious (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The child was curious about how the toy worked.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍສົງໄສວ່າເຄື່ອງຫຼິ້ນເຮັດວຽກໄດ້ແນວໃດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼັກສູດ, ຫຼັກສູດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The school has introduced a new curriculum for science classes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງຮຽນໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີຫຼັກສູດໃຫມ່ສໍາລັບຫ້ອງຮຽນວິທະຍາສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜ້າຮັກ, ໜ້າຮັກ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The puppy is so cute that everyone wants to hold it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝາໂຕນີ້ໜ້າຮັກຫຼາຍ ຈົນທຸກຄົນຢາກຖືລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜະລິດຕະພັນນົມ
meaning list.sentence: She is allergic to dairy products like milk and cheese.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີອາການແພ້ຕໍ່ຜະລິດຕະພັນນົມເຊັ່ນ: ນົມແລະເນີຍແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວກັບນົມ
meaning list.sentence: The store sells fresh dairy items.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານຂາຍຜະລິດຕະພັນນົມສົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າ, ທ້າທາຍ
meaning list.sentence: I wouldn't dare to jump off that high cliff.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າ​ພະ​ເຈົ້າ​ຈະ​ບໍ່​ກ້າ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ໂດດ​ຈາກ​ຫນ້າ​ຜາ​ສູງ​ນັ້ນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ມືດ
meaning list.sentence: The room was filled with darkness after the lights went out.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອ​ໄຟ​ອອກ​ໄປ, ຫ້ອງ​ນັ້ນ​ເຕັມ​ໄປ​ດ້ວຍ​ຄວາມ​ມືດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖານຂໍ້ມູນ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: The company stores all customer information in a secure database.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດເກັບຮັກສາຂໍ້ມູນລູກຄ້າທັງຫມົດໄວ້ໃນຖານຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ປອດໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສັ້ນຕາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The deadline for submitting the application is next Friday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກໍານົດເວລາທີ່ຈະສະຫມັກແມ່ນວັນສຸກຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The snake's bite can be deadly if not treated quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງູກັດສາມາດຕາຍໄດ້ ຖ້າບໍ່ປິ່ນປົວໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຂາຍ, ຜູ້ຂາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He works as a car dealer in the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກເປັນຜູ້ຂາຍລົດຢູ່ໃນເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັ້ນ, ຊັ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They enjoyed the sunset from the ship's deck.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ເບິ່ງ​ຕາ​ເວັນ​ຕົກ​ຈາກ​ດາດ​ຟ້າ​ຂອງ​ກຳ​ປັ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ປົກປ້ອງ, ຜູ້ປົກປ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The defender blocked the shot to save the goal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຖືກກ່າວຟ້ອງສະກັດຍິງເພື່ອຊ່ວຍປະຢັດເປົ້າຫມາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ລຶບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He accidentally deleted all the files from his computer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລຶບໄຟລ໌ທັງໝົດອອກຈາກຄອມພິວເຕີຂອງລາວໂດຍບັງເອີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຊາທິປະໄຕ
meaning list.sentence: Democracy allows citizens to have a voice in government decisions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາທິປະໄຕອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ພົນລະເມືອງສາມາດເວົ້າໃນການຕັດສິນໃຈຂອງລັດຖະບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຊາທິປະໄຕ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country is governed under a democratic system.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດຖືກປົກຄອງດ້ວຍລະບົບປະຊາທິປະໄຕ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາທິດ, ສົ່ງເສີມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The demonstration of the new product attracted many people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແນະນໍາຜະລິດຕະພັນໃຫມ່ໄດ້ດຶງດູດຄວາມສົນໃຈຂອງປະຊາຊົນຈໍານວນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກໄປ, ອອກໄປ
meaning list.sentence: The train will depart from platform 5.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດໄຟຈະອອກຈາກເວທີ 5.

meaning list.meaning: ຂື້ນກັບ, ຂື້ນກັບ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The success of the project is dependent on sufficient funding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມສໍາເລັດຂອງໂຄງການແມ່ນຂຶ້ນກັບການສະຫນອງທຶນພຽງພໍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເງິນຝາກ, ເງິນຝາກ
meaning list.sentence: You need to pay a deposit before renting the car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງຈ່າຍເງິນຝາກກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເຊົ່າລົດ.

meaning list.meaning: to deposit, to deposit (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: She deposited the check into her account.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຝາກເຊັກໃສ່ບັນຊີຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊຶມເສົ້າ, ຊຶມເສົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: He sought therapy to deal with his depression.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊອກຫາວິທີການປິ່ນປົວເພື່ອຮັບມືກັບອາການຊຶມເສົ້າຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາຈາກ, ໄດ້ຮັບ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Many English words are derived from Latin.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາສັບພາສາອັງກິດຈໍານວນຫຼາຍແມ່ນມາຈາກພາສາລະຕິນ.

meaning list.meaning: hopelessly, helplessly (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She desperately searched for her lost phone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊອກຫາໂທລະສັບທີ່ເສຍໄປຂອງລາວຢ່າງສິ້ນຫວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການທໍາລາຍ, ການທໍາລາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The hurricane caused widespread destruction in the region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົມພະຍຸເຮີຣິເຄນໄດ້ເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດຄວາມເສຍຫາຍຢ່າງແຜ່ຫຼາຍຢູ່ໃນພາກພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຕັ້ງໃຈ, ຄວາມອົດທົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her determination to succeed inspired everyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຕັ້ງໃຈຂອງລາວທີ່ຈະປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດໄດ້ດົນໃຈທຸກໆຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸທິດ, ແຍກ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: He devoted his life to helping others.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ອຸທິດຊີວິດຂອງລາວເພື່ອຊ່ວຍຄົນອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕກຕ່າງກັນ, ແຍກ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The twins differ in personality despite looking alike.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຄູ່ແຝດມີຄວາມຄ້າຍຄືກັນ, ແຕ່ພວກເຂົາມີຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງກັນໃນບຸກຄະລິກກະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິການ, ພິການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new policy aims to support people with disabilities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍ​ບາຍ​ໃຫມ່​ມີ​ຈຸດ​ປະ​ສົງ​ເພື່ອ​ສະ​ຫນັບ​ສະ​ຫນູນ​ຄົນ​ພິ​ການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນພິການ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The building has facilities for disabled people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານມີສິ່ງອໍານວຍຄວາມສະດວກສໍາລັບຄົນພິການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມບໍ່ເຫັນດີ, ຄວາມບໍ່ເຫັນດີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a disagreement over the terms of the contract.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການຂັດແຍ້ງກ່ຽວກັບເງື່ອນໄຂຂອງສັນຍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດຫວັງ
meaning list.sentence: Her decision to cancel the event disappointed many people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ຍົກ​ເລີກ​ເຫດ​ການ​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ຫລາຍ​ຄົນ​ຜິດ​ຫວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຜິດຫວັງ
meaning list.sentence: His failure in the exam was a great disappointment to his family.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມລົ້ມເຫຼວຂອງລາວໃນການສອບເສັງແມ່ນເປັນຄວາມຜິດຫວັງອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງສໍາລັບຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.sentence: The teacher discouraged cheating during exams.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ຈັດການກັບການໂກງການສອບເສັງໃນແບບທີ່ທໍ້ຖອຍໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມບໍ່ເປັນລະບຽບ, ຄວາມບໍ່ເປັນລະບຽບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The disorder in the office made it difficult to find files.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມບໍ່ເປັນລະບຽບໃນຫ້ອງການເຮັດໃຫ້ມັນຍາກທີ່ຈະຊອກຫາໄຟລ໌.

meaning list.meaning: ຫ່າງ​ໄກ, ຫ່າງ​ໄກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: They could see the distant mountains from their cabin.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈາກກະຕູບຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າເຂົາເຈົ້າສາມາດເຫັນພູເຂົາຫ່າງໄກ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕກຕ່າງ, ແຕກຕ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: There are three distinct types of flowers in this garden.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນສວນນີ້ມີດອກໄມ້ສາມຊະນິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອ​ຈໍາ​ແນກ​, ເພື່ອ​ໃຫ້​ເຫັນ​ຄວາມ​ແຕກ​ຕ່າງ (verb​)
meaning list.sentence: It’s hard to distinguish her handwriting from her sister’s.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນການຍາກທີ່ຈະຈໍາແນກລາຍມືຂອງລາວຈາກລາຍມືຂອງເອື້ອຍຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບກວນ
meaning list.sentence: The noise outside distracted her from studying.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງຢູ່ຂ້າງນອກເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວບໍ່ຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບກວນ
meaning list.sentence: Please do not disturb me while I’m working.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຢ່າລົບກວນຂ້ອຍໃນຂະນະທີ່ຂ້ອຍເຮັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: to dive (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: He loves to dive into the deep sea.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກດໍານ້ໍາເຂົ້າໄປໃນທະເລເລິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ດຳນ້ຳ
meaning list.sentence: The diver’s dive was impressive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການດໍານ້ໍາຂອງນັກດໍານ້ໍາແມ່ນປະທັບໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ່າງໆ, ທີ່ແຕກຕ່າງກັນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The city is known for its diverse population.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມືອງແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບປະຊາກອນທີ່ຫຼາກຫຼາຍຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຫຼາກຫຼາຍ, ຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: The country’s diversity makes it a unique place to visit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຫຼາກຫຼາຍຂອງປະເທດເຮັດໃຫ້ມັນເປັນສະຖານທີ່ທ່ອງທ່ຽວທີ່ເປັນເອກະລັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຢ່າຮ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: The divorce was finalized last week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຢ່າຮ້າງໄດ້ຖືກສໍາເລັດໃນອາທິດທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຢ່າຮ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: They decided to divorce after 10 years of marriage.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກສິບປີຂອງການແຕ່ງງານ, ເຂົາເຈົ້າຕັດສິນໃຈຢ່າຮ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເດັ່ນ, ເດັ່ນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: English is the dominant language in international business.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາສາອັງກິດເປັນພາສາທີ່ເດັ່ນໃນທຸລະກິດສາກົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການບໍລິຈາກ
meaning list.sentence: She made a generous donation to the charity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ບໍລິຈາກ​ເພື່ອ​ການ​ກຸສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The map was marked with a red dot to indicate the location.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນທີ່ຖືກໝາຍຈຸດສີແດງເພື່ອຊີ້ບອກສະຖານທີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຈກາງເມືອງ
meaning list.sentence: They live in a small apartment in the downtown area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາອາໄສຢູ່ໃນອາພາດເມັນຂະຫນາດນ້ອຍໃນໃຈກາງເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢູ່ໃຈກາງ
meaning list.sentence: The downtown stores are open late on weekends.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານຄ້າຢູ່ໃນໃຈກາງເມືອງແມ່ນເປີດຈົນກ່ວາທ້າຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄປທາງກາງ
meaning list.sentence: We took a bus downtown to visit the museum.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາໄປໃຈກາງເມືອງໂດຍລົດເມເພື່ອໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມພິພິທະພັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງເດັ່ນຊັດ, ຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The economy improved dramatically over the past year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສດຖະກິດໄດ້ປັບປຸງຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນປີທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄພແຫ້ງແລ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: The prolonged drought caused severe water shortages.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄພ​ແຫ້ງ​ແລ້ງ​ທີ່​ແກ່ຍາວ​ມາ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ການ​ຂາດ​ແຄນ​ນ້ຳ​ຢ່າງ​ຮ້າຍ​ແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜ້າເບື່ອ, ຈືດໆ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The lecture was so dull that many students fell asleep.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການບັນຍາຍແມ່ນໜ້າເບື່ອຈົນນັກຮຽນຫຼາຍຄົນນອນຫຼັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອກອອກ
meaning list.sentence: They dumped the garbage in the landfill.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າເອົາຂີ້ເຫຍື້ອໄປຖິ້ມໄວ້ໃນບ່ອນຖິ້ມຂີ້ເຫຍື້ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລຍະເວລາ, ໄລຍະເວລາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The duration of the flight is approximately three hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄລຍະເວລາການບິນແມ່ນປະມານສາມຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອນໄຫວ, ເຄື່ອນໄຫວ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a dynamic leader who inspires her team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ນໍາທີ່ມີການເຄື່ອນໄຫວທີ່ກະຕຸ້ນທີມງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສດຖະສາດ
meaning list.sentence: He is studying economics at university.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮຽນເສດຖະສາດຢູ່ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສດຖະສາດ
meaning list.sentence: An economist predicted the current economic crisis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກເສດຖະສາດໄດ້ຄາດຄະເນວິກິດການເສດຖະກິດໃນປະຈຸບັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນນາທິການ, ກ່ຽວກັບການພິມເຜີຍແຜ່
meaning list.sentence: The editorial team worked hard to publish the article on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານບັນນາທິການໄດ້ເຮັດວຽກຫນັກເພື່ອເຜີຍແຜ່ບົດຄວາມໃຫ້ທັນເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສິດທິພາບ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The new system processes data more efficiently.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະບົບໃຫມ່ປະມວນຜົນຂໍ້ມູນໄດ້ປະສິດທິພາບຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສອກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She injured her elbow while playing tennis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບບາດເຈັບສອກໃນຂະນະທີ່ຫຼີ້ນ tennis.

meaning list.meaning: ເອເລັກໂຕຣນິກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Modern electronics have revolutionized the way we live.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງ​ເອ​ເລັກ​ໂຕຣ​ນິກ​ທີ່​ທັນ​ສະ​ໄຫມ​ໄດ້​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ວິ​ທີ​ການ​ຊີ​ວິດ​ຂອງ​ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ຢ່າງ​ຫຼວງ​ຫຼາຍ​.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫງ່າງາມ, ມີສະໄຕລ໌ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She looked elegant in her evening gown.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງເບິ່ງສະຫງ່າງາມໃນຊຸດຕອນແລງຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນຖານ, ລະດັບເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He teaches elementary mathematics to young students.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສອນຄະນິດສາດພື້ນຖານໃຫ້ແກ່ນັກຮຽນຫນຸ່ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບລ້າງ, ລົບລ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: The goal is to eliminate errors in the system.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເປົ້າຫມາຍແມ່ນເພື່ອລົບລ້າງຄວາມຜິດພາດໃນລະບົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ກອດ, ຮັບປະທານ
meaning list.sentence: She embraced the new culture after moving abroad.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກຍ້າຍໄປຢູ່ຕ່າງປະເທດ, ລາວຍອມຮັບວັດທະນະທໍາໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: Oscillation, ການແຜ່ກະຈາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The factory reduced its carbon emissions to meet environmental regulations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງງານຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການປ່ອຍອາຍຄາບອນເພື່ອປະຕິບັດຕາມກົດລະບຽບສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາລົມ
meaning list.sentence: She was emotionally affected by the tragic news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບຜົນກະທົບທາງດ້ານຈິດໃຈຈາກຂ່າວທີ່ໂສກເສົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ອານາຈັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The Roman Empire was one of the greatest empires in history.
meaning list.sentence translation: Empire Roman ແມ່ນ​ຫນຶ່ງ​ໃນ​ຈັກ​ປະ​ເທດ​ທີ່​ໃຫຍ່​ທີ່​ສຸດ​ໃນ​ປະ​ຫວັດ​ສາດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ມ່ວນຊື່ນ, ມ່ວນຊື່ນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The vacation was enjoyable for the whole family.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວັນພັກແມ່ນມີຄວາມສຸກສໍາລັບຄອບຄົວທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມ່ວນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie was entertaining from start to finish.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາແມ່ນບັນເທີງຕັ້ງແຕ່ຕົ້ນຈົນຈົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ປະກອບການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The young entrepreneur launched a successful startup.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ປະກອບການໄວຫນຸ່ມເປີດຕົວທຸລະກິດສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳນາມ
meaning list.sentence: She sealed the envelope and sent the letter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ປະ​ທັບ​ຕາ​ຊອງ​ຈົດ​ໝາຍ​ແລະ​ສົ່ງ​ຈົດ​ໝາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໜອງ, ສະໜອງອຸປະກອນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The school is equipped with modern facilities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງຮຽນມີອຸປະກອນທີ່ທັນສະໄໝ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຽບເທົ່າ, ທຽບເທົ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: One euro is equivalent to approximately one dollar.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫນຶ່ງເອີໂຣແມ່ນປະມານເທົ່າກັບຫນຶ່ງໂດລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເໝີພາບ, ທຽບເທົ່າ
meaning list.sentence: The two jobs offer equivalent salaries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັງສອງວຽກໃຫ້ເງິນເດືອນທຽບເທົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸກ, ຍຸກ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The invention of the internet marked a new era of communication.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະດິດສ້າງຂອງອິນເຕີເນັດໄດ້ນຳໄປສູ່ຍຸກໃໝ່ໃນການສື່ສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ, ລະເບີດ
meaning list.sentence: The volcano erupted suddenly, causing widespread damage.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພູ​ເຂົາ​ໄຟ​ໄດ້​ລະ​ເບີດ​ຂຶ້ນ​ຢ່າງ​ກະ​ທັນ​ຫັນ, ສ້າງ​ຄວາມ​ເສຍ​ຫາຍ​ຢ່າງ​ກວ້າງ​ຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍພື້ນຖານແລ້ວ, ໂດຍພື້ນຖານແລ້ວ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The two proposals are essentially the same.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາແນະນໍາສອງຢ່າງແມ່ນສໍາຄັນຄືກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັນຍາບັນ, ສົມບັດສິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has a strong work ethic and is highly dedicated.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຈັນຍາບັນການເຮັດວຽກທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງແລະມີຄວາມຕັ້ງໃຈທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົນເຜົ່າ, ເຊື້ອຊາດ
meaning list.sentence: The city is known for its diverse ethnic communities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມືອງ​ນີ້​ແມ່ນ​ເປັນ​ທີ່​ຮູ້​ຈັກ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ຊຸມ​ຊົນ​ຊົນ​ເຜົ່າ​ທີ່​ຫຼາກ​ຫຼາຍ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ປະ​ເມີນ​ຜົນ
meaning list.sentence: The evaluation of the project will take several weeks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະເມີນໂຄງການຈະໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈະແຈ້ງ, ຈະແຈ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: Her talent is evident from her performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພອນສະຫວັນຂອງລາວແມ່ນເຫັນໄດ້ຊັດເຈນໃນການປະຕິບັດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິວັດທະນາການ, ການພັດທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: The evolution of technology has transformed our lives.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວິວັດທະນາການຂອງເຕັກໂນໂລຢີໄດ້ປ່ຽນຊີວິດຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັດທະນາ, ພັດທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: Over time, the company evolved into a global leader.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອເວລາຜ່ານໄປ, ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ກາຍເປັນຜູ້ນໍາທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກີນ, ຜ່ານ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The cost of the project exceeded our initial estimates.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍຂອງໂຄງການເກີນການຄາດຄະເນເບື້ອງຕົ້ນຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ້ຍົກເວັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: With the exception of one question, the test was easy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍົກເວັ້ນຄໍາຖາມຫນຶ່ງ, ການທົດສອບແມ່ນງ່າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກີນ, ເກີນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Excessive noise can harm your hearing over time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງເກີນໄປສາມາດທໍາລາຍການໄດ້ຍິນຂອງເຈົ້າໃນໄລຍະເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົກເວັ້ນ, ຍົກເວັ້ນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The list excludes items that are out of stock.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນຊີລາຍຊື່ດັ່ງກ່າວບໍ່ລວມເອົາລາຍການທີ່ບໍ່ໄດ້ຢູ່ໃນຫຼັກຊັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອສະແດງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The museum exhibits rare artifacts from ancient times.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນໄດ້ວາງສະແດງວັດຖຸບູຮານທີ່ຫາຍາກຈາກສະ ໄໝ ກ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ງານວາງສະແດງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The exhibit attracted thousands of visitors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານ​ວາງ​ສະ​ແດງ​ໄດ້​ດຶງ​ດູດ​ນັກ​ທ່ອງ​ທ່ຽວ​ນັບ​ພັນ​ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Please use the nearest exit in case of emergency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນກໍລະນີສຸກເສີນ, ກະລຸນາໃຊ້ທາງອອກທີ່ໃກ້ທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: exotic, ຕ່າງ​ປະ​ເທດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The restaurant offers a variety of exotic dishes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານອາຫານມີອາຫານແປກໆຫຼາກຫຼາຍຊະນິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະຫຍາຍ, ຂະຫຍາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company is planning an expansion into new markets.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຂະຫຍາຍໄປສູ່ຕະຫຼາດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ວິຊາສະເພາະ
meaning list.sentence: Her expertise in the field is highly respected.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຊໍານານຂອງລາວໃນພາກສະຫນາມແມ່ນໄດ້ຮັບການເຄົາລົບນັບຖືຢ່າງສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂູດຮີດ, ປະໂຫຍດ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The company was accused of exploiting its workers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຖືກກ່າວຫາວ່າຂູດຮີດແຮງງານຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: exposure (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Prolonged exposure to the sun can damage your skin.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສໍາຜັດກັບແສງແດດເປັນເວລາດົນສາມາດເຮັດໃຫ້ຜິວຫນັງຂອງທ່ານເສຍຫາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະຫຍາຍ, ຂະຫຍາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The extension of the deadline gave them more time to complete the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຂະຫຍາຍເສັ້ນຕາຍເຮັດໃຫ້ພວກເຂົາມີເວລາຫຼາຍຂຶ້ນເພື່ອເຮັດສໍາເລັດໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ, ກວ້າງຂວາງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The report includes an extensive analysis of the data.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານປະກອບມີການວິເຄາະທີ່ສົມບູນແບບຂອງຂໍ້ມູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກວ້າງ, ກວ້າງຂວາງ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She has traveled extensively in Europe.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເດີນທາງຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງໃນເອີຣົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັກ, ຮັກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She is very fond of her pet dog.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮັກຫມາສັດລ້ຽງຂອງລາວຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂງ່, ໂງ່
meaning list.sentence: Only a fool would believe such a ridiculous story.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີແຕ່ຄົນໂງ່ເທົ່ານັ້ນທີ່ຈະເຊື່ອເລື່ອງຕະຫຼົກດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫ້າມ
meaning list.sentence: Smoking is strictly forbidden in this building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານນີ້ຫ້າມສູບຢາຢ່າງເຂັ້ມງວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄາດເດົາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The weather forecast predicts rain for tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍາກອນອາກາດຄາດຄະເນຝົນຕົກສໍາລັບມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮີດ
meaning list.sentence: They forecast a rise in temperatures next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າຄາດຄະເນວ່າອຸນຫະພູມຈະເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນໃນອາທິດຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບແບບ, ຮູບແບບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The file is saved in PDF format.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄຟລ໌ໄດ້ຖືກບັນທຶກໄວ້ໃນຮູບແບບ PDF.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບແບບ, ຮູບຮ່າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The formation of the team took several months.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສ້າງທີມງານໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນອະດີດ, ກ່ອນຫນ້ານີ້ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She was formerly a teacher before becoming a writer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຄີຍເປັນຄູສອນກ່ອນທີ່ຈະກາຍເປັນນັກຂຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຊກດີ, ໂຊກດີ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He was fortunate to survive the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໂຊກດີທີ່ລອດຊີວິດຈາກອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເວທີສົນທະນາ, ເວທີສົນທະນາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The forum allowed experts to share their views on climate change.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເວທີ​ປາ​ໄສ​ໄດ້​ອະນຸຍາດ​ໃຫ້​ຜູ້​ຊ່ຽວຊານ​ແລກປ່ຽນ​ທັດສະນະ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ຂອງ​ດິນ​ຟ້າ​ອາກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຟອດຊິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The museum has an impressive collection of dinosaur fossils.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນມີການເກັບກໍາຟອດຊິວທໍາໄດໂນເສົາທີ່ຫນ້າປະທັບໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນຖານ, ພື້ນຖານ
meaning list.sentence: The foundation of the building is made of concrete.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນຖານຂອງອາຄານແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍຊີມັງ.

meaning list.sentence: He is the founder of a successful tech company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ກໍ່ຕັ້ງຂອງບໍລິສັດເຕັກໂນໂລຢີທີ່ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນ, ສ່ວນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A small fraction of the population lives in rural areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາກອນສ່ວນນ້ອຍອາໄສຢູ່ໃນເຂດຊົນນະບົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊິ້ນ, ຊິ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The archaeologists discovered fragments of ancient pottery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກໂບຮານຄະດີຄົ້ນພົບເຄື່ອງປັ້ນດິນເຜົາບູຮານ.

meaning list.meaning: ກອບ, ໂຄງສ້າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The framework of the new policy was well-defined.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂອບ​ເຂດ​ຂອງ​ນະ​ໂຍ​ບາຍ​ໃໝ່​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ກຳ​ນົດ​ຢ່າງ​ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສໍ້ໂກງ, ການສໍ້ໂກງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company was accused of committing fraud.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຖືກກ່າວຫາວ່າມີການສໍ້ໂກງ.

meaning list.meaning: freely, freely (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The birds were flying freely in the open sky.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນົກບິນໄດ້ຢ່າງເສລີໃນທ້ອງຟ້າທີ່ຈະແຈ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລື້ອຍໆ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a frequent visitor to the museum.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ເຂົ້າຊົມຫໍພິພິທະພັນເລື້ອຍໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນລຸ, ເພື່ອຕອບສະຫນອງ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He fulfilled his dream of becoming a doctor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບຮູ້ຄວາມຝັນຂອງລາວທີ່ຢາກເປັນທ່ານຫມໍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕັມເວລາ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She works full-time as a teacher.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສອນເຕັມເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕັມເວລາ
meaning list.sentence: He is studying full-time for his degree.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກເຕັມເວລາເພື່ອຮັບປະລິນຍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍ​ພື້ນ​ຖານ​ແລ້ວ​, ໂດຍ​ພື້ນ​ຖານ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: Their ideas are fundamentally different.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນວຄວາມຄິດຂອງພວກເຂົາແມ່ນແຕກຕ່າງກັນໂດຍພື້ນຖານ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຈຮ້າຍ, ໃຈຮ້າຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was furious when she found out about the mistake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຄຽດ​ແຄ້ນ​ເມື່ອ​ໄດ້​ຮຽນ​ຮູ້​ຄວາມ​ຜິດ​ພາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກມ, ອຸດສາຫະກໍາເກມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The gaming industry has grown rapidly in recent years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸດສາຫະກໍາເກມໄດ້ເຕີບໂຕຢ່າງໄວວາໃນຊຸມປີທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The survey includes data on gender and age.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສໍາຫຼວດປະກອບມີຂໍ້ມູນກ່ຽວກັບເພດແລະອາຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັນທຸ ກຳ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Scientists are studying genes to understand hereditary diseases.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດສຶກສາພັນທຸກໍາເພື່ອເຂົ້າໃຈພະຍາດທີ່ສືບທອດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັນທຸ ກຳ, ພັນທຸ ກຳ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The disease has a genetic component.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍາດດັ່ງກ່າວມີອົງປະກອບທາງພັນທຸກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດສະລິຍະ, ປັນຍາອ່ອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Einstein is considered a genius in the field of physics.
meaning list.sentence translation: Einstein ຖືກພິຈາລະນາເປັນ genius ໃນພາກສະຫນາມຂອງຟີຊິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ແທ້ຈິງ, ແທ້ຈິງ
meaning list.sentence: The painting is a genuine masterpiece.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບແຕ້ມແມ່ນເປັນ masterpiece ທີ່ແທ້ຈິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແທ້ໆ, ດ້ວຍຄວາມຈິງໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: She was genuinely surprised by the unexpected gift.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແປກໃຈແທ້ໆກັບຂອງຂວັນທີ່ບໍ່ຄາດຄິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ທ່າທາງ, ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She made a friendly gesture by waving at the crowd.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດທ່າທາງທີ່ເປັນມິດໂດຍການໂບກມືໄປຫາຝູງຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄອນເສີດ, ການສະແດງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The band’s gig last night was amazing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອນເສີດຂອງວົງໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາແມ່ນດີຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂລກາພິວັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Globalization has made international trade easier.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລກາພິວັດໄດ້ອຳນວຍຄວາມສະດວກໃຫ້ແກ່ການຄ້າສາກົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂລກ, ໂລກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company has offices all around the globe.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດມີຫ້ອງການທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ທອງ, ເຫຼື້ອມ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The sunset painted the sky in golden hues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕາເວັນຕົກແຕ່ງທ້ອງຟ້າເປັນສີທອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸນງາມຄວາມດີ, ຄຸນງາມຄວາມດີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her kindness and goodness made her loved by all.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມເມດຕາແລະຄວາມດີຂອງລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວເປັນທີ່ຮັກຂອງທຸກໆຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ງົດງາມ, ເປັນຕາຈັບໃຈ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bride looked absolutely gorgeous on her wedding day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາວເບິ່ງງາມແທ້ໆໃນມື້ແຕ່ງງານຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ປົກຄອງ, ຜູ້ບໍລິຫານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The governor announced new policies to improve education.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າແຂວງປະກາດນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່ເພື່ອປັບປຸງການສຶກສາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບພາບ, ສາຍຕາ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book includes graphic illustrations of the process.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມປະກອບມີຮູບປະກອບຮູບພາບຂອງຂະບວນການ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຣາບຟິກ, ສາຍຕາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The game’s graphics are stunningly realistic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບ​ພາບ​ຂອງ​ເກມ​ແມ່ນ​ເປັນ​ຈິງ strikingly​.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼາຍ, ສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The new technology has greatly improved efficiency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຕັກໂນໂລຢີໃຫມ່ໄດ້ເພີ່ມປະສິດທິພາບຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮືອນແກ້ວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The greenhouse is filled with tropical plants.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອນແກ້ວເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍພືດເຂດຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ານຂາຍເຄື່ອງຍ່ອຍ, ຂາຍເຄື່ອງແຫ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She went to the store to buy some groceries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄປຮ້ານຂາຍເຄື່ອງແຫ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳແນະນຳ, ຄຳແນະນຳ
meaning list.sentence: The company has issued new guidelines for employee behavior.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ອອກຄໍາແນະນໍາໃຫມ່ສໍາລັບການປະພຶດຂອງພະນັກງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນທີ່ດໍາລົງຊີວິດ, ສະພາບແວດລ້ອມທໍາມະຊາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Deforestation is destroying the natural habitat of many species.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕັດໄມ້ທຳລາຍປ່າທຳລາຍຖິ່ນທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສຕາມທຳມະຊາດຂອງຫຼາຍຊະນິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພອດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The ships are anchored in the harbour.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຳ​ປັ່ນ​ຖືກ​ຈອດ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ທ່າ​ກຳ​ປັ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳນັກງານໃຫຍ່, ສຳນັກງານໃຫຍ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company’s headquarters are located in New York.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດມີສໍານັກງານໃຫຍ່ຢູ່ໃນນິວຢອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປິ່ນປົວ, ປິ່ນປົວ
meaning list.sentence: The wound will take time to heal completely.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນຈະໃຊ້ເວລາສໍາລັບບາດແຜທີ່ຈະປິ່ນປົວຢ່າງສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການບໍລິການສຸຂະພາບ
meaning list.sentence: Access to affordable healthcare is a priority for the government.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເຂົ້າເຖິງການດູແລສຸຂະພາບທີ່ມີລາຄາຖືກແມ່ນບູລິມະສິດຂອງລັດຖະບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ໝວກກັນກະທົບ
meaning list.sentence: You should always wear a helmet while riding a bike.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຄວນໃສ່ໝວກກັນກະທົບສະເໝີ ເວລາຂີ່ລົດຖີບ.

meaning list.meaning: ດັ່ງນັ້ນ, ດັ່ງນັ້ນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She is a native speaker, hence her fluency in English.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເນື່ອງຈາກພາສາກໍາເນີດຂອງລາວແມ່ນພາສາອັງກິດ, ລາວມີຄວາມຄ່ອງແຄ້ວໃນພາສາອັງກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: Ot, bitki (isim)
meaning list.sentence: Basil is a popular herb used in Italian cooking.
meaning list.sentence translation: Basil ເປັນພືດສະຫມຸນໄພທີ່ນິຍົມໃຊ້ໃນອາຫານອິຕາລີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມລັບ, ເຊື່ອງໄວ້
meaning list.sentence: They discovered a hidden treasure in the old house.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າຄົ້ນພົບຊັບສົມບັດທີ່ເຊື່ອງໄວ້ໃນເຮືອນເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງຫຼວງ, ທາງຫຼວງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The highway was closed due to an accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທາງດ່ວນໄດ້ຖືກປິດເນື່ອງຈາກອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕະຫລົກຫຼາຍ, ບັນເທີງ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie was so hilarious that everyone in the theater was laughing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາແມ່ນຕະຫລົກຫຼາຍທີ່ທຸກຄົນໃນໂຮງລະຄອນໄດ້ຫົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໂພກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He injured his hip during the football match.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບບາດເຈັບສະໂພກຂອງລາວໃນລະຫວ່າງການແຂ່ງຂັນບານເຕະ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກປະຫວັດສາດ
meaning list.sentence: The historian gave a lecture on ancient civilizations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກປະຫວັດສາດໄດ້ບັນຍາຍກ່ຽວກັບອາລະຍະທໍາບູຮານ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ມີທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ
meaning list.sentence: The organization provides shelter for homeless people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງສະຫນອງທີ່ພັກອາໄສສໍາລັບຄົນທີ່ບໍ່ມີທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊື່ສັດ
meaning list.sentence: Honesty is an important value in our family.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຊື່ສັດເປັນຄຸນຄ່າທີ່ສໍາຄັນໃນຄອບຄົວຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: Hook (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She hung her coat on the hook near the door.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ແຂວນ​ເສື້ອ​ຄຸມ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ໄວ້​ທີ່​ຂໍ​ຕໍ່​ໜ້າ​ປະ​ຕູ.

meaning list.meaning: Hopefully, hopefully (ຄໍາ​ອຸ​ປະ​ກອນ​)
meaning list.sentence: Hopefully, the weather will be nice for our picnic tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຫວັງວ່າອາກາດຈະດີສໍາລັບການກິນເຂົ້າປ່າໃນມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມອຶດຫິວ
meaning list.sentence: He couldn’t focus on his work due to hunger.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ສາມາດສຸມໃສ່ວຽກຂອງລາວໄດ້ຍ້ອນຄວາມອຶດຫິວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມມຸດຕິຖານ, ສົມມຸດຕິຖານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist proposed a hypothesis to explain the phenomenon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ວາງສົມມຸດຕິຖານເພື່ອອະທິບາຍປະກົດການດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄອຄອນ, ໄອຄອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The app’s icon is easy to recognize.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄອຄອນຂອງແອັບແມ່ນສາມາດຮັບຮູ້ໄດ້ງ່າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ID (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You need to show your ID to enter the building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງສະແດງບັດປະຈໍາຕົວຂອງທ່ານເພື່ອເຂົ້າໄປໃນອາຄານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄືກັນ, ຄືກັນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The two dresses are identical in design.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສອງ dresses ແມ່ນຄືກັນໃນການອອກແບບ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາບລວງຕາ, ພາບລວງຕາ
meaning list.sentence: The magician created an illusion that amazed the audience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ magician ໄດ້ສ້າງພາບລວງຕາທີ່ເຮັດໃຫ້ຜູ້ຊົມແປກໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນເຂົ້າເມືອງ, ຄົນເຂົ້າເມືອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government introduced new immigration policies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານໄດ້ແນະນໍານະໂຍບາຍຄົນເຂົ້າເມືອງໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ພູມຕ້ານທານ, ທົນທານ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: After vaccination, she became immune to the disease.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກການສັກຢາປ້ອງກັນ, ລາວໄດ້ກາຍເປັນພູມຕ້ານທານກັບພະຍາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດ, ປະຕິບັດ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The government plans to implement new education reforms.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະປະຕິບັດການປະຕິຮູບການສຶກສາໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມມຸດຕິຖານ, ສະຫຼຸບ
meaning list.sentence: The study's implications for public health are significant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນສະທ້ອນຂອງການຄົ້ນຄວ້າສໍາລັບສຸຂະພາບສາທາລະນະແມ່ນມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊຸກຍູ້, ຈູງໃຈ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company offers financial incentives to increase productivity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດສະເຫນີແຮງຈູງໃຈທາງດ້ານການເງິນເພື່ອເພີ່ມຜົນຜະລິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລວມ, ສົມທົບ
meaning list.sentence: The designer incorporated modern elements into the traditional layout.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ອອກແບບໄດ້ລວມເອົາອົງປະກອບທີ່ທັນສະໄຫມເຂົ້າໄປໃນຮູບແບບພື້ນເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດ, ຜິດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The report contains incorrect data that needs to be revised.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານມີຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງທີ່ຕ້ອງໄດ້ຮັບການແກ້ໄຂ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອກະລາດ
meaning list.sentence: The country celebrates its independence every year on this date.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດໄດ້ສະຫຼອງວັນປະກາດເອກະລາດຂອງຕົນໃນທຸກໆປີ.

meaning list.meaning: Directory, index (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book includes an index for quick reference.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມປະກອບມີດັດຊະນີສໍາລັບການອ້າງອີງໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວຊີ້ບອກ, ສັນຍາລັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Dark clouds are an indication of an approaching storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມກມືດເປັນສັນຍານຂອງພະຍຸທີ່ໃກ້ເຂົ້າມາແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼີກລ່ຽງບໍ່ໄດ້ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Change is inevitable in any growing organization.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປ່ຽນແປງເປັນສິ່ງທີ່ຫຼີກລ່ຽງບໍ່ໄດ້ໃນທຸກອົງກອນທີ່ເຕີບໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼີກລ່ຽງບໍ່ໄດ້
meaning list.sentence: Inevitably, there were some mistakes in the early stages of the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນ່ນອນວ່າ, ມີຂໍ້ບົກຜ່ອງບາງຢ່າງໃນໄລຍະຕົ້ນຂອງໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫຼຸບ, ແຕ້ມຄວາມໝາຍ
meaning list.sentence: From her tone, he inferred that she was angry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສາມາດບອກໄດ້ຈາກນໍ້າສຽງຂອງນາງວ່ານາງໃຈຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດຕາເງິນເຟີ້, ລາຄາເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The government is taking measures to control inflation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານກໍາລັງໃຊ້ມາດຕະການຄວບຄຸມອັດຕາເງິນເຟີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ້ມູນ (ຫຍໍ້) (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: For more info, visit our website.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢ້ຽມຢາມເວັບໄຊທ໌ຂອງພວກເຮົາສໍາລັບຂໍ້ມູນເພີ່ມເຕີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄງສ້າງພື້ນຖານ
meaning list.sentence: The government invested heavily in improving the country's infrastructure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານ​ໄດ້​ລົງທຶນ​ຢ່າງ​ຫຼວງ​ຫຼາຍ​ເພື່ອ​ປັບປຸງ​ພື້ນຖານ​ໂຄງ​ລ່າງ​ຂອງ​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫງົບ, ຄົນນັ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The city has over a million inhabitants.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຫຼາຍກວ່າຫນຶ່ງລ້ານຄົນຢູ່ໃນເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສືບທອດ, ສືບທອດ
meaning list.sentence: She inherited her grandmother's jewelry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ສືບທອດເຄື່ອງປະດັບຂອງແມ່ຕູ້ຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫມຶກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The printer is out of ink and needs a refill.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງພິມບໍ່ມີຫມຶກ ແລະຕ້ອງການເຕີມເຕັມ.

meaning list.meaning: ນະວັດຕະກໍາ, ນະວັດຕະກໍາ (noun)
meaning list.sentence: The company is known for its commitment to innovation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບຄໍາຫມັ້ນສັນຍາຂອງຕົນໃນການປະດິດສ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ນະວັດຕະກຳ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new phone features an innovative design.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂທລະສັບໃຫມ່ມີການອອກແບບໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: input, ຂໍ້​ມູນ
meaning list.sentence: We need your input on the project before finalizing it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຕ້ອງການຂໍ້ມູນຂອງທ່ານກ່ອນທີ່ຈະສໍາເລັດໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: to place, to add (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: Please insert your card into the machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາໃສ່ບັດຂອງເຈົ້າໃສ່ເຄື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ກວດກາ, ຜູ້ກວດສອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The inspector checked the building for safety violations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ກວດກາໄດ້ກວດກາອາຄານສໍາລັບການລະເມີດຄວາມປອດໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຕິດຕັ້ງ, ປະກອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The installation of the new software took less than an hour.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕິດຕັ້ງຊອບແວໃໝ່ໃຊ້ເວລາໜ້ອຍກວ່າໜຶ່ງຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັນທີ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She received an instant reply to her message.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບການຕອບຮັບທັນທີຕໍ່ກັບຂໍ້ຄວາມຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັນ​ທີ, ທັນ​ທີ​ທັນ​ໃດ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: The program closed instantly after the error occurred.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ຄວາມ​ຜິດ​ພາດ​ໄດ້​ເກີດ​ຂຶ້ນ​, ໂຄງ​ການ​ໄດ້​ປິດ​ທັນ​ທີ​.

meaning list.meaning: to integrate, ການ​ປະ​ສົມ​ປະ​ສານ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The new system integrates seamlessly with existing software.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະບົບໃຫມ່ປະສົມປະສານ seamlessly ກັບຊອບແວທີ່ມີຢູ່ແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິດໃຈ, ປັນຍາ
meaning list.sentence: He is known for his intellectual achievements.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບຜົນສໍາເລັດທາງປັນຍາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຕ້ຕອບ
meaning list.sentence: Children learn language by interacting with adults.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍຮຽນຮູ້ພາສາໂດຍການພົວພັນກັບຜູ້ໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິກິລິຍາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher encouraged interaction among students.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ຊຸກຍູ້ໃຫ້ມີການພົວພັນລະຫວ່າງນັກຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳເຫັນ, ການຕີຄວາມໝາຍ
meaning list.sentence: Her interpretation of the poem was insightful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕີຄວາມ ໝາຍ ຂອງບົດກະວີຂອງລາວແມ່ນຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົ້ນຫາ, ໄລຍະເວລາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a short interval between the two acts of the play.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການພັກຜ່ອນສັ້ນລະຫວ່າງສອງການຫຼິ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບຸກລຸກ, ຍຶດຄອງ
meaning list.sentence: The army invaded the neighboring country without warning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງທັບ​ໄດ້​ບຸກ​ເຂົ້າ​ໄປ​ປະ​ເທດ​ບ້ານ​ໃກ້​ເຮືອນ​ຄຽງ​ໂດຍ​ບໍ່​ມີ​ການ​ເຕືອນ​ໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ການບຸກລຸກ, ການໂຈມຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The invasion caused widespread panic among the population.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ບຸກ​ໂຈມ​ຕີ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ປະຊາຊົນ​ຕື່ນ​ຕົກ​ໃຈ​ຢ່າງ​ກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກລົງທຶນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The investor decided to support the new startup.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກລົງທຶນຕັດສິນໃຈສະຫນັບສະຫນູນບໍລິສັດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດດ່ຽວ, ໂດດດ່ຽວ
meaning list.sentence: The scientist isolated the bacteria for further study.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ແຍກແບັກທີເຣັຍເພື່ອການສຶກສາຕື່ມອີກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດດ່ຽວ, ໂດດດ່ຽວ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The village is isolated from the rest of the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບ້ານແມ່ນໂດດດ່ຽວຈາກສ່ວນທີ່ເຫຼືອຂອງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He was sentenced to five years in jail.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຖືກຕັດສິນໂທດຈໍາຄຸກຫ້າປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈໍາຄຸກ
meaning list.sentence: The criminal was jailed for robbery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະດີອາຍາໄດ້ຖືກຈໍາຄຸກຍ້ອນການລັກລອບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົນຍົນ
meaning list.sentence: The jet landed smoothly on the runway.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍົນ​ລຳ​ນີ້​ໄດ້​ລົງ​ຈອດ​ຢູ່​ເທິງ​ທາງ​ແລ່ນ​ໂດຍ​ບໍ່​ມີ​ບັນຫາ​ໃດໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາມັນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The two companies launched a joint project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັງສອງບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນໂຄງການຮ່ວມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ່ວມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She felt pain in her knee joint after the run.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ການ​ແລ່ນ​, ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຮູ້​ສຶກ​ເຈັບ​ປວດ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ຂໍ້​ເຂົ່າ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກຂ່າວ, ລາຍງານ
meaning list.sentence: She studied journalism at university.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮຽນນັກຂ່າວຢູ່ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄະນະຕຸລາການ, ຄະນະສານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The jury delivered a unanimous verdict.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະລູກຂຸນໄດ້ກັບຄືນຄໍາຕັດສິນເປັນເອກະສັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ອງ, ອຸປະກອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The first aid kit is stored in the cabinet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊຸດປະຖົມພະຍາບານຖືກເກັບໄວ້ໃນຕູ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັ້ນໄດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He climbed the ladder to reach the top shelf.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປີນຂັ້ນໄດເພື່ອເຂົ້າຫາຊັ້ນວາງເທິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລົງຈອດ
meaning list.sentence: The plane made a smooth landing at the airport.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍົນໄດ້ລົງຈອດຢູ່ສະໜາມບິນໂດຍບໍ່ມີບັນຫາໃດໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສັ້ນທາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Drivers should stay in their designated lanes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຂັບຂີ່ຕ້ອງຢູ່ໃນເສັ້ນທາງທີ່ກໍານົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫວ່າງມໍ່ໆນີ້
meaning list.sentence: I haven’t seen her much lately.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ໄດ້ເຫັນລາວຫຼາຍບໍ່ດົນມານີ້.
