meaning list.meaning: ແຜ່ນພັບ, ໃບປິວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The leaflet contains information about local attractions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜ່ນພັບມີຂໍ້ມູນກ່ຽວກັບສະຖານທີ່ທ່ອງທ່ຽວທ້ອງຖິ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນິທານ, ນິທານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The legend of the dragon has been told for centuries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນິທານຂອງມັງກອນໄດ້ຖືກບອກມາຫຼາຍສັດຕະວັດແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ແວ່ນຕາ, ແວ່ນຕາ
meaning list.sentence: He cleaned the camera lens before taking the photo.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດຄວາມສະອາດເລນກ້ອງຖ່າຍຮູບກ່ອນທີ່ຈະຖ່າຍຮູບ.

meaning list.meaning: lifespan, lifespan (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This experience is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະສົບການນີ້ເປັນໂອກາດຄັ້ງດຽວໃນຊີວິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແສງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The lighting in the room is soft and pleasant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແສງສະຫວ່າງໃນຫ້ອງແມ່ນອ່ອນແລະເປັນສຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊັ່ນດຽວກັນ, ຄ້າຍຄືກັນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The food was excellent, and the service was likewise outstanding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຫານແມ່ນດີເລີດແລະການບໍລິການຍັງໂດດເດັ່ນເທົ່າທຽມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຳກັດ, ຈຳກັດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new law imposes limitations on advertising.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດຫມາຍໃຫມ່ວາງຂໍ້ຈໍາກັດກ່ຽວກັບການໂຄສະນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳສັບ
meaning list.sentence: The phrase ‘raining cats and dogs’ is not meant to be taken literally.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາວ່າ 'ຝົນແມວ ແລະ ໝາ' ບໍ່ຄວນຖືກເອົາຕາມຕົວໜັງສື.

meaning list.meaning: ວັນນະຄະດີ
meaning list.sentence: The author received a prestigious literary award.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຂຽນໄດ້ຮັບລາງວັນວັນນະຄະດີທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bottle holds one litre of water.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແກ້ວບັນຈຸນ້ໍາຫນຶ່ງລິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້​ເຫຍື້ອ (ຄຳ​ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The park was covered in litter after the festival.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກງານບຸນ, ສວນສາທາລະນະໄດ້ຖືກປົກຄຸມດ້ວຍຂີ້ເຫຍື້ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂລໂກ້, ໄອຄອນ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: The company redesigned its logo to appeal to younger audiences.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ອອກແບບໂລໂກ້ຂອງຕົນຄືນໃໝ່ເພື່ອດຶງດູດຜູ້ຊົມທີ່ໜຸ່ມກວ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫວຍ, ເກມໂອກາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She won a large sum of money in the lottery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊະນະເງິນຈໍານວນຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນຫວຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈົງຮັກພັກດີ, ຊື່ສັດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He has been a loyal friend for many years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເປັນ​ເພື່ອນ​ທີ່​ສັດ​ຊື່​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ຫຼາຍ​ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເນື້ອເພງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The lyrics of the song are very meaningful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເນື້ອ​ໃນ​ຂອງ​ເພງ​ແມ່ນ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ຫມາຍ​ຫຼາຍ​.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫງ່າງາມ, ສະຫງ່າງາມ
meaning list.sentence: The view from the top of the mountain is magnificent.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັດ​ສະ​ນະ​ຈາກ​ເທິງ​ຂອງ​ພູ​ເຂົາ​ແມ່ນ​ທີ່​ສວຍ​ງາມ​.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕ່ງໜ້າ
meaning list.sentence: She always carries her make-up kit with her.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ເອົາກະເປົາໃສ່ເຄື່ອງແຕ່ງໜ້າຢູ່ສະເໝີ.

meaning list.meaning: ການກໍ່ສ້າງ, ການຜະລິດ
meaning list.sentence: The making of the film took over a year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາໄດ້ໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍກວ່າຫນຶ່ງປີເພື່ອຜະລິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜະລິດ, ຜະລິດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The factory manufactures high-quality furniture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງງານຜະລິດເຟີນີເຈີທີ່ມີຄຸນນະພາບສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຜະລິດ, ການຜະລິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Manufacturing has been the backbone of the economy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຜະລິດແມ່ນກະດູກສັນຫຼັງຂອງເສດຖະກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາຣາທອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She trained for months to run the marathon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຝຶກອົບຮົມເປັນເວລາຫຼາຍເດືອນເພື່ອແລ່ນມາຣາທອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອບ, ຂອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The text should be aligned within the page margins.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ຄວາມຄວນຖືກຈັດຢູ່ໃນຂອບຂອງຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງໝາຍ, ເຄື່ອງໝາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The marker shows the exact location of the treasure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງຫມາຍສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນສະຖານທີ່ທີ່ແນ່ນອນຂອງສົມກຽດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວກັບສົງຄາມ, ທະຫານ
meaning list.sentence: He is skilled in various martial arts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມຊໍານິຊໍານານໃນສິລະ martial ຕ່າງໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ໝູ່, ຄູ່ສົມລົດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is my best mate from school.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຫມູ່ທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດຂອງຂ້ອຍຈາກໂຮງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫາຄູ່, ຫາຄູ່ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The birds mate during the spring season.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນົກຫາຄູ່ໃນພາກຮຽນ spring.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈົ້າເມືອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The mayor promised to improve public transportation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຄອງນະຄອນສັນຍາວ່າຈະປັບປຸງການຂົນສົ່ງສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົນຈັກ, ກົນຈັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The mechanic fixed the car in no time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊ່າງສ້ອມແປງລົດໃນເວລາສັ້ນໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົນຈັກ, ກ່ຽວກັບເຄື່ອງຈັກ (ນາມສະກຸນ)
meaning list.sentence: The clock uses a mechanical movement to keep time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂມງໃຊ້ກົນໄກກົນຈັກເພື່ອບອກເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົນໄກ, ກົນຈັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The locking mechanism is very secure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົນໄກການລັອກແມ່ນປອດໄພຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຽນໄຊ, ຫຼຽນໄຊ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She won a gold medal in the swimming competition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບຫຼຽນຄໍາໃນການແຂ່ງຂັນລອຍນ້ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢາ, ຢາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is on medication for high blood pressure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກໍາລັງກິນຢາສໍາລັບຄວາມດັນເລືອດສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະມາຊິກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her gym membership expires next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເປັນສະມາຊິກຫ້ອງອອກກໍາລັງກາຍຂອງລາວຈະໝົດອາຍຸໃນເດືອນໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: Unforgettable, ຄວນ​ຈະ​ຈື່​ຈໍາ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Their wedding was a memorable event.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຕ່ງງານຂອງພວກເຂົາເປັນເຫດການທີ່ບໍ່ສາມາດລືມໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳປຽບທຽບ, ຄຳນາມ
meaning list.sentence: The poet used a metaphor to describe her feelings.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກກະວີໄດ້ໃຊ້ຄໍາປຽບທຽບເພື່ອພັນລະນາຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຮ່ທາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The miners work long hours underground.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນງານບໍ່ແຮ່ເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ໃຕ້ດິນຫຼາຍຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂສກເສົ້າ, ໂສກເສົ້າຫຼາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She felt miserable after losing her job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກບໍ່ພໍໃຈຫຼາຍຫຼັງຈາກສູນເສຍວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບແບບ, ຮູບແບບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The device has several modes for different functions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸ​ປະ​ກອນ​ມີ​ຫຼາຍ​ຮູບ​ແບບ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ການ​ທໍາ​ງານ​ທີ່​ແຕກ​ຕ່າງ​ກັນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນໂຍນ, ອ່ອນໂຍນ (ນາມສະກຸນ)
meaning list.sentence: He was very modest about his achievements.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມຖ່ອມຕົວຫຼາຍກ່ຽວກັບຜົນສໍາເລັດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັດປະຫລາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The children were scared of the monster in the story.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍມີຄວາມຢ້ານກົວຂອງ monster ໃນເລື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຈໍາເດືອນ
meaning list.sentence: The company issues a monthly newsletter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ພິມຈົດຫມາຍຂ່າວປະຈໍາເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອານຸສາວະລີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The monument honors soldiers who died in the war.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອະນຸສາວະລີ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ໃຫ້ກຽດ​ແກ່​ບັນດາ​ນັກຮົບ​ທີ່​ເສຍ​ຊີວິດ​ໃນ​ສົງຄາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ນອກ​ຈາກ​ນັ້ນ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: The plan is practical and, moreover, cost-effective.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນ​ການ​ແມ່ນ​ການ​ປະ​ຕິ​ບັດ​ແລະ​ຍັງ​ປະ​ສິດ​ທິ​ຜົນ​ຄ່າ​ໃຊ້​ຈ່າຍ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຈໍານອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They took out a mortgage to buy their first home.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ອອກຈໍານອງເພື່ອຊື້ເຮືອນທໍາອິດຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: Mosque (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The mosque is located in the center of the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂບດດັ່ງກ່າວຕັ້ງຢູ່ໃນໃຈກາງເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວ
meaning list.sentence: The car was in motion when the accident occurred.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດກຳລັງເຄື່ອນທີ່ ເມື່ອຮອດຈຸດເກີດເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈູງໃຈ, ຊຸກຍູ້
meaning list.sentence: Her teachers motivated her to pursue a career in science.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູສອນຂອງລາວໄດ້ກະຕຸ້ນລາວໃຫ້ເຮັດອາຊີບວິທະຍາສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈູງໃຈ, ຊຸກຍູ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The promise of a bonus served as a motivation for the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາສັນຍາຂອງໂບນັດໄດ້ຮັບໃຊ້ເປັນແຮງຈູງໃຈສໍາລັບທີມງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕະ, ເຄື່ອນຍ້າຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie was deeply moving and brought tears to many eyes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາໄດ້ສໍາຜັດຫຼາຍແລະເອົານ້ໍາຕາຂອງຫຼາຍຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນິທານ, ນິທານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The story is a myth passed down through generations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເລື່ອງເລົ່າເປັນນິທານທີ່ສືບທອດກັນມາຫຼາຍລຸ້ນຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປືອຍກາຍ, ເປີດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He stood barefoot on the grass with his naked feet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢືນດ້ວຍຕີນເປົ່າຢູ່ເທິງຫຍ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ດີ, ugly (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The weather turned nasty just before the picnic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາກາດເລີ່ມບໍ່ດີກ່ອນໄປກິນເຂົ້າປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ນໍາ​ທາງ, wayfinding (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Modern cars come equipped with advanced navigation systems.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດທີ່ທັນສະໄຫມມີການຕິດຕັ້ງລະບົບນໍາທາງກ້າວຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃກ້, ອ້ອມ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: There is a park nearby where we can have a picnic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີສວນສາທາລະນະຢູ່ໃກ້ໆບ່ອນທີ່ພວກເຮົາສາມາດກິນເຂົ້າປ່າໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໃກ້ໆ, ອ້ອມ
meaning list.sentence: He found a restaurant nearby to have lunch.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພົບຮ້ານອາຫານໃກ້ຄຽງສໍາລັບອາຫານທ່ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຈໍາເປັນ, ພັນທະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Water is a basic necessity for survival.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ໍາແມ່ນມີຄວາມຈໍາເປັນພື້ນຖານສໍາລັບການຢູ່ລອດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈລະຈາ, ເຈລະຈາ
meaning list.sentence: The two companies are negotiating a merger deal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດທັງສອງກໍາລັງເຈລະຈາຂໍ້ຕົກລົງການລວມຕົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເຈລະຈາ, ການປະຊຸມ
meaning list.sentence: The negotiation between the two parties lasted for hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ເຈລະຈາ​ລະຫວ່າງ​ສອງ​ຝ່າຍ​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ໄປ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ຫຼາຍ​ຊົ່ວ​ໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸດຕິທຳ, ເປັນກາງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Switzerland remained neutral during the war.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະວິດເຊີແລນຍັງຄົງເປັນກາງໃນລະຫວ່າງສົງຄາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃໝ່, ໃນທາງໃໝ່
meaning list.sentence: The newly opened restaurant is gaining popularity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານອາຫານເປີດໃໝ່ກຳລັງໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມນິຍົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາດຕະຖານ, ມາດຕະຖານ
meaning list.sentence: Wearing casual clothes to work has become the norm in many companies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໄປເຮັດວຽກໃນເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງແບບທໍາມະດາໄດ້ກາຍເປັນມາດຕະຖານໃນຫລາຍບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂນດບຸກ, ໂນດບຸກ
meaning list.sentence: He wrote his ideas in a notebook.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂຽນແນວຄວາມຄິດຂອງລາວຢູ່ໃນປື້ມບັນທຶກ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກປະພັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The novelist has published three bestsellers so far.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຂຽນນະວະນິຍາຍໄດ້ຕີພິມຂາຍດີທີ່ສຸດສາມຢ່າງຈົນເຖິງປະຈຸບັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນປັດຈຸບັນ, ມື້ນີ້ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: Nowadays, people rely heavily on technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນເຮົາອາໄສເທັກໂນໂລຍີຫຼາຍໃນທຸກມື້ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການພະຍາບານ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is studying nursing at the university.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງກໍາລັງຮຽນພະຍາບານຢູ່ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂພຊະນາການ
meaning list.sentence: Proper nutrition is essential for good health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂພຊະນາການທີ່ເຫມາະສົມແມ່ນຈໍາເປັນສໍາລັບສຸຂະພາບທີ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: Obesity (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Obesity is a major health issue in many countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລກອ້ວນເປັນບັນຫາສຸຂະພາບທີ່ສໍາຄັນໃນຫຼາຍປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ສັງເກດການ
meaning list.sentence: The observer noted every detail of the experiment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ສັງເກດການໄດ້ບັນທຶກທຸກລາຍລະອຽດຂອງການທົດລອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸປະສັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She overcame every obstacle in her path to success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຜ່ານ​ຜ່າ​ທຸກ​ອຸ​ປະ​ສັກ​ໃນ​ການ​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ໄປ​ສູ່​ຄວາມ​ສຳ​ເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາຊີບ, ອາຊີບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Teaching is a very rewarding occupation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສອນເປັນອາຊີບທີ່ພໍໃຈຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄອບຄອງ, ຄອບຄອງ
meaning list.sentence: The house has been occupied by the same family for decades.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອນໄດ້ຖືກຄອບຄອງໂດຍຄອບຄົວດຽວກັນສໍາລັບທົດສະວັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜິດ
meaning list.sentence: The offender was sentenced to five years in prison.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ກະທຳຜິດໄດ້ຖືກຕັດສິນຈຳຄຸກ 5 ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ສືບຕໍ່ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The ongoing project will be completed by next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການທີ່ດໍາເນີນຕໍ່ໄປຈະສໍາເລັດໃນເດືອນຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງເປີດເຜີຍ, ຊື່ສັດ
meaning list.sentence: He spoke openly about his mistakes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເວົ້າຢ່າງເປີດເຜີຍກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມຜິດພາດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: Opera (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They attended an opera performance last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມການສະແດງ Opera ໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: Operator, operator (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The machine operator ensured that the equipment was functioning properly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ປະຕິບັດງານເຄື່ອງຈັກຮັບປະກັນວ່າອຸປະກອນເຮັດວຽກຢ່າງຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແງ່ດີ
meaning list.sentence: She remains optimistic about her chances of getting the job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍັງຄົງມີຄວາມຫວັງໃນແງ່ດີກ່ຽວກັບໂອກາດຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າທີ່ຈະໄດ້ວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ວົງດົນຕີ
meaning list.sentence: The orchestra played a beautiful symphony.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວົງດົນຕີປະສານສຽງທີ່ງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ອິນຊີ, ທຳມະຊາດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They only buy organic vegetables from the market.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າຊື້ແຕ່ຜັກປອດສານພິດຈາກຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງ, ຊຸດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her outfit for the party was stylish and elegant.
meaning list.sentence translation: outfit ຂອງນາງສໍາລັບການພັກແມ່ນ chic ແລະ elegant.

meaning list.meaning: ຜົນຜະລິດ, ການຜະລິດ
meaning list.sentence: The factory's output has increased significantly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຜະລິດຂອງໂຮງງານໄດ້ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ດີເລີດ, ດີເລີດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She received an award for her outstanding performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບລາງວັນສໍາລັບການປະຕິບັດທີ່ດີເລີດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາຊະນະ, ເອົາຊະນະ
meaning list.sentence: She managed to overcome her fear of heights.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສາມາດເອົາຊະນະຄວາມຢ້ານກົວຂອງຄວາມສູງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ້າງຄືນ, ຄ້າງຄືນ
meaning list.sentence: The package was delivered overnight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊຸດໄດ້ຖືກຈັດສົ່ງຄືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ່າງປະເທດ, ຕ່າງປະເທດ (adverb, adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She decided to study overseas for her master’s degree.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັດສິນໃຈຮຽນປະລິນຍາໂທຢູ່ຕ່າງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນເຈົ້າຂອງ, ເປັນເຈົ້າຂອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company transferred ownership of the building to a private investor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ໂອນກຳມະສິດຂອງອາຄານໄປໃຫ້ນັກລົງທຶນເອກະຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອົກຊີເຈນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Plants release oxygen during photosynthesis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພືດປ່ອຍອົກຊີໃນລະຫວ່າງການສັງເຄາະແສງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖົງ, ຖົງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He bought a packet of biscuits from the store.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊື້ຂະຫນົມປັງຈາກຮ້ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົ້ນປາມ
meaning list.sentence: He held the coin in the palm of his hand.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖືເງິນຢູ່ໃນຝາມືຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: panic (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a moment of panic when the alarm sounded.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເມື່ອ​ສັນຍານ​ເຕືອນ​ອອກ​ໄປ, ກໍ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ຕື່ນ​ຕົກ​ໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະບວນແຫ່
meaning list.sentence: The parade attracted a large crowd of spectators.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂະບວນແຫ່ໄດ້ດຶງດູດຜູ້ຊົມເປັນຈຳນວນຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະໜານ
meaning list.sentence: The two roads run parallel to each other.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖະໜົນສອງສາຍນີ້ແລ່ນຂະໜານກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຄ້າຍຄືກັນ, ຄວາມຄ້າຍຄືກັນ
meaning list.sentence: There are many parallels between the two cases.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຫຼາຍຂະຫນານລະຫວ່າງສອງກໍລະນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ການມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມ
meaning list.sentence: Active participation in class discussions is encouraged.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມຢ່າງຫ້າວຫັນໃນການສົນທະນາໃນຫ້ອງຮຽນແມ່ນຊຸກຍູ້ໃຫ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຸ້ນສ່ວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The two companies formed a partnership to develop new technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດທັງສອງໄດ້ສ້າງຕັ້ງການຮ່ວມມືເພື່ອພັດທະນາເຕັກໂນໂລຢີໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນເວລາ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She works as a part-time teacher at the local school.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກນອກເວລາເປັນຄູສອນຢູ່ໂຮງຮຽນທ້ອງຖິ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນເວລາ
meaning list.sentence: He studies part-time while working a full-time job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮຽນນອກເວລາໃນຂະນະທີ່ເຮັດວຽກເຕັມເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນ, ກະຕືລືລົ້ນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is passionate about environmental conservation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນໃນການປົກປັກຮັກສາສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະຫັດຜ່ານ, ລະຫັດຜ່ານ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: Make sure your password is strong and secure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃຫ້ແນ່ໃຈວ່າລະຫັດຜ່ານຂອງທ່ານແຂງແຮງແລະປອດໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມອົດທົນ
meaning list.sentence: Teaching young children requires a lot of patience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສອນເດັກນ້ອຍຕ້ອງການຄວາມອົດທົນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢຸດ, ຢຸດພັກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He paused to take a sip of water during the speech.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນລະຫວ່າງການສົນທະນາ, ລາວຢຸດຊົ່ວຄາວເພື່ອເອົານ້ໍາດື່ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢຸດ, ຢຸດຊົ່ວຄາວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a long pause before he answered the question.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການຢຸດຊົ່ວຄາວກ່ອນທີ່ລາວຈະຕອບຄໍາຖາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄູ່ສົມລົດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is well-respected by her peers in the industry.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບການເຄົາລົບນັບຖືສູງຈາກເພື່ອນມິດຂອງລາວໃນອຸດສາຫະກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂທດ, ໂທດ
meaning list.sentence: The team was awarded a penalty in the last minute of the game.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມໄດ້ຮັບລາງວັນຈຸດໂທດໃນນາທີສຸດທ້າຍຂອງການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບຮູ້, ສັງເກດເຫັນ
meaning list.sentence: People perceive things differently based on their experiences.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນເຮົາຮັບຮູ້ສິ່ງຕ່າງໆແຕກຕ່າງກັນໄປຕາມປະສົບການຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈ, ຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The artist’s work challenges traditional perceptions of beauty.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກ​ງານ​ຂອງ​ຈິດ​ຕະ​ນາ​ການ​ທ້າ​ທາຍ​ຄວາມ​ຮັບ​ຮູ້​ພື້ນ​ເມືອງ​ຂອງ​ຄວາມ​ງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງຖາວອນ, ຢ່າງຖາວອນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: He moved permanently to another city last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຍ້າຍໄປຢູ່ເມືອງອື່ນຢ່າງຖາວອນໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຢາເມັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The doctor prescribed some pills for her headache.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍສັ່ງຢາບາງຊະນິດສໍາລັບອາການເຈັບຫົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເມດຕາ, ຄວາມເມດຕາ
meaning list.sentence: It’s a pity that she missed the performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນຄວາມອັບອາຍທີ່ລາວພາດການສະແດງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈັດວາງ, ຕຳແໜ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The placement of the furniture makes the room look larger.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈັດວາງເຄື່ອງເຟີນີເຈີເຮັດໃຫ້ຫ້ອງເບິ່ງກວ້າງຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນ, ສ່ວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He ate a large portion of the cake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກິນເຄັກສ່ວນໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ອາດ​ຈະ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: This plan could potentially save a lot of money.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນການນີ້ສາມາດປະຫຍັດເງິນໄດ້ຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ມາກ່ອນ, ລ່ວງໜ້າ
meaning list.sentence: A sudden drop in temperature preceded the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາຍຸ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ນຳ​ໜ້າ​ໂດຍ​ການ​ຫຼຸດ​ລົງ​ຂອງ​ອຸນຫະພູມ​ຢ່າງ​ກະທັນຫັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຄ່າ, ມີຄ່າ
meaning list.sentence: The necklace is made of precious stones.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາຍຄໍແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍແກ້ວປະເສີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນ່ນອນ, ສົມບູນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She gave a precise description of the suspect.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄໍາອະທິບາຍທີ່ຊັດເຈນກ່ຽວກັບຜູ້ຕ້ອງສົງໄສ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນ່ນອນ, ແນ່ນອນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The meeting starts precisely at 9 a.m.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ໄດ້​ເລີ່ມ​ຕົ້ນ​ທີ່​ແທ້ 9 am.

meaning list.meaning: ຄາດ​ຄະ​ເນ, foreseeable
meaning list.sentence: The outcome of the game was entirely predictable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ຂອງ​ເກມ​ແມ່ນ​ການ​ຄາດ​ຄະ​ເນ​ຫມົດ​.

meaning list.meaning: preference, priority (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her preference is for classical music over pop.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມມັກຂອງລາວແມ່ນດົນຕີຄລາສສິກຫຼາຍກວ່າດົນຕີປ໊ອບ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຽດ, ກຽດ
meaning list.sentence: He takes great pride in his work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມພູມໃຈໃນການເຮັດວຽກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົ້ນຕໍ, ຕົ້ນຕໍ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The book is primarily aimed at young readers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມນີ້ແມ່ນແນໃສ່ຜູ້ອ່ານໄວຫນຸ່ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົ້ນຕໍ, ຕົ້ນຕໍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The principal reason for the delay was the weather.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫດຜົນຕົ້ນຕໍສໍາລັບການຊັກຊ້າແມ່ນສະພາບອາກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ອນໜ້າ, ກ່ອນໜ້າ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You need prior approval before making any changes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຕ້ອງໄດ້ຮັບການອະນຸມັດກ່ອນກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເຮັດການປ່ຽນແປງໃດໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້, ໂອກາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The probability of rain tomorrow is quite high.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້ສູງທີ່ຈະມີຝົນຕົກໃນມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນໄປໄດ້, ເປັນໄປໄດ້ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It is probable that she will arrive late.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນໄປໄດ້ວ່າລາວຈະມາຮອດຊ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສືບຕໍ່, ກ້າວໄປຂ້າງໜ້າ
meaning list.sentence: You may now proceed with your presentation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ດຽວນີ້ທ່ານສາມາດສືບຕໍ່ການນຳສະເໜີຂອງທ່ານໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂຽນໂປລແກລມ, ການພັດທະນາຊອບແວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is learning Python programming to build applications.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກໍາລັງຮຽນການຂຽນໂປຼແກຼມ Python ເພື່ອພັດທະນາແອັບພລິເຄຊັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າວໜ້າ, ນະວັດຕະກຳ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company adopts a progressive approach to management.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໃຊ້ວິທີການທີ່ກ້າວຫນ້າໃນການຄຸ້ມຄອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫ້າມ, ຫ້າມ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The law prohibits smoking in public places.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດໝາຍ​ຫ້າມ​ສູບຢາ​ຢູ່​ບ່ອນ​ສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຫວັງ, ສັນຍາ
meaning list.sentence: She has a promising career in medicine ahead of her.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີອາຊີບທີ່ໂດດເດັ່ນໃນດ້ານການແພດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົ່ງເສີມ, ສົ່ງເສີມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He received a promotion for his excellent performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບການສົ່ງເສີມການປະຕິບັດທີ່ດີເລີດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕຸ້ນ, ຊຸກຍູ້
meaning list.sentence: The teacher prompted the students to ask questions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູສອນໃຫ້ນັກຮຽນຕັ້ງຄຳຖາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດຕາສ່ວນ, ອັດຕາສ່ວນ
meaning list.sentence: A large proportion of the population supports the new policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ຂອງປະຊາກອນສະຫນັບສະຫນູນນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ທາດໂປຼຕີນ
meaning list.sentence: Eggs are a good source of protein.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄຂ່ແມ່ນແຫຼ່ງໂປຣຕີນທີ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປະທ້ວງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The protesters gathered in the city square to voice their concerns.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ​ໄດ້​ເຕົ້າ​ໂຮມ​ກັນ​ຢູ່​ນະ​ຄອນ​ຫຼວງ​ເພື່ອ​ສະ​ແດງ​ຄວາມ​ວິຕົກ​ກັງວົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິດຕະວິທະຍາ
meaning list.sentence: She is receiving psychological support after the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບການສະຫນັບສະຫນູນທາງດ້ານຈິດໃຈຫຼັງຈາກອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຄສະນາ, ການໂຄສະນາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The product gained a lot of publicity after its launch.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມນິຍົມຫຼາຍຫຼັງຈາກການເປີດຕົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການພິມເຜີຍແຜ່
meaning list.sentence: She works in the publishing industry as an editor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກເປັນບັນນາທິການໃນອຸດສາຫະກໍາການພິມ.

meaning list.meaning: Punk (ດົນຕີຫຼື subculture) (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He enjoys listening to punk music from the 70s.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຟັງດົນຕີ punk ຈາກ 70s.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ, ພຽງແຕ່ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: Her decision was made purely out of curiosity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ຂອງ​ພຣະ​ອົງ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ເຮັດ​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ຄວາມ​ຢາກ​ຮູ້​ຢາກ​ເຫັນ​ຢ່າງ​ດຽວ​.

meaning list.meaning: pursuit, pursuit (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She dedicated her life to the pursuit of knowledge.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ອຸທິດຊີວິດຂອງຕົນເພື່ອສະແຫວງຫາຄວາມຮູ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳນາມ
meaning list.sentence: The children solved the jigsaw puzzle together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກ​ນ້ອຍ​ໄດ້​ແກ້​ໄຂ​ປິດ​ສະ​ດ້ວຍ​ກັນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳຫຼວດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They filled out a questionnaire about their shopping habits.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນການສໍາຫຼວດກ່ຽວກັບນິໄສການຊື້ຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື້ອຊາດ, ກ່ຽວກັບເຊື້ອຊາດ
meaning list.sentence: The organization is dedicated to fighting racial discrimination.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການດັ່ງກ່າວແມ່ນອຸທິດຕົນເພື່ອຕ້ານການຈໍາແນກເຊື້ອຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື້ອຊາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Racism has no place in a civilized society.
meaning list.sentence translation: Racism ບໍ່ມີສະຖານທີ່ຢູ່ໃນສັງຄົມພົນລະເຮືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື້ອຊາດ (ນາມ, ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The comments were clearly racist and offensive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຳ​ເຫັນ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ເປັນ​ການ​ແບ່ງ​ແຍກ​ເຊື້ອ​ຊາດ ​ແລະ ​ເປັນ​ການ​ກະທໍາ​ຜິດ​ຢ່າງ​ຈະ​ແຈ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: radiation, radiation (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Prolonged exposure to radiation can be harmful to health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສໍາຜັດກັບລັງສີໃນໄລຍະຍາວສາມາດເປັນອັນຕະລາຍຕໍ່ສຸຂະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົດໄຟ, ລົດໄຟ
meaning list.sentence: The city plans to expand its rail network.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະຄອນດັ່ງກ່າວວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຂະຫຍາຍຕາຫນ່າງທາງລົດໄຟຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: Random, haphazard (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The winner was chosen at random from the list of participants.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊະນະໄດ້ຖືກຄັດເລືອກໂດຍສຸ່ມຈາກບັນຊີລາຍຊື່ຂອງຜູ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜູ, ໜູ
meaning list.sentence: The old house was infested with rats.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອນ​ເກົ່າ​ເຕັມ​ໄປ​ດ້ວຍ​ໜູ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໃຫ້ຄະແນນ, ການໃຫ້ຄະແນນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The film received a high rating from critics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາໄດ້ຮັບການຈັດອັນດັບສູງຈາກນັກວິຈານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມເຫດສົມຜົນ, ຂ້ອນຂ້າງ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The hotel was reasonably priced considering its location.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພິຈາລະນາສະຖານທີ່ຂອງໂຮງແຮມ, ລາຄາແມ່ນຂ້ອນຂ້າງສົມເຫດສົມຜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກໍ່ສ້າງຄືນໃໝ່, ກໍ່ສ້າງຄືນໃໝ່
meaning list.sentence: The town is working to rebuild after the earthquake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເມືອງ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ພວມ​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ການ​ກໍ່ສ້າງ​ຄືນ​ໃໝ່​ພາຍຫຼັງ​ແຜ່ນດິນ​ໄຫວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຊື້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She picked up the receiver to answer the call.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເອົາ​ຜູ້​ຮັບ​ເພື່ອ​ຮັບ​ສາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສດຖະກິດຢຸດສະງັກ, ຫຼຸດລົງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country is facing a severe recession.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະ​ເທດ​ນີ້​ພວມ​ປະ​ເຊີນ​ໜ້າ​ກັບ​ສະພາບ​ເສດຖະກິດ​ຖົດ​ຖອຍ​ຢ່າງ​ຮ້າຍ​ແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄິດ​ໄລ່​, ຄິດ​ໄລ່
meaning list.sentence: I reckon it will take about two hours to finish the work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າຄິດວ່າມັນຈະໃຊ້ເວລາປະມານສອງຊົ່ວໂມງເພື່ອສໍາເລັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຮັບຮູ້, ຍອມຮັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She gained recognition for her innovative research.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ກາຍເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບການຄົ້ນຄ້ວານະວັດຕະກໍາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປິ່ນປົວ, ຟື້ນຟູ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His recovery after the surgery was remarkably fast.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຟື້ນຟູຫຼັງການຜ່າຕັດຂອງລາວແມ່ນໄວຢ່າງໂດດເດັ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບສະໝັກສະມາຊິກໃໝ່ (ຄຳນາມ, ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company is planning to recruit more employees next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຈ້າງພະນັກງານເພີ່ມເຕີມໃນເດືອນຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບສະໝັກພະນັກງານ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The recruitment process took over two weeks to complete.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂະບວນການຮັບສະໝັກພະນັກງານໄດ້ໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍກວ່າສອງອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຕັດສິນ
meaning list.sentence: The referee made a controversial decision during the match.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຳມະການຕັດສິນຜິດຖຽງກັນໃນລະຫວ່າງການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາວອົບພະຍົບ
meaning list.sentence: The camp provides shelter to thousands of refugees.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ້າຍ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໃຫ້​ທີ່​ພັກ​ອາ​ໄສ​ໃຫ້​ແກ່​ຊາວ​ອົບ​ພະຍົບຫຼາຍ​ພັນ​ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນທຶກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Registration for the conference closes next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລົງທະບຽນສໍາລັບກອງປະຊຸມຈະປິດໃນອາທິດຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວບຄຸມ, ຄວບຄຸມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The government regulates the sale of certain drugs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານຄວບຄຸມການຂາຍຢາບາງຊະນິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສີມ, ເສີມສ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: The bridge was reinforced to withstand heavy traffic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂົວ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ເສີມ​ສ້າງ​ຄວາມ​ເຂັ້ມ​ແຂງ​ເພື່ອ​ຕ້ານ​ການ​ສັນ​ຈອນ​ທີ່​ໜັກ​ໜ່ວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນເທົາ, ຜ່ອນຜັນ
meaning list.sentence: The medication helped to relieve her pain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢາໄດ້ຊ່ວຍບັນເທົາຄວາມເຈັບປວດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະບາຍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: She was relieved to hear that the test results were normal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກສະບາຍໃຈທີ່ໄດ້ຍິນວ່າຜົນການທົດສອບແມ່ນປົກກະຕິ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດເດັ່ນ, ພິເສດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: His recovery after the accident was remarkable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຟື້ນຕົວຂອງລາວຫຼັງຈາກອຸປະຕິເຫດແມ່ນມີຄວາມໂດດເດັ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັງເກດ
meaning list.sentence: She performed remarkably well in the competition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ສະແດງຜົນງານທີ່ໂດດເດັ່ນໃນການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລາຍງານ, ການສ້າງຂ່າວ
meaning list.sentence: The journalist is known for her unbiased reporting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຂ່າວເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບການລາຍງານທີ່ບໍ່ເປັນກາງຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາອອກ
meaning list.sentence: She decided to resign from her position due to personal reasons.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈລາອອກຈາກຕໍາແໜ່ງຍ້ອນເຫດຜົນສ່ວນຕົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຕັດສິນໃຈ, ການແກ້ໄຂ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The resolution to the conflict was reached after lengthy discussions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ແກ້​ໄຂ​ຄວາມ​ຂັດ​ແຍ່ງ​ໄດ້​ພົບ​ເຫັນ​ຫລັງ​ຈາກ​ໄດ້​ສົນທະນາ​ກັນ​ມາ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ດົນ​ນານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ້ອມແປງ, ຟື້ນຟູ
meaning list.sentence: The old building was restored to its original condition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານເກົ່າໄດ້ຖືກຟື້ນຟູຄືນສູ່ສະພາບເດີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຳກັດ, ຈຳກັດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The government restricted access to the sensitive information.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານຈຳກັດການເຂົ້າເຖິງຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ລະອຽດອ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຳກັດ, ຈຳກັດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new restrictions on travel will be enforced next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ຈໍາກັດໃຫມ່ກ່ຽວກັບການເດີນທາງຈະຖືກປະຕິບັດໃນເດືອນຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂາຍຍ່ອຍ
meaning list.sentence: The company focuses on both wholesale and retail operations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ສຸມໃສ່ການດໍາເນີນການທັງຂາຍສົ່ງແລະຂາຍຍ່ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກິນເບັ້ຍບໍານານ
meaning list.sentence: She is looking forward to her retirement next year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຫວັງວ່າຈະໄດ້ເງິນບໍານານໃນປີຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຍໄດ້, ກໍາໄລ
meaning list.sentence: The company’s revenue has increased significantly over the past year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຍໄດ້ຂອງບໍລິສັດເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນປີທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ທົບ​ທວນ​ຄືນ​, ການ​ແກ້​ໄຂ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The revision of the document was completed yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການທົບທວນເອກະສານດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ສໍາເລັດໃນມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ridiculous, ridiculous (ຄໍາຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The idea of hiking in such weather is ridiculous.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຄິດຂອງການຍ່າງຢູ່ໃນສະພາບອາກາດດັ່ງກ່າວແມ່ນ ridiculous.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ຽງ, ອັນຕະລາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Investing in startups can be quite risky.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລົງທຶນໃນການເລີ່ມຕົ້ນສາມາດມີຄວາມສ່ຽງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄູ່ແຂ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The two companies have been rivals for decades.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດທັງສອງໄດ້ເປັນຄູ່ແຂ່ງກັນມາເປັນເວລາຫຼາຍທົດສະວັດແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຂ່ງຂັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The rival team is very strong this season.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມກົງກັນຂ້າມແມ່ນເຂັ້ມແຂງຫຼາຍໃນລະດູການນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ລັກ, ລັກ
meaning list.sentence: The bank was robbed by a masked man last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະນາຄານຖືກລັກລອບໂດຍຜູ້ຊາຍໃສ່ຫນ້າກາກໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຈນ, ລັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police are investigating the robbery at the jewelry store.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕໍາຫຼວດກໍາລັງສືບສວນການລັກລອບຢູ່ຮ້ານຂາຍເຄື່ອງປະດັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັ້ງໄຟ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The rocket was launched into space successfully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລູກ​ສອນ​ໄຟ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ຍິງ​ຂຶ້ນ​ສູ່​ອະວະກາດ​ຢ່າງ​ສຳ​ເລັດ​ຜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮັກ, ຄວາມຮັກ
meaning list.sentence: Their romance began during their college years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມໂລແມນຕິກຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນໃນລະຫວ່າງປີວິທະຍາໄລຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ດອກກຸຫຼາບ
meaning list.sentence: He gave her a bouquet of red roses for Valentine’s Day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ມອບດອກກຸຫຼາບສີແດງໃຫ້ກັບນາງສຳລັບວັນແຫ່ງຄວາມຮັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະມານ, ປະມານ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The journey will take roughly two hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເດີນທາງຈະໃຊ້ເວລາປະມານສອງຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຳລາຍ, ທຳລາຍ (ຄຳນາມ, ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The heavy rain ruined our plans for the picnic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝົນຕົກໜັກເຮັດໃຫ້ແຜນການກິນເຂົ້າປ່າຂອງພວກເຮົາເສຍຫາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ruin, ruin (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The ruins of the ancient city are a popular tourist attraction.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາກຫັກພັງຂອງເມືອງບູຮານແມ່ນສະຖານທີ່ທ່ອງທ່ຽວທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພໍໃຈ, ພໍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The job gave him a great sense of satisfaction.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກງານດັ່ງກ່າວເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວມີຄວາມພໍໃຈຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ຄ້ານ, ຄວາມອັບອາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The political scandal caused a major uproar in the media.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ສໍ້​ລາດ​ບັງ​ຫຼວງ​ທາງ​ການ​ເມືອງ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ສື່​ມວນ​ຊົນ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ໂກດ​ແຄ້ນ​ຢ່າງ​ໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ານ, ຢ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: The loud noise scared the children.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງດັງເຮັດໃຫ້ເດັກນ້ອຍຢ້ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ານ, ຕົກໃຈ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a brief scare when the fire alarm went off.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເມື່ອ​ສັນຍານ​ໄຟ​ໄດ້​ດັບ​ໄປ, ​ໄດ້​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ຕື່ນ​ຕົກ​ໃຈ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ສັ້ນໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານະການ, ສະຖານະການທີ່ເປັນໄປໄດ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The team discussed various scenarios for the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານໄດ້ປຶກສາຫາລືສະຖານະການຕ່າງໆສໍາລັບໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກວິຊາການ, ນັກວິຊາການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scholar has written extensively on medieval history.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bilgin ຂຽນຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງກ່ຽວກັບປະຫວັດສາດ medieval.

meaning list.meaning: ທຶນການສຶກສາ, ຜົນສໍາເລັດທາງວິຊາການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She received a scholarship to study abroad.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບທຶນການສຶກສາໄປຮຽນຕ່າງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂູດ, ຂີດ
meaning list.sentence: He scratched his arm where it was itching.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂູດສ່ວນທີ່ມີອາການຄັນຢູ່ແຂນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂູດ, ຂູດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a small scratch on the car door.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຮອຍຂີດຂ່ວນເລັກນ້ອຍຢູ່ປະຕູລົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈໍສະແດງຜົນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Regular health screenings can help detect issues early.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການກວດສຸຂະພາບເປັນປົກກະຕິສາມາດຊ່ວຍກວດພົບບັນຫາໄດ້ໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຊອກຫາ, ຜູ້ຮ້ອງຂໍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Job seekers are encouraged to apply online.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊອກຫາວຽກໄດ້ຮັບການຊຸກຍູ້ໃຫ້ສະຫມັກອອນໄລນ໌.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳມະນາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She attended a seminar on digital marketing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກອງປະຊຸມສໍາມະນາກ່ຽວກັບການຕະຫຼາດດິຈິຕອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຕັ້ງຖິ່ນຖານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The first settlers in the region faced many challenges.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ຕັ້ງ​ຖິ່ນ​ຖານ​ທຳ​ອິດ​ຢູ່​ເຂດ​ປະສົບ​ກັບ​ຄວາມ​ຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ​ຫຼາຍ​ຢ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮຸນແຮງ, ຢ່າງຈິງຈັງ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The building was severely damaged by the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມເສຍຫາຍຢ່າງໜັກໜ່ວງຈາກພະຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງດູດ, ເຊັກຊີ່ (ນາມສະກຸນ)
meaning list.sentence: She wore a sexy dress to the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງນຸ່ງເສື້ອທີ່ດຶງດູດໃຈໄປງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮູບຮ່າງ, ຮູບຮ່າງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The uniquely shaped vase caught everyone’s attention.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຖປັດສະວະທີ່ມີຮູບຮ່າງທີ່ເປັນເອກະລັກໄດ້ດຶງດູດຄວາມສົນໃຈຂອງທຸກໆຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົກໃຈ, ປະຫລາດໃຈ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The news of the accident was truly shocking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ່າວ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ອຸ​ປະ​ຕິ​ເຫດ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ຕື່ນ​ຕົກ​ໃຈ​ແທ້ໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ຝັ່ງ, ຝັ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They walked along the shore of the lake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ຍ່າງ​ໄປ​ຕາມ​ຝັ່ງ​ທະເລສາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມອຶດຢາກ, ການຂາດແຄນ
meaning list.sentence: There is a shortage of affordable housing in the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂາດເຂີນທີ່ຢູ່ອາໃສລາຄາບໍ່ແພງຢູ່ໃນຕົວເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The bus will arrive shortly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດເມຈະມາຮອດໃນໄວໆນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລຍະສັ້ນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Short-term goals can help maintain motivation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເປົ້າໝາຍໄລຍະສັ້ນສາມາດຊ່ວຍຮັກສາແຮງຈູງໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ້າຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has two siblings, a brother and a sister.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີອ້າຍເອື້ອຍນ້ອງສອງຄົນ, ອ້າຍເອື້ອຍນ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຍເຊັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Please put your signature at the bottom of the form.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາໃສ່ລາຍເຊັນຂອງເຈົ້າຢູ່ລຸ່ມແບບຟອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສຳຄັນ, ຄວາມໝາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The discovery of the new planet holds great scientific significance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຄົ້ນພົບດາວເຄາະດວງໃໝ່ແມ່ນມີຄວາມສຳຄັນທາງວິທະຍາສາດຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊໍານິຊໍານານ, ມີພອນສະຫວັນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is a skilled carpenter who can build anything.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຊ່າງໄມ້ທີ່ມີຄວາມຊໍານິຊໍານານສາມາດເຮັດຫຍັງໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ກະໂຫຼກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The skull protects the brain from injury.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະໂຫຼກປ້ອງກັນສະຫມອງຈາກການບາດເຈັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳຂວັນ, ຄຳຂວັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company's new advertising slogan is very catchy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາຂວັນການໂຄສະນາໃຫມ່ຂອງບໍລິສັດແມ່ນຂ້ອນຂ້າງຈັບໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ອັນທີ່ເອີ້ນວ່າ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The so-called expert gave incorrect advice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອັນທີ່ເອີ້ນວ່າຜູ້ຊ່ຽວຊານໃຫ້ຄໍາແນະນໍາທີ່ບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: somehow, somehow (ຄໍາ​ອຸ​ປະ​ກອນ​)
meaning list.sentence: Somehow, they managed to complete the project on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: Somehow they manage to the project to complete the time .

meaning list.meaning: ບາງຄັ້ງ, ໃນອະນາຄົດ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: We should meet for coffee sometime next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຄວນຈະພົບກັນສໍາລັບກາເຟບາງຄັ້ງໃນອາທິດຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັ້ນສູງ, ຊັບຊ້ອນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new software is very sophisticated and user-friendly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊອບແວໃຫມ່ແມ່ນກ້າວຫນ້າທາງດ້ານຫຼາຍແລະເປັນມິດກັບຜູ້ໃຊ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຫວ່າງ, ເປົ່າ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: I always carry a spare tire in my car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້າ​ພະ​ເຈົ້າ​ສະ​ເຫມີ​ມີ​ຢາງ​ອາ​ໄຫຼ່​ໃນ​ລົດ​ຂອງ​ຂ້າ​ພະ​ເຈົ້າ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່ຽວຊານ, ຊ່ຽວຊານ
meaning list.sentence: She specializes in pediatric medicine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊ່ຽວຊານດ້ານການປິ່ນປົວເດັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະບຸ, ລະອຽດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Please specify the size and color when ordering.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາລະບຸຂະຫນາດແລະສີໃນເວລາສັ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫງ່າງາມ, ສະຫງ່າງາມ
meaning list.sentence: The view from the top of the mountain was spectacular.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັດ​ສະ​ນີ​ຍະ​ພາບ​ຈາກ​ເທິງ​ຂອງ​ພູ​ໄດ້​ທີ່​ສວຍ​ງາມ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຊົມ
meaning list.sentence: The spectators cheered loudly during the match.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝູງ​ຊົນ​ໄດ້​ຊົມ​ເຊີຍ​ໃນ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ການ​ແຂ່ງ​ຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄາດເດົາ, ຄາດເດົາ
meaning list.sentence: Economists are speculating about the future of the stock market.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກເສດຖະສາດເຮັດໃຫ້ການຄາດຄະເນກ່ຽວກັບອະນາຄົດຂອງຕະຫຼາດຫຼັກຊັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເດົາ, ການຄາດເດົາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There is a lot of speculation about the upcoming announcement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການຄາດເດົາຫຼາຍກ່ຽວກັບການປະກາດທີ່ຈະມາເຖິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງເທດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This dish is made with a mix of spices.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຫານນີ້ແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍການປະສົມຂອງເຄື່ອງເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: to spill, to overflow (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: Be careful not to spill the coffee on the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈົ່ງລະມັດລະວັງບໍ່ໃຫ້ກາເຟຮົ່ວລົງເທິງໂຕະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນ, ແຂງກະດ້າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She said it out of spite, not because she meant it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເວົ້າ​ວ່າ​ນີ້​ບໍ່​ແມ່ນ​ຍ້ອນ​ຄວາມ​ເຊື່ອ​ຖື, ​ແຕ່​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ຄວາມ​ຈິງ.

meaning list.meaning: spoil, spoil (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The rain spoiled our plans for a picnic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝົນເຮັດໃຫ້ແຜນການກິນເຂົ້າປ່າຂອງພວກເຮົາເສຍຫາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄສົກ, ຜູ້ຕາງໜ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The spokesman addressed the media after the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄສົກກ່າວຕໍ່ສື່ມວນຊົນພາຍຫຼັງກອງປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄສົກ, ຜູ້ຕາງໜ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A spokesperson for the company released a statement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄສົກຂອງບໍລິສັດໄດ້ອອກຖະແຫຼງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄສົກຍິງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The spokeswoman confirmed the details of the report.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄສົກຍິງໄດ້ຢືນຢັນລາຍລະອຽດຂອງບົດລາຍງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຜູ້ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The event was made possible by corporate sponsorship.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ດໍາເນີນໄປດ້ວຍການສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຜູ້ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຂອງບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບກິລາ
meaning list.sentence: The city is hosting a major sporting event this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມືອງດັ່ງກ່າວເປັນເຈົ້າພາບຈັດການແຂ່ງຂັນກິລາທີ່ສໍາຄັນໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຢຸດ, ຢຸດຊົ່ວຄາວ
meaning list.sentence: The market is full of stalls selling handmade crafts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕະຫຼາດແມ່ນເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍຮ້ານຂາຍເຄື່ອງຫັດຖະກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ທ່າທາງ, ທ່າທາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company has taken a strong stance on environmental issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປະຕິບັດຢ່າງເຂັ້ມແຂງກ່ຽວກັບບັນຫາສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: to starve, to starve (ຄຳ​ກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Many people starve due to lack of food in the region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາຊົນຈໍານວນຫຼາຍກໍາລັງຫິວໂຫຍຍ້ອນການຂາດແຄນອາຫານໃນພາກພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກກະຕິ
meaning list.sentence: The company's profits have been growing steadily over the years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນກໍາໄລຂອງບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງໃນໄລຍະປີທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Steam rose from the hot cup of tea.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຍນ້ຳເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຈາກຖ້ວຍຊາຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັກເຕືອນ
meaning list.sentence: The program aims to stimulate economic growth in the region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ໂຄງການ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ແນ​ໃສ່​ຊຸກຍູ້​ການ​ເຕີບ​ໂຕ​ດ້ານ​ເສດຖະກິດ​ໃນ​ພາກ​ພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສີມສ້າງ, ເສີມສ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: Regular exercise helps to strengthen your muscles.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການອອກກໍາລັງກາຍເປັນປົກກະຕິຈະຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ກ້າມຊີ້ນຂອງທ່ານແຂງແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນ່ນອນ, ຢ່າງເຂັ້ມງວດ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The rules must be strictly followed to ensure safety.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດລະບຽບຕ້ອງໄດ້ຮັບການບັງຄັບໃຊ້ຢ່າງເຂັ້ມງວດເພື່ອຮັບປະກັນຄວາມປອດໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ອໍາມະພາດ, ເສັ້ນເລືອດຕັນໃນ; ລັດຖະປະຫານ
meaning list.sentence: He suffered a stroke last year but has recovered well.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປະສົບກັບເສັ້ນເລືອດຕັນໃນປີທີ່ຜ່ານມາແຕ່ໄດ້ຟື້ນຕົວດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດເດັ່ນ, ໜ້າສົນໃຈ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The view of the sunset was absolutely stunning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັດສະນະຂອງ sunset ແມ່ນ stunning ຢ່າງແທ້ຈິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍ່ໄປ, ຕໍ່ມາ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The subsequent events proved their initial fears were valid.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫດການຕໍ່ມາໄດ້ພິສູດວ່າຄວາມຢ້ານກົວຂອງລາວໃນເບື້ອງຕົ້ນແມ່ນຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ນັ້ນ​, ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ນັ້ນ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: The book was published in 2010 and was subsequently translated into five languages.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ພິມ​ຈຳໜ່າຍ​ໃນ​ປີ 2010 ​ແລະ​ຕໍ່​ມາ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ແປ​ເປັນ 5 ພາສາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊານເມືອງ, ຊານເມືອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They moved to a quiet suburb outside the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າຍ້າຍໄປຢູ່ເຂດຊານເມືອງທີ່ງຽບສະຫງົບຢູ່ນອກເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຈັບປວດ, ຄວາມທຸກ
meaning list.sentence: She dedicated her life to relieving the suffering of others.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ອຸທິດຊີວິດຂອງຕົນເພື່ອບັນເທົາຄວາມທຸກທໍລະມານຂອງຄົນອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພຽງພໍ, ພຽງພໍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: There is sufficient evidence to support the theory.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຫຼັກຖານພຽງພໍເພື່ອສະຫນັບສະຫນູນທິດສະດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ພຽງພໍ, ພຽງພໍ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The material was sufficiently explained in the lecture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເອກະສານໄດ້ຖືກອະທິບາຍຢ່າງພຽງພໍໃນການບັນຍາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່, super (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The weather was super during our vacation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາກາດດີຫຼາຍໃນລະຫວ່າງວັນພັກຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແພດຜ່າຕັດ
meaning list.sentence: The surgeon performed a complicated operation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແພດຜ່າຕັດໄດ້ປະຕິບັດການຜ່າຕັດທີ່ສັບສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຢູ່ລອດ, ຊີວິດ
meaning list.sentence: Survival in the desert requires careful planning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຢູ່ລອດໃນທະເລຊາຍຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ມີການວາງແຜນທີ່ລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ລອດຊີວິດ, ຜູ້ລອດຊີວິດ
meaning list.sentence: The earthquake survivor shared her story with the media.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ລອດຊີວິດຈາກແຜ່ນດິນໄຫວໄດ້ແບ່ງປັນເລື່ອງລາວກັບສື່ມວນຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຈະ, ເລື່ອນ
meaning list.sentence: The match was suspended due to heavy rain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຂ່ງຂັນຖືກໂຈະເນື່ອງຈາກຝົນຕົກໜັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍືນຍົງ
meaning list.sentence: The company focuses on sustainable energy solutions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ສຸມໃສ່ການແກ້ໄຂພະລັງງານແບບຍືນຍົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກືນ
meaning list.sentence: He swallowed the pill with a glass of water.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກືນຢາເມັດດ້ວຍຈອກນ້ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າໃຈ, ເຫັນອົກເຫັນໃຈ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She was very sympathetic to his situation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຂົ້າໃຈສະຖານະການຂອງນາງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັດການກັບ, ແກ້ໄຂ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The government is planning to tackle the unemployment issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາການຫວ່າງງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້າຍຊື່, ປ້າຍກຳກັບ (ນາມ, ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He tagged the boxes with their contents for easy identification.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕິດປ້າຍກຳກັບໃສ່ກ່ອງເພື່ອຈຳແນກພວກມັນໄດ້ງ່າຍດ້ວຍເນື້ອໃນຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕະ, ແຕະ (verb, noun)
meaning list.sentence: She tapped on the door before entering.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເຄາະ​ປະຕູ​ໜ້ອຍ​ໜຶ່ງ​ກ່ອນ​ເຂົ້າ​ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ເທັກໂນໂລຍີ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country is known for its technological advancements.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບຄວາມກ້າວຫນ້າທາງດ້ານເຕັກໂນໂລຢີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄວໜຸ່ມ, ໄວລຸ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She started playing the piano in her teens.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເລີ່ມຫຼິ້ນເປຍໂນໃນໄວໜຸ່ມຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ວັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They visited an ancient temple during their trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ການ​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ໄປ​ຢ້ຽມ​ຢາມ​ວັດ​ຖຸ​ບູ​ຮານ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົ່ວຄາວ
meaning list.sentence: The store is temporarily closed for renovations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທາງຮ້ານໄດ້ປິດຊົ່ວຄາວເພື່ອສ້ອມແປງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທ່າອຽງ, ທ່າອຽງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has a tendency to overthink things.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຈະຄິດຫຼາຍເກີນໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຄັ່ງຕຶງ, ຄວາມເຄັ່ງຕຶງ
meaning list.sentence: There was a lot of tension during the negotiations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມເຄັ່ງຕຶງຫຼາຍໃນລະຫວ່າງການເຈລະຈາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານີ, ຈຸດຈອດສຸດທ້າຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bus stopped at the terminal to pick up passengers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດເມໄດ້ຢຸດຢູ່ທີ່ສະຖານີເພື່ອຮັບຜູ້ໂດຍສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເງື່ອນໄຂ, ເງື່ອນໄຂ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The contract outlines the terms of the agreement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສັນຍາລາຍລະອຽດກ່ຽວກັບເງື່ອນໄຂຂອງສັນຍາ.

meaning list.meaning: very bad, ທີ່ສຸດ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She felt terribly lonely after moving to a new city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ຍ້າຍ​ໄປ​ຢູ່​ເມືອງ​ໃໝ່ ລາວ​ຮູ້ສຶກ​ໂດດດ່ຽວ​ຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ານ, ຢ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: The loud noise terrified the small children.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງດັງເຮັດໃຫ້ເດັກນ້ອຍຢ້ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່​ດິນ, ພາກ​ພື້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The explorers mapped the uncharted territory.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສຳຫຼວດສ້າງແຜນທີ່ອານາເຂດທີ່ບໍ່ມີແຜນທີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ້ານ, ຢ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: The villagers lived in terror of the wild animals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວບ້ານພາກັນຢ້ານສັດປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການກໍ່ການຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: Governments are working together to combat terrorism.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານກໍາລັງເຮັດວຽກຮ່ວມກັນເພື່ອຕ້ານການກໍ່ການຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ກໍ່ການຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: The police arrested a suspected terrorist in the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ຈັບ​ຜູ້​ຕ້ອງ​ສົງ​ໄສ​ກໍ່​ການ​ຮ້າຍ​ຄົນ​ໜຶ່ງ​ໃນ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການທົດລອງ, ການທົດລອງ
meaning list.sentence: The product underwent rigorous testing before its release.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຜ່ານການທົດສອບຢ່າງເຂັ້ມງວດກ່ອນທີ່ຈະອອກສູ່ຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປື້ມແບບຮຽນ
meaning list.sentence: She bought a new biology textbook for her class.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊື້ປື້ມແບບຮຽນຊີວະສາດໃຫມ່ສໍາລັບຫ້ອງຮຽນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police are investigating a series of thefts in the area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດກຳລັງສືບສວນສອບສວນການລັກຂະໂມຍຢູ່ຫຼາຍບ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: Therapist (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She sees a therapist once a week to talk about her stress.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພົບຜູ້ປິ່ນປົວຫນຶ່ງຄັ້ງຕໍ່ອາທິດເພື່ອເວົ້າກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມກົດດັນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: thesis, ການໂຕ້ຖຽງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is working on her master's thesis about climate change.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກຳລັງກະກຽມບົດວິທະຍານິພົນປະລິນຍາໂທກ່ຽວກັບການປ່ຽນແປງດິນຟ້າອາກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ, ລະອຽດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police conducted a thorough investigation of the case.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕໍາຫຼວດໄດ້ດໍາເນີນການສືບສວນຢ່າງລະອຽດກ່ຽວກັບກໍລະນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ, ລະອຽດ
meaning list.sentence: She thoroughly cleaned the house before the guests arrived.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ເຮັດຄວາມສະອາດເຮືອນຢ່າງສົມບູນກ່ອນທີ່ແຂກຈະມາຮອດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂປ້ມື
meaning list.sentence: He accidentally cut his thumb while chopping vegetables.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບັງເອີນຕັດນິ້ວໂປ້ຂອງລາວໃນຂະນະທີ່ຟັກຜັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາຕະລາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Good timing is crucial in comedy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄລຍະເວລາທີ່ດີແມ່ນສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບການຕະຫລົກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸລັງ; ຜ້າເຊັດມື
meaning list.sentence: The doctor examined the tissue sample under a microscope.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍກວດເບິ່ງຕົວຢ່າງເນື້ອເຍື່ອພາຍໃຕ້ກ້ອງຈຸລະທັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ້າເຊັດມື
meaning list.sentence: She handed him a tissue to wipe his tears.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເອົາ​ຜ້າ​ເຊັດ​ນໍ້າຕາ​ໃຫ້​ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຕນ (ຫນ່ວຍຂອງນ້ໍາຫນັກ); ປະລິມານຫຼາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The truck carried five tons of gravel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດບັນທຸກໄດ້ບັນທຸກກ້ອນຫີນຫ້າໂຕນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັນ ແມັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The factory produces 10,000 tonnes of steel annually.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງງານຜະລິດເຫຼັກກ້າ 10,000 ໂຕນຕໍ່ປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຂ່ງຂັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The chess tournament attracted players from all over the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ແຂ່ງ​ຂັນ​ໝາກ​ຮຸກ​ໄດ້​ດຶງ​ດູດ​ຜູ້​ຫຼິ້ນ​ຈາກ​ທົ່ວ​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຕິດຕາມ; ຮ່ອງຮອຍ, ອາການ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ, ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police traced the stolen car to a remote location.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ຕິດຕາມ​ລົດ​ທີ່​ຖືກ​ລັກ​ໄປ​ບ່ອນ​ຫ່າງ​ໄກ​ສອກ​ຫຼີກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄ້າ, ການຊື້ - ຂາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: International trading plays a vital role in the economy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຄ້າສາກົນມີບົດບາດສໍາຄັນໃນເສດຖະກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໂສກເສົ້າ, ໄພພິບັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The loss of the ship was a tragedy for the small fishing village.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ສູນ​ເສຍ​ເຮືອ​ລຳ​ນີ້​ເປັນ​ຄວາມ​ໂສກ​ເສົ້າ​ຂອງ​ໝູ່​ບ້ານ​ຫາ​ປາ​ນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂສກເສົ້າ, ໂສກເສົ້າ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The tragic accident shocked the entire community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸ​ປະ​ຕິ​ເຫດ​ທີ່​ໂສກ​ເສົ້າ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ຊຸມ​ຊົນ​ທັງ​ຫມົດ​ຕົກ​ໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸນສົມບັດ, ຄຸນນະພາບສ່ວນຕົວ
meaning list.sentence: Honesty is one of his most admirable traits.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຊື່ສັດແມ່ນໜຶ່ງໃນຄຸນລັກສະນະທີ່ໜ້າຊົມເຊີຍທີ່ສຸດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖ່າຍທອດ, ຖ່າຍທອດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The virus can be transmitted through contact with infected surfaces.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຊື້ອໄວຣັສສາມາດຕິດຕໍ່ໄດ້ໂດຍຜ່ານການສໍາຜັດກັບພື້ນຜິວທີ່ຕິດເຊື້ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂົນສົ່ງ, ການຂົນສົ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: Public transportation is widely used in urban areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຂົນສົ່ງສາທາລະນະຖືກນໍາໃຊ້ຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງໃນເຂດຕົວເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັ້ງໃສ່ກັບດັກ, ຈັ່ນຈັບ (verb, noun)
meaning list.sentence: The hunters set traps to catch wild animals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາຍພານວາງໃສ່ກັບດັກຈັບສັດປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັບສົມບັດ, ສິ່ງມີຄ່າ
meaning list.sentence: The pirates buried their treasure on a deserted island.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຈນສະລັດໄດ້ຝັງຊັບສົມບັດຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າຢູ່ເທິງເກາະທະເລຊາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຜົ່າ, ເຜົ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The tribe lives in a remote region of the forest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊົນເຜົ່າອາໃສຢູ່ເຂດຫ່າງໄກສອກຫຼີກຂອງປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕຸ້ນ, ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The loud noise triggered an alarm in the building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງໄດ້ກະຕຸ້ນເຕືອນໄພຢູ່ໃນອາຄານ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັນຕື້ (ຕົວເລກ)
meaning list.sentence: The national debt has reached over a trillion dollars.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫນີ້ສິນແຫ່ງຊາດເກີນ 1 ພັນຕື້ໂດລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜ່ວຍງານທະຫານ, ກຸ່ມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The troops were deployed to the border.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໜ່ວຍ​ທະຫານ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ສົ່ງ​ໄປ​ຍັງ​ຊາຍ​ແດນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊູນາມິ, ຄື້ນຍັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The coastal city was devastated by a powerful tsunami.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມືອງ​ແຄມ​ຝັ່ງ​ທະ​ເລ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ຄວາມ​ເສຍ​ຫາຍ​ຈາກ​ຄື້ນ​ສຶ​ນາ​ມິ​ທີ່​ແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸດທ້າຍ, ສຸດທ້າຍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Our ultimate goal is to provide clean water for everyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເປົ້າໝາຍສູງສຸດຂອງພວກເຮົາແມ່ນເພື່ອສະໜອງນ້ຳສະອາດໃຫ້ແກ່ທຸກໆຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມຮັບບໍ່ໄດ້
meaning list.sentence: The behavior was deemed unacceptable by the authorities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຶດຕິ​ກຳ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ຖື​ວ່າ​ບໍ່​ສາມາດ​ຍອມຮັບ​ໄດ້​ຈາກ​ເຈົ້າໜ້າ​ທີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມບໍ່ແນ່ນອນ
meaning list.sentence: The uncertainty about the outcome made everyone anxious.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມບໍ່ແນ່ນອນກ່ຽວກັບຜົນໄດ້ຮັບເຮັດໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນກັງວົນ.

meaning list.meaning: to undergo, to undergo (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The patient will undergo surgery tomorrow morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນເຈັບຈະຜ່າຕັດໃນຕອນເຊົ້າມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດ, ປະຕິບັດ
meaning list.sentence: The company will undertake a major construction project next year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດຈະດໍາເນີນໂຄງການກໍ່ສ້າງທີ່ສໍາຄັນໃນປີຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກມາ, ເປີດເຜີຍ
meaning list.sentence: The mystery began to unfold as the investigation progressed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຂະນະທີ່ການສືບສວນມີຄວາມຄືບຫນ້າ, ຄວາມລຶກລັບໄດ້ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນອອກມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຊກ​ດີ, ໂຊກ​ດີ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: It was an unfortunate accident that could have been prevented.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນີ້ແມ່ນອຸປະຕິເຫດທີ່ໂຊກບໍ່ດີທີ່ສາມາດປ້ອງກັນໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມທົບ, ສາມັກຄີ
meaning list.sentence: The new policy aims to unite the divided community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍບາຍ​ໃໝ່​ແມ່ນ​ແນ​ໃສ່​ຮັດ​ແໜ້ນ​ສັງຄົມ​ທີ່​ແບ່ງ​ແຍກ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາມັກຄີ, ສາມັກຄີ
meaning list.sentence: The speech emphasized the importance of unity among citizens.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຳ​ປາ​ໄສ​ໄດ້​ເນັ້ນ​ໜັກ​ເຖິງ​ຄວາມ​ສຳຄັນ​ຂອງ​ຄວາມ​ສາມັກຄີ​ລະຫວ່າງ​ພົນລະ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທົ່ວໄປ, ທົ່ວໄປ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Education is considered a universal right.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສຶກສາຖືວ່າເປັນສິດທິທົ່ວໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ດ່ວນ, ຮີບດ່ວນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The patient needs urgent medical attention.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນເຈັບຕ້ອງການການດູແລທາງການແພດດ່ວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ນໍາ​ໃຊ້​, ວິ​ທີ​ການ​ນໍາ​ໃຊ້ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: Water usage in the area has decreased due to drought.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການນໍາໃຊ້ນ້ໍາຫຼຸດລົງໃນພາກພື້ນຍ້ອນໄພແຫ້ງແລ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຮ້ປະໂຫຍດ, ໄຮ້ປະໂຫຍດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This tool is useless without the proper attachment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງມືນີ້ແມ່ນບໍ່ມີປະໂຫຍດໂດຍບໍ່ມີການຕິດຄັດທີ່ເຫມາະສົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖືກຕ້ອງ, ມີເຫດຜົນ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The ticket is valid for one week from the date of purchase.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປີ້ແມ່ນຖືກຕ້ອງສໍາລັບຫນຶ່ງອາທິດຈາກວັນທີຊື້.

meaning list.meaning: ການປ່ຽນແປງ, ການປ່ຽນແປງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There is a slight variation in the color of the fabrics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງກັນເລັກນ້ອຍໃນສີຂອງຜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ລວງຕັ້ງ, ລວງຕັ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: The vertical lines on the graph represent time intervals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສັ້ນຕັ້ງຢູ່ໃນຕາຕະລາງສະແດງເຖິງຊ່ວງເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັດສະນະ, ທັດສະນະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: From her viewpoint, the project was a success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈາກທັດສະນະຂອງລາວ, ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ວີຊາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He applied for a visa to travel to the United States.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຍື່ນຂໍວີຊາເພື່ອເດີນທາງໄປສະຫະລັດອາເມລິກາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເບິ່ງເຫັນ, ເບິ່ງເຫັນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The mountains are visible from the hotel balcony.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພູເຂົາສາມາດເຫັນໄດ້ຈາກລະບຽງຂອງໂຮງແຮມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໝັກໃຈ, ທາງເລືອກ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Participation in the survey is completely voluntary.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເຂົ້າຮ່ວມໃນການສໍາຫຼວດແມ່ນມີຄວາມສະໝັກໃຈຢ່າງສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລົງຄະແນນສຽງ
meaning list.sentence: The voting process will close at 6 p.m.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂະບວນການລົງຄະແນນສຽງຈະສິ້ນສຸດລົງໃນເວລາ 18:00 ໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍ່າງໄປມາ
meaning list.sentence: We wandered through the streets of the old town.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ໄປ​ຕາມ​ຖະ​ຫນົນ​ຫົນ​ທາງ​ຂອງ​ນະ​ຄອນ​ເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸ່ນເຄື່ອງ
meaning list.sentence: Global warming is a serious environmental issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລກຮ້ອນເປັນບັນຫາສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມທີ່ຮ້າຍແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາທິດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She writes a weekly column for the local newspaper.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂຽນຄໍລໍາປະຈໍາອາທິດສໍາລັບຫນັງສືພິມທ້ອງຖິ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປກ, ແປກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: He had a weird dream about flying last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາລາວມີຄວາມຝັນທີ່ແປກປະຫຼາດກ່ຽວກັບການບິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫວັດດີການ, ການຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອສັງຄົມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government is focused on improving public welfare.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານສຸມໃສ່ປັບປຸງສະຫວັດດີການຂອງປະຊາຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າສາລີ
meaning list.sentence: The fields are full of golden wheat ready for harvest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທົ່ງ​ນາ​ເຕັມ​ໄປ​ດ້ວຍ​ເຂົ້າ​ສາລີ​ທອງ​ພ້ອມ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ເກັບ​ກ່ຽວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຜກໍຕາມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Whoever arrives first gets the best seat.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃຜມາກ່ອນໄດ້ບ່ອນນັ່ງທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາມັນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The disease is widespread in rural areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍາດດັ່ງກ່າວມັກເກີດຢູ່ໃນເຂດຊົນນະບົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັນຍາ, ໃຈ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book is filled with wisdom and practical advice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປື້ມແມ່ນເຕັມໄປດ້ວຍປັນຍາແລະຄໍາແນະນໍາພາກປະຕິບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອນ, ຖອນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She decided to withdraw her application for the job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັດສິນໃຈຖອນໃບສະໝັກວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຮງງານ
meaning list.sentence: The company is planning to expand its workforce next year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຂະຫຍາຍແຮງງານຂອງຕົນໃນປີຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານທີ່ເຮັດວຽກ
meaning list.sentence: Safety measures are important in the workplace.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຮັກສາຄວາມປອດໄພໃນບ່ອນເຮັດວຽກແມ່ນມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກອງປະຊຸມ, ກອງປະຊຸມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The artist holds a workshop every Saturday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສິລະປິນຈັດກອງປະຊຸມທຸກໆວັນເສົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແມ່ທ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The gardener found a worm in the soil.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວສວນພົບແມ່ທ້ອງຢູ່ໃນດິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ້ມື
meaning list.sentence: She wears a bracelet on her left wrist.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃສ່ສາຍແຂນໃສ່ຂໍ້ມືຊ້າຍຂອງລາວ.
